sorceries.lore: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
sorceries.effect: Launches a horizontally-widening magic arc
sorceries.location: Dropped by Teardrop Scarab in the southern portion of the Agheel Lake area in Limgrave, where Giant Crabs dwell. Beware of a Giant Crab ambush!Starting Item for the AstrologerCan be purchased from Sorceress Sellen for 1500 Runes. Sellen is located in Limgrave: Waypoint Ruins Can be purchased from Thops for 1500 Runes. Thops is at the Church of Irith.

sorceries.name: Glintstone Cometshard
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.Fires a magical comet with a trailing tail.This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion. Charging enhances potency.A sorcery of the Karolos Conspectus, the most venerable of the academy.
sorceries.lore: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
sorceries.effect: Fires a magic comet with a trailing tail
sorceries.location: Can be purchased for 12,000 Runes after you deliver the Conspectus Scroll to Miriel Pastor of Vows, Sorceress Sellen, or Preceptor Seluvis.

sorceries.name: Glintstone Icecrag
sorceries.description: Sorcery said to have been used by the old snow witch. The glintstone serves as a conduit, launching a mass of cold magic. This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion. The snowy crone taught the young Ranni to fear the dark moon as she imparted her cold sorcery. NOTE:
sorceries.lore: Sorcery said to have been used by the old snow witch.
sorceries.effect: Fires mass of cold magic from glintstone
sorceries.location: Purchased from Preceptor Seluvis in Seluvis's Rise for 7,500 Runes.

sorceries.name: Glintstone Pebble
sorceries.description: The most basic glintstone sorcery of the Academy of Raya Lucaria. The glintstone serves as a conduit, launching magical projectiles at foes.This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion. This is a universal first step on the journey to true knowledge of sorcery. NOTE: This was changed with Patch 1.07 as follows: The Attack Power was increased.
sorceries.lore: Skill: Glintstone Pebble
sorceries.effect: Fires magic projectiles from glintstone
sorceries.location: Starting Spell for the AstrologerCan be purchased from Sorceress Sellen for 1,000 Runes. Sellen is located in Limgrave: Waypoint Ruins

sorceries.name: Glintstone Stars
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Fires three magic shooting stars that pursue the target.This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Charging enhancespotency. A sorcery of the Olivinus Conspectus, which attracts sorcerers from Sellia, Town of Sorcery. NOTE:
sorceries.lore: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
sorceries.effect: Fires guided magic shooting stars
sorceries.location: Can be purchased from Sorceress Sellen for 3,000 Runes. Sellen is located in Limgrave: Waypoint Ruins

sorceries.name: Gravity Well
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces.Fires a projectile of condensed gravitational force. Those struck by it will be pulled toward the caster.Charging enhances potency.A gravitational technique studied by the young Radahn. His master was an Alabaster Lord with skin of stone.
sorceries.lore: One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces.
sorceries.effect: Pulls foes toward caster with gravity projectile
sorceries.location: Location: Raya Lucaria AcademyNearest Site of Grace: Church of the Cuckoo or Schoolhouse ClassroomDropped by the Monolith Guardian enemy that appears from a gravity portal. The section is near the graveyard and the large rotating lift of Raya Lucaria Academy.

sorceries.name: Great Glintstone Shard
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.The glintstone serves as a conduit, launching large magical projectiles at foes.This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion.Those unworthy of the stone crown typically end their brief journey into sorcery here.
sorceries.lore: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
sorceries.effect: Fires larger magic projectiles from glintstone
sorceries.location: Can be purchased for 2,000 Runes after you deliver the Academy Scroll to Miriel Pastor of Vows, Sorceress Sellen, or Preceptor Seluvis.

sorceries.name: Great Oracular Bubble
sorceries.description: Sorcery of the claymen who served as priests in the ancient dynasty. Produces a gigantic magical bubble that drifts towards foes before it naturally ruptures. Charging increases the delay before the bubble pops. The claymen search for lost oracles within their bubbles. Note:
sorceries.lore: Sorcery of the claymen who served as priests in the ancient dynasty.
sorceries.effect: Launches a large magic bubble
sorceries.location: Obtained by defeating the Teardrop Scarab found inside the large stone ruin at the highest level of the Siofra River. Map Link

sorceries.name: Greatblade Phalanx
sorceries.description: One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.Creates a defensive arch of larger magic glintblades overhead, which automatically attack nearby foes.Used by the enchanted troll knights.They were the comrades of the young Rennala, bound by oath. NOTE:
sorceries.lore: One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.
sorceries.effect: Forms a defensive arch of larger magic glintblades
sorceries.location: Cuckoo's Evergaol: Dropped by Bols, Carian Knight upon defeat.

sorceries.name: Loretta's Greatbow
sorceries.description: Sorcery used by Royal Knight Loretta.Creates a magic greatbow and fires a great arrow.Charging enhances potency. Hold to keep the great arrow nocked.It is said that the bow was Loretta's favored weapon. NOTE:
sorceries.lore: Sorcery used by Royal Knight Loretta.
sorceries.effect: Fires great arrow from a magic greatbow
sorceries.location: Caria Manor: Dropped by Royal Knight Loretta upon defeat. [Map Link]

sorceries.name: Loretta's Mastery
sorceries.description: Sorcery used by Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree. Creates a magic greatbow and fires four great arrows simultaneously. Charging enhances potency. Hold to keep the great arrows nocked. Developed by Loretta after her long, bloody journey to seek out a place where the Albinaurics could live in peace. NOTE:
sorceries.lore: Sorcery used by Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree.
sorceries.effect: Fires four great arrow from a magic greatbow at once
sorceries.location: Dropped by Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree upon defeat

sorceries.name: Lucidity
sorceries.description: One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family. Alleviates buildup of sleep and madness. This sorcery can be cast while in motion. The Carian knights never waver.
sorceries.effect: Alleviates buildup of sleep and madness
sorceries.location: Dropped by Preceptor Miriam in the secret area of the Carian Study Hall unlocked using the Carian Inverted Statue. Map Link

sorceries.name: Magic Downpour
sorceries.description: One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family. Summons a mass of magic that fires projectiles over a wide area.This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Charging extendsduration. Said to have been taught by the Crystalians to mark the swearingof the old concord. NOTE:
sorceries.lore: One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.
sorceries.effect: Summon a magic mass that sprays projectiles over area
sorceries.location: Dropped by Preceptor Miriam in the Carian Study Hall.

sorceries.name: Magic Glintblade
sorceries.description: An old sorcery of the Carian Royal Family. Creates a sigil overhead, from which an enemy-seeking glintblade appears after a brief delay. This sorcery can be used while in motion. Charging increases the delay. Said to be the prototype of the sword-phalanx sorceries wielded by royal enchanted knights. is Note:
sorceries.lore: An old sorcery of the Carian royal family.
sorceries.effect: Creates sigil that forms a projectile glintblade after delay
sorceries.location: Starting Equipment for the Prisoner ClassCan be purchased from Miriel, Pastor of Vows at the Church of Vows for 3,000 Runes.

sorceries.name: Magma Shot
sorceries.description: One of the sorceries developed from the magma of Mt. Gelmir. Fires a lump of magma that explodes on contact. Charging enhances potency. After discovering the ancient hexes of Gelmir, Rykard, son of Queen Rennala, brought them back into practical use as new forms of sorcery. NOTE:
sorceries.effect: Fires lump of magma that explodes on contact
sorceries.location: Rewarded by Tanith for completing Volcano Manor's first assassination quest. Map Link.

sorceries.name: Meteorite
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces. Summons a void that emits a rain of small meteorites.Hold to continue the effect. The sorcery originates from the Onyx Lords, who had skin of stone, and were called lords in reverential fear of their destructive power.
sorceries.effect: Calls small meteors down from the sky
sorceries.location: Royal Grave Evergaol: Dropped by the Alabaster Lord upon defeat.

sorceries.name: Meteorite of Astel
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces. Summons a void that emits a hail of meteorites. Hold to continue the effect. A manifestation of the power with which Astel leveled the Eternal City.
sorceries.lore: One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces.
sorceries.effect: Calls a hail of small meteorites from the void.
sorceries.location: Yelough Anix Tunnel: Dropped by the Astel, Stars of Darkness upon defeat.

sorceries.name: Night Comet
sorceries.description: One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery. Fires a semi-invisible magic comet.This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion. Charging enhances potency. The Sellian sorcerers were assassins, and it is said that they often hunted their fellows.
sorceries.lore: One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.
sorceries.effect: Fires a semi-invisible magic comet
sorceries.location: Found in Sellia, Town of Sorcery: Found in a chest in the central section of town. This location is initially sealed by a barrier that can be dispelled by lighting a brazier atop a tower in the southwest of town.

sorceries.name: Night Maiden's Mist
sorceries.description: One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery. Releases a life-sapping silver mist before the caster, dealingdamage to all caught within, including the caster.This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Below Sellia, the Eternal City of Nokron sleeps. This sorceryoriginates from the maiden of that place.
sorceries.lore: One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.
sorceries.effect: Releases life-sapping silver mist before caster
sorceries.location: Can be purchased from Gowry for 5,000 Runes after completing his quest line.

sorceries.name: Night Shard
sorceries.description: One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery. Swiftly fires a semi-invisible projectile. This sorcery can be used without delay after performing another action. The Sellian sorcerers were assassins, and it is said that they often hunted their fellows. NOTE:
sorceries.lore: One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.
sorceries.effect: Swiftly fires a semi-invisible magic projectile
sorceries.location: Can be purchased from Gowry for 4,000 Runes after completing his quest line.

sorceries.name: Oracle Bubbles
sorceries.description: Sorcery of the claymen who served as priests in the ancient dynasty. Produces several small magical bubbles that drift towards foes before they naturally pop. Charging increases the delay before the bubbles pop. The claymen search for lost oracles within their bubbles. Note:
sorceries.lore: Sorcery of the claymen who served as priests in the ancient dynasty.
sorceries.effect: Launches several small magic bubbles
sorceries.location: Can be found by killing one of the rolling beetles on top of a broken statue in the first structure on the right from the Siofra River Well Depths site of grace.

sorceries.name: Rancorcall
sorceries.description: Sorcery of the servants of Death. Summons vengeful spirits that chase down foes. Charging enhances potency. Once thought lost, this ancient death hex was rediscovered by the necromancer Garris. Notes:
sorceries.effect: Summons vengeful spirits that chase down foes
sorceries.location: Stormveil Castle: Dropped from a Teardrop Scarab that can be found at the underground crypt of the castle.

sorceries.name: Ranni's Dark Moon
sorceries.description: Legendary sorcery associated with the Carian queen. Uses the caster as a vessel to incarnate a cold, dark moon, then sends it floating toward foes. The dark moon dispels all sorcery that touches it, and temporarily reduces magic damage negation for those it strikes. This moon was encountered by a young Ranni, led by the hand of her mother, Rennala. What she beheld was cold, dark and veiled in occult mystery. NOTE:
sorceries.lore: Legendary sorcery associated with the Carian queen.
sorceries.effect: Incarnate a cold, dark moon and launch it at foes.
sorceries.location: Chelona's Rise: Found in a chest at the top of the tower after unlocking the seal. Follow Ranni the Witch questline to unlock this area.

sorceries.name: Rennala's Full Moon
sorceries.description: Sorcery associated with the Carian queen. Uses the caster as a vessel to incarnate a full moon, then sends it floating toward foes. The full moon dispels all sorcery that touches it, and temporarily reduces magic damage negation for those it strikes. Queen Rennala encountered this enchanting moon when she was young, and later, it would bewitch the academy. NOTE:
sorceries.lore: Sorcery associated with the Carian queen.
sorceries.effect: Incarnate a full moon and launch it at foes
sorceries.location: Obtained when unlocking the Remembrance of The Full Moon Queen's power by handing it over to Enia at Roundtable Hold.

sorceries.name: Rock Blaster
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Imbues the ferrule of the caster's staff with magic, then thrusts itinto the ground to create a massive magical shockwave. Hold to continue moving without striking the ground, and thenpush the end of the staff into enemies. An enhanced version of the glintstone miners' Stonediggersorcery.
sorceries.lore: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
sorceries.effect: Thrust staff into ground to emit a massive shockwave
sorceries.location: Sellia Crystal Tunnel: Found in a chest inside a storage shed in the upper levels of the main cavern.

sorceries.name: Rock Sling
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces. Pulls a clump of rocks from the earth and sends them flying. This sorcery can be cast while in motion. A gravitational technique studied by the young Radahn. His master was an Alabaster Lord with skin of stone.
sorceries.effect: Summons rocks from the earth and sends its flying
sorceries.location: Found in a chest in an underground cellar just north of the Street of Sages Ruins icon on the map. It is surrounded by poison mages, but otherwise is free to be picked up.

sorceries.name: Roiling Magma
sorceries.description: One of the sorceries developed from the magma of Mt. Gelmir.Fires a lump of condensed magma that explodes a short delay after hitting the target.Charging enhances potency and further delays the explosion.After discovering the ancient hexes of Gelmir, Rykard, son of Queen Rennala, brought them back into practical use as new forms of sorcery. NOTE:
sorceries.lore: One of the sorceries developed from the magma of Mt. Gelmir.
sorceries.effect: Fires lump of magma that explodes after delay
sorceries.location: Found on a corpse inside the Hermit's Shack in Mt. Gelmir.

sorceries.name: Rykard's Rancor
sorceries.description: The terrible power of Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy. Summons searing spirits that leave a trail of delayed explosions in their wake. These spirits manifest from the rancor of heroes who met a violent end. The lord granted them an audience, whereupon they were welcomed by the maw of the great serpent -- and within the serpent's bowels, they became the lord's kin. Note:
sorceries.lore: The terrible power of Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy.
sorceries.effect: Releases searing spirits that repeatedly explode after delay
sorceries.location: Obtained when unlocking the Remembrance of the Blasphemous power by handing it over to Enia at Roundtable Hold

sorceries.name: Scholar's Armament
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Enchants armaments held in the right hand with magic-affinity attacks.This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Taught to the Knights of the Cuckoo by the academy as payment for their contract.
sorceries.lore: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
sorceries.effect: Enchants right-hand armament with magic damage
sorceries.location: Can be purchased from Sorceress Sellen for 3,000 Runes. Sellen is located in Limgrave: Waypoint Ruins

sorceries.name: Scholar's Shield
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Enchants shield held in the left hand with additional damage negation.This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Taught to the Knights of the Cuckoo by the academy as payment for their contract.
sorceries.lore: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
sorceries.effect: Enhances left-hand shield damage negation
sorceries.location: Can be purchased from Sorceress Sellen for 2500 Runes. Sellen is located in Limgrave: Waypoint Ruins

sorceries.name: Shard Spiral
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Fires twin projectiles that form a spiral as they travel. This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion. Charging enhances potency. A sorcery of the Karolos Conspectus, the most venerable of the academy. This was the product of a failed attempt to create a new comet. NOTE: This was changed with Patch 1.07 as follows: The Attack Power was Increased.
sorceries.lore: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
sorceries.effect: Fire twin spiraling projectiles
sorceries.location: Available for purchase from the Sorcery Instruction of Sorceress Sellen for 8,000 Runes after progressing through her questline and choosing to side with her.

sorceries.name: Shatter Earth
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.Imbues the ferrule of the caster's staff with magic, then thrusts it into the ground to create a magical shockwave.Allows one follow-up attack.A Stonedigger sorcery used by the glintstone miners of the crystal tunnel. At the academy, use of this sorcery was a stigma that marked out failed scholars. Note:
sorceries.lore: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
sorceries.effect: Thrust staff into ground to emit a shockwave
sorceries.location: Found on a corpse in the second-to-last level of the Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel, inside an opening in the north. [Map Link]

sorceries.name: Shattering Crystal
sorceries.description: Sorcery of the mysterious Crystalians.Creates a mass of crystal, then shatters it in a forward burst.Charging enhances potency.The Crystalians are inorganic beings, yet they live. They cleave close to the ideals of the primeval current, and as such, they are revered guests of the sorcerers.
sorceries.lore: Sorcery of the mysterious Crystalians.
sorceries.effect: Creates crystal mass that shatters in forward burst
sorceries.location: Looted off a corpse on the second floor, west side, of the Church of the Cuckoo in Raya Lucaria Academy. The only way to reach this is going through the broken glass window of the church via the rooftops. [Map Coordinates]

sorceries.name: Star Shower
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.Fires six magic shooting stars that pursue the target.This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Charging enhances potency.The most difficult to master of the Olivinus Conspectus sorceries.
sorceries.lore: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
sorceries.effect: Fires six shooting stars that pursue foes
sorceries.location: Can be purchased for 10,000 Runes after you deliver the Conspectus Scroll to Miriel Pastor of Vows, Sorceress Sellen, or Preceptor Seluvis.

sorceries.name: Starlight
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Creates a small, floating star light that illuminates surroundings. This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Granted to sorcerers who depart from the academy to embark on journeys. Even during the blackest nights, sojourns underground, or imprisonment in gaol, the stars are never far from a sorcerer's side. Note:
sorceries.effect: Creates star light to illuminate surroundings
sorceries.location: Starlight can be learned from Thops at the Church of Irith.

sorceries.name: Stars of Ruin
sorceries.description: Legendary sorcery devised by Lusat, primeval sorcerers. Fires twelve dark shooting stars that pursue the target. This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Charging increases potency. When Lusat glimpsed into the primeval current, he beheld the final moments of a great star cluster, and upon seeing it, he too was broken.
sorceries.lore: Legendary sorcery devised by Lusat, primeval sorcerers.
sorceries.effect: Fire twelve dark shooting stars that pursue foes
sorceries.location: Given by Primeval Sorcerer Lusat in Sellia Hideaway. You must follow Sorceress Sellen questline to unlock this NPC.

sorceries.name: Swift Glintstone Shard
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.The glintstone serves as a conduit, launching swift magical projectiles at foes.This sorcery can be used without delay after performing another action.Those unworthy of the stone crown typically end their brief journey into sorcery here.
sorceries.lore: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
sorceries.effect: Swiftly fires magic projectiles from glintstone
sorceries.location: Can be purchased for 600 Runes after you deliver the Academy Scroll to Miriel Pastor of Vows, Sorceress Sellen, or Preceptor Seluvis.

sorceries.name: Terra Magica
sorceries.description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Draws an academy sigil upon the ground, raising the magic strength of those within. Once, the sigil would be cast from the highest belfry of the academy, covering the entire institution's grounds. This spell allows such vivid experience of spellcasting success, it turns many a fledgling into a true sorcerer in a flash of newfound understanding. Note:
sorceries.effect: Raises the magic strength of those within the sigil
sorceries.location: Take the elevator behind the Crystalians and climb the stairs, to find it inside a chest.

sorceries.name: Thops's Barrier
sorceries.description: This is the page for the sorcery: Thop's Barrier. Click here for the Ash of War: Thops's Barrier. The lifelong pursuit of Thops the Bluntstone. Creates a magic forcefield that deflects sorceries and incantations.Hold to continuously create barriers. Future generations will learn. They will know the foolishness ofthe sneering sorcerers who ridiculed this theory, little realizingthat it was in fact a discovery worthy of a new conspectus of the academy.
sorceries.lore: Skill: Thops's Barrier
sorceries.effect: Erect a magic forcefield to deflect spells
sorceries.location: Looted from Thops's body.You must give him the Academy Glintstone Key first.Once he has it, fast travel to the Schoolhouse Classroom site of grace of Raya Lucaria Academy, you'll find him dead outside the room. Go outside and turn right, you'll find him, sitting in a chair. Map Link.

sorceries.name: Tibia's Summons
sorceries.description: Sorcery of the servants of Death.Summons a group of Those Lost in Death.Three skeletons will appear some distance from the caster and attack foes before disappearing.The dead have long been left to wander; what they need is leadership. Note:
sorceries.lore: Sorcery of the servants of Death.
sorceries.effect: Summons Those Who Live in Death
sorceries.location: Drops from Tibia Mariner located in Wyndham Ruins. Map Link

sorceries.name: Unseen Blade
sorceries.description: One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery. Enchants armament held in right hand, making it completely invisible.This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Used by Sellian assassins to present themselves as unarmed sorcerers. NOTE:
sorceries.lore: One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.
sorceries.effect: Makes right-hand armament completely invisible
sorceries.location: This sorcery can be found at the top of the Tower after completing the Mirage Rise puzzle.

sorceries.name: Unseen Form
sorceries.description: One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery. Makes the caster semi-invisible. While on horseback, effect extends to cover the mount. This sorcery can be cast while in motion.The Sellian assassins considered every option that aided their dirty work.
sorceries.lore: One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.
sorceries.effect: Makes the caster semi-invisible
sorceries.location: This sorcery can be found at the top of the Tower after completing the Mirage Rise puzzle.

sorceries.name: Zamor Ice Storm
sorceries.description: Ice sorcery of the Town of Zamor. Strike the ground with the staff to create a freezing tornado. Charging enhances potency. Cloaked in icy tempests, the knights of Zamor have challenged the Fire Giants since ancient times.
sorceries.lore: Ice sorcery of the Town of Zamor.
sorceries.effect: Thrust staff into ground to create freezing tornado
sorceries.location: Found in Zamor Ruins

incantations.name: Furious Blade of Ansbach
incantations.description: Incantation of Ansbach, Pureblood Knight. Produces a bloodflame blade from the side of the hand, then lunges at enemies to cleave through them. Charge to increase the number of slashes. Markedly different from the finessed swordplay of the dynast, this is an aggressive last resort of an incantation that gave rise to Ansbach's fearsome reputation.
incantations.lore: Incantation of Ansbach, Pureblood Knight.
incantations.effect: Cleaves through enemies with bloodflame blade summoned from side of the hand
incantations.location: Complete Sir Ansbach's questline all the way through the end, and side with him when facing Leda, and then Promised Consort Radahn/ Radahn, Consort of Miquella. After the fight is over, Sir Ansbach's body will be near the site of grace, alongside with his equipment and this Incantation. [Map Link]

incantations.name: Heal from Afar
incantations.description: An Erdtree incantation discovered in the realm of shadow. Fires a projectile toward distant allies that greatly restores HP on contact. Even when far beyond, far out of sight, the Erdtree will surely give us its blessing.
incantations.effect: Greatly heals HP for distant allies the spell reaches
incantations.location: This spell can be looted on the ground by the foot of an underground golden tree. It is located in a cave path to the base of the Rauh Ruins, north-northeast of the Moorth Ruins in Scadu Atlus. [Map Link]

incantations.name: Aspects of the Crucible: Thorns
incantations.description: Aspect of the Crucible that manifested in golden hippopotami. Creates a bristling mass of thorn-like fur on the caster's back before scouring the area by rolling around on the ground. Charging increases potency. In an age long past, before this land was enshrouded in shadow, the vitality of the Crucible flourished. Remains of this can be seen in the ancient ruins.
incantations.lore: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
incantations.effect: Creates a mass of bristling thorns on back to scour the area
incantations.location: Dropped by the Golden Hippopotamus by going up the elevator in the Shadow Keep Main Gate. [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

incantations.name: Aspects of the Crucible: Bloom
incantations.description: Aspect of the Crucible discovered in the ancient ruins. Creates a miranda flower on one's chest before calling down a rain of light. Charging increases potency. In an age long past, before this land was enshrouded in shadow, the vitality of the Crucible flourished.
incantations.lore: Aspect of the Crucible discovered in the ancient ruins.
incantations.effect: Creates a miranda flower on chest to summon rain of light
incantations.location: Can be found on a corpse near the Giant Miranda Sprout near the Ravine North Site of Grace [Map Link]

incantations.name: Minor Erdtree
incantations.description: Secret incantation of Queen Marika. Only the kindness of gold, without Order. Creates a small, illusory Erdtree that continuously restores the HP of nearby allies. Marika bathed the village of her home in gold, knowing full well that there was no one to heal.
incantations.effect: Continuously heals allies in the area
incantations.location: Located at the Shaman Village in the Scaduview region. The spell can be found in the field of flowers.[Map Link]

incantations.name: Land of Shadow (Incantation)
incantations.description: Incantation originating from Scadutree avatars. Creates a hail of golden projectiles which are fired toward foes after a brief delay. This incantation channels the force of the Scadutree's power, and its gold is accompanied by shadow.
incantations.effect: Fires a hail of golden projectiles toward foes
incantations.location: Can be selected as one of the possible rewards when tradingRemembrance of the Shadow Sunflower with Enia at the Roundtable Hold.

incantations.name: Wrath from Afar
incantations.description: An Erdtree incantation discovered in the realm of shadow. Fires a golden shockwave that knocks back nearby foes. Charging increases the size of the shockwave. When the Elden Ring was shattered, the people of the realm of shadow felt it tooand feared it as a sign of the Erdtree's wrath.
incantations.lore: An Erdtree incantation discovered in the realm of shadow.
incantations.effect: Fires a golden shockwave that knocks back foes
incantations.location: Take the elevator at the Storehouse, Loft site of grace in Shadow Keep. Once you are on the upper level, turn left, and turn left again. As soon as you can turn right. Beware of the bat hanging from the ceiling. Reach the other side, and take the ladder up. Turn left and move towards the area in which there is a giant gear (the one that does not have a bat on it), once you are aligned fall down to find the spell behind the column. [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Map Link]

incantations.name: Light of Miquella
incantations.description: The strength of Miquella upon his deific return, wielded as an incantation. Annihilates foes with a pillar of light. Miquella sought to accept all that was and would be, but found one that refused to be embraced. No wonder, as one god, and one king consort, is all the world needs.
incantations.lore: The strength of Miquella upon his deific return, wielded as an incantation.
incantations.effect: Annihilates foes with a pillar of light
incantations.location: Location goes here...

incantations.name: Multilayered Ring of Light
incantations.description: Incantation of those who served Miquella. Produces a multilayered ring of golden light and fires it forwards, inflicting continuous damage on those struck by it. Charging increases potency. This light-ring incantation was cultivated by a tradition separate from Golden Order fundamentalism.
incantations.lore: Incantation of those who served Miquella.
incantations.effect: Fires a multilayered golden ring of light that continuously inflicts damage
incantations.location: Location goes here...

incantations.name: Roar of Rugalea
incantations.description: An incantation of what is jokingly called "the bear communion." Channels the power of Rugalea, the great red bear. Transform oneself into a great red bear and emit a mighty roar. Charging increases potency. An incantation that is more akin to the divine invocation of the hornsent than it is to the Dragon Communion. Only through desperate battle with the feral wild can one discover a god unique to oneself.
incantations.lore:
An incantation of what is jokingly called "the bear communion."
Channels the power of Rugalea, the great red bear.
incantations.effect: Channels great red bear to emit a furious roar
incantations.location: Dropped by a large bear northwest of the Ravine North Site of Grace, in the wooded area where there are many large bears. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

incantations.name: Knight's Lightning Spear
incantations.description: One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult. Summons a lightning spear while also manifesting ancient dragon crests. On throwing the spear, the crests will launch additional spears. Charge to increase the number of crests. An incantation that was taught only to the most accomplished knights, and now a lost art in the Lands Between.
incantations.lore: One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
incantations.effect: Hurls lightning spear while firing additional spears from ancient dragon crests
incantations.location: Scorpion River Catacombs: In the big hall with the set of eyes that inflict deathblight upon you, there is a ledge on the right side which lets you cross to the other side. Run across the ledge while hugging the wall and then go inside the opening behind the set of eyes. You can find the incantation in the room directly in front of you.

incantations.name: Dragonbolt of Florissax
incantations.description: Special incantation of the ancient dragon Florissax. Calls down red lightning to bolster the caster and nearby allies. While enrobed with red lightning, all forms of damage negation (including physical) are increased. This also increases damage negation while guarding as an additional effect. There was a time when the priestess never knew love, and thus never used this incantation herself.
incantations.lore: Special incantation of the ancient dragon Florissax.
incantations.effect: Calls down red lightning to bolster self and nearby allies
incantations.location: Location goes here...

incantations.name: Electrocharge
incantations.description: One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult. Calls down lightning to charge the caster's body. While charged, electric shocks will strike the area several times. Charging increases potency. The origin of incantations that bolster the body with lightning, and now a lost art in the Lands Between.
incantations.effect: Calls down lightning to charge body with electricity
incantations.location: Location goes here...

incantations.name: Bayle's Tyranny
incantations.description: One of the greatest Dragon Communion incantations. Harnesses the fearsome power of Bayle the Dread. Channels the form of the dread dragon to emit a mighty roar accompanied by a heatwave burst, causing violent eruptions of fire in the area. Even after being consumed, the throbbing heart of Bayle continues to resist its subjugation, never weakening. One day, the fire within will consume the very body and soul of its Communion devourer. One day.
incantations.lore:
One of the greatest Dragon Communion incantations.
Harnesses the fearsome power of Bayle the Dread.
incantations.effect: Channels dread dragon to roar with a heatwave blast
incantations.location: Heart of Bayle can be used to at the Grand Altar of Dragon Communion to trade for Bayle's Flame Lightning or Bayle's Tyranny. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

incantations.name: Bayle's Flame Lightning
incantations.description: One of the greatest Dragon Communion incantations. Harnesses the fearsome power of Bayle the Dread. Channels the form of the dread dragon in right arm to smash foes with an exposed talon bone coursing with flame lightning. Even after being consumed, the throbbing heart of Bayle continues to resist its subjugation, never weakening. One day, the fire within will consume the very body and soul of its Communion devourer. One day.
incantations.lore:
One of the greatest Dragon Communion incantations.
Harnesses the fearsome power of Bayle the Dread.
incantations.effect: Channels dread dragon to strike with flame-lightning-infused talon bone
incantations.location: Heart of Bayle can be used to at the Grand Altar of Dragon Communion to trade for Bayle's Flame Lightning or Bayle's Tyranny. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

incantations.name: Ghostflame Breath
incantations.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion. Transforms caster into a dragon to spew ghostflame breath. Charging extends duration. The land of spiritgraves is home to all manner of dead, and even the corpses of fallen dragons found their way there. Several of them were endowed with such vivacity that even in death, they could not fully die.
incantations.lore: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
incantations.effect: Channels dragon to spew ghostflame breath
incantations.location: Location goes here...

incantations.name: Rotten Butterflies
incantations.description: Incantation used by Romina, Saint of the Bud. Summons a myriad of butterflies while performing a gentle twirl. The butterflies break apart on contact, scattering rot and setting off a chain reaction. The scarlet butterflies are as the Goddess of Rot's wings. Bereft of a master, they were soothed by Romina, who reached out to them.
incantations.lore: Incantation used by Romina, Saint of the Bud.
incantations.effect: Summons countless butterflies to scatter rot
incantations.location: Can be selected as one of the possible rewards when trading Remembrance of the Saint of the Bud with Enia at the Roundtable Hold.

incantations.name: Pest-Thread Spears
incantations.description: Skill of the pests known as the Kindred of Rot, now wielded as an incantation. Secrete numerous sticky threads, then twist them into two spears launched frontwards. Charge to enhance potency. The pests are abandoned servants, and it is for this reason that they found a mother in the Saint of the Bud.
incantations.lore: Skill of the pests known as the Kindred of Rot, now wielded as an incantation.
incantations.effect: Secrete sticky threads and twist them into two frontward flying spears
incantations.location: From the Church of the Bud, Main Enterance grace, go North back into the cave and down the stairs, then take a right or left (it doesn't matter) and head behind the stairs, the incantation will be directly behind, guarded by one enemy. [Map Link] [Video Link]

incantations.name: Midra's Flame of Frenzy
incantations.description: Incantation in praise of Midra, Lord of Frenzied Flame. Summons an apparition of the Lord's head to spew frenzied flame. This incantation can be used while in motion. The apparition will remain for as long as the input is held. The Lord of Frenzied Flame shall take their torment, despair. Their affliction. Every sin, every curse. All melted away. Yet Midra, like others before him, was too weak to become a Lord.
incantations.lore: Incantation in praise of Midra, Lord of Frenzied Flame.
incantations.effect: Summons Lord of Frenzied Flame's head to spew frenzied flame
incantations.location: Can be selected as one of the possible rewards when trading Remembrance of the Lord of Frenzied Flame with Enia at the Roundtable Hold.

incantations.name: Divine Beast Tornado
incantations.description: The tempest of the Dancing Lion, wielded as an incantation. A whirlwind-like twist of the body summons a storm, launching a tornado forward. Charging enhances potency. The majority of divine beasts were gored and hung upon Messmer's spears, then burned in his flame. Those who witnessed the deed likened it to a funeral pyre for the tower itself.
incantations.lore: The tempest of the Dancing Lion, wielded as an incantation.
incantations.effect: Summons a storm that launches a tornado forward
incantations.location: The Divine Beast Dancing Lion of the North East from the Temple Town Ruins Site of Grace drops this incantation upon defeat. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

incantations.name: Divine Bird Feathers
incantations.description: A technique of the divine bird warriors, the very first of all horned warriors, wielded as an incantation. Spread the arms wide like wings to release a flurry of feathers. This incantation can be cast while in motion. Hold to continue releasing feathers. The divine bird warriors, and indeed this technique, are said to bear resemblance to the golden Crucible.
incantations.lore: A technique of the divine bird warriors, the very first of all horned warriors, wielded as an incantation.
incantations.effect: Spreads arms like wings and releases a flurry of feathers
incantations.location: Location goes here...

incantations.name: Fire Serpent
incantations.description: Incantation of the Fire Knights under Messmer the Impaler's personal command. Launch a serpentine flame that bends and curls in pursuit of its foe. Charging enhances potency. When the flame they received from Messmer would not find purchase within them, the Fire Knights relied on fire incantations to honor their bond.
incantations.effect: Launches a threaded serpentine flame
incantations.location: Shadow Keep: From the Storehouse site of grace, find the ladder and climb it up, pass the enemies, and move forward until you reach the balcony. You will find the item there. [Map Link]

incantations.name: Rain of Fire
incantations.description: Incantation of Salza, sage of the Fire Knights. Summons a cloud of flame overhead that rains fire for a short time. Charging increases potency. Salza's disdain for barbarism never waned, even as he burned more villages and scorched more land than any other.
incantations.effect: Rains fire for a short duration
incantations.location: From the West Rampart Site of Grace, take the bridge all the way. Use Torrent to avoid being trapped in the Rain of Fire. Defeat the Fire Knight at the end to obtain this and Salza's Hood. [Map Link]

incantations.name: Messmer's Orb
incantations.description: An incantation of Messmer the Impaler. Summons Messmer's flame to form a giant floating orb. The orb soars toward a foe, crashes into the earth, and explodes after a brief delay. Charging enhances potency. Messmer despised his own fire. Time and time again he hoped to rid himself of it, but ever did it burn.
incantations.effect: Shapes Messmer's flame into a giant orb that soars at foe
incantations.location: Can be selected as one of the possible rewards when trading Remembrance of the Impaler with Enia at the Roundtable Hold

incantations.name: Watchful Spirit
incantations.description: An entreaty received from the Empyrean grandam. Summon a guardian spirit above the caster's head. The spirit never strays far from the caster, conjuring several apparitions before dissipating. "Take vengeance upon Messmer and his lot. They who betrayed us, aye, they who burned us... Let them face in thy wrath their just deserts."
incantations.lore: An entreaty received from the Empyrean grandam.
incantations.effect: Summons a guardian spirit above the caster's head
incantations.location: Given by Hornsent Grandam after defeating the Divine Beast Dancing Lion. Talk to her twice with the Divine Beast Head equipped, to receive this incantation. [Map Link]

incantations.name: Golden Arcs
incantations.description: Sorcery of the inquisitors of the tower, wielded as an incantation of the spiral. A swing of the arm releases a procession of golden arcs. Charging enhances potency. The arcs resemble barbs, a known symbol of coercive questioning.
incantations.effect: Releases a procession of golden arcs with a swing of the arm
incantations.location: Head southeast of Moorth Ruins. From the Shattered Stone Talisman chest, drop down to the nearest platform and continue descending until you reach the ground where three Inquisitors are situated. Defeat them and enter the small building nearby to find this item inside a chest. [Map Link]

incantations.name: Giant Golden Arc
incantations.description: Sorcery of the inquisitors of the tower, wielded as an incantation of the spiral. A swing of the arm releases a giant golden arc. Charging enhances potency. The arc resembles the barb, a known symbol of coercive questioning.
incantations.lore: Sorcery of the inquisitors of the tower, wielded as an incantation of the spiral.
incantations.effect: Releases a giant golden arc with a swing of the arm
incantations.location: Obtained by looting a chest in the Ruins of Unte. The chest is inside a building in a flower area that is only accessible after using a Hefty Furnace Pot and throwing it at the head of the deactivated Furnace Golem that blocks the entrance so that it moves away. [Elden Ring Map]

incantations.name: Spira
incantations.description: Superior sorcery of the tower priests, wielded as an incantation of the spiral. Wrap one's arms together and hold them up to the heavens to summon a spiral of light that erupts at the enemy's feet. Column of light persists for as long as the button is pressed. The spiral is a normalized Crucible current that, one day, will form a column that stretches to the gods.
incantations.effect: Summons a spiral of light that erupts at the enemy's feet
incantations.location: Past the impenetrable thorns at the end of Belurat, Tower Settlement. It would be on a small altar that is directly in front of statue. [Map Link]

incantations.name: Agheel's Flame
incantations.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion.Channels the power of the flying dragon Agheel. Transforms caster into a dragon to spew flaming breath from above.Charging extends duration. This incantation can be used while jumping. The dead gazed at the skies over the lakes of Limgrave, praying that the dragons' flames would burn them to ash.
incantations.lore:
Superior incantation of Dragon Communion.
Channels the power of the flying dragon Agheel.
incantations.effect: Spews flame breath of Agheel from above
incantations.location: Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion in Caelid for 2 Dragon Hearts. Players need to defeat Flying Dragon Agheel in order to unlock this Incantation.

incantations.name: Ancient Dragons' Lightning Spear
incantations.description: A secret incantation of the capital's ancient dragon cult. Creates a spear of red lightning and stabs it into the ground from above. On impact, the spear will burst into trails of lightning covering the area. Spoken of in legend, red lightning is the weapon wielded by the ancient dragons. Note:
incantations.lore: A secret incantation of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
incantations.effect: Stabs with red lightning spear from above
incantations.location: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Ancient Dragon Prayerbook for 8,500 Runes.

incantations.name: Ancient Dragons' Lightning Strike
incantations.description: A secret incantation of the capital's ancient dragon cult. Summons a red bolt of lightning that scatters and spreads around the surrounding area. Charging enhances the range of the lightning bolt. Spoken of in legend, red lightning is the weapon wielded by the ancient dragons.
incantations.lore: A secret incantation of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
incantations.effect: Summons red lightning that spreads from impact
incantations.location: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Ancient Dragon Prayerbook for 10,000 Runes.

incantations.name: Aspects of the Crucible: Breath
incantations.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations. Creates a throat pouch on the caster's neck, allowing them to spew fiery breath while walking. Charging increases duration of the breath. This is a manifestation of the Erdtree's primal vital energies - an Aspects of the primordial crucible, where all life was once blended together.
incantations.lore: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
incantations.effect: Creates throat pouch to spew fire while walking
incantations.location: Obtained from Tanith's Crucible Knight invasion after attacking Tanith inside Rykard's boss room.

incantations.name: Aspects of the Crucible: Horns
incantations.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations. Creates a mighty horn on the caster's shoulder to gore foes from a low stance. Charging allows the caster to barrel into foes before delivering the final attack. This is a manifestation of the Erdtree's primal vital energies - an aspect of the primordial crucible, where all life was once blended together. NOTE:
incantations.lore: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
incantations.effect: Creates shoulder horn to gore foes form low stance
incantations.location: Obtained by defeating Crucible Knight in Stormveil Castle. To reach the Knight you must drop down a series of ledges to the left, outside of Rampart Tower grace.

incantations.name: Aspects of the Crucible: Tail
incantations.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations. Creates a supple tail that sweeps through foes before the caster.Charging enhances potency. This is a manifestation of the Erdtree's primal vital energies - anaspect of the primordial crucible, where all life was once blendedtogether. NOTE:
incantations.lore: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
incantations.effect: Creates supple tail to sweep area before caster
incantations.location: Obtained by defeating Crucible Knight at the Stormhill Evergaol

incantations.name: Assassin's Approach
incantations.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' servants, who once served as the assassins of the Roundtable Hold. Completely silences the footsteps of the caster. Additionally, reduces fall damage and the sound produced by falling. This incantation can be cast while in motion or crouching. The assassins were charged with eliminating Tarnished who had strayed from guidance. NOTE:
incantations.lore: Incantation of the Two Fingers' servants, who once served as the assassins of the Roundtable Hold.
incantations.effect: Silences footsteps, reduces fall damage/ sound
incantations.location: Starting Incantation for the Confessor ClassPurchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Assassin's Prayerbook for 2,000 Runes.

incantations.name: Barrier of Gold
incantations.description: One of the incantations of Erdtree Worship. Greatly increases magic damage negation for the caster and nearby allies. Hold to continue praying and delay activation. This incantation was used by the champions of the Erdtree in the First and the Second Liurnian Wars, during which the red-haired Radagon joined the heroes' ranks
incantations.lore: One of the incantations of Erdtree Worship.
incantations.effect: Greatly increases magic damage negation for self& allies
incantations.location: Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab in Leyndell, Royal Capital, near where you fight Godfrey, First Elden Lord (Golden Shade). Can be found after heading down the stairs and taking the elevator, right after the fight with Godfrey, First Elden Lord. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

incantations.name: Beast Claw
incantations.description: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman. Creates beast claws that rend the land with shockwaves.Charging enhances potency. This incantation represents the fury of Gurranq, his bestial nature returned, as much as it does his restless agitation. Notes:
incantations.effect: Creates claws that tear through the land.
incantations.location: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the fifth Deathroot. Map Link.

incantations.name: Bestial Constitution
incantations.description: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman. Fills the body with bestial vigor, alleviating buildup of frost and blood loss. Having gained intelligence, the beasts must have felt how their wildness slipped away as civilization took hold.
incantations.lore: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
incantations.effect: Alleviates blood loss and frost buildup
incantations.location: Found by killing a golden scarab along the cliffside North East of the Minor Erdtree in Caelid, close to the bridge to the Bestial Sanctum.

incantations.name: Bestial Sling
incantations.description: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.Swiftly flings a number of sharp rock shards.This incantation can be cast without delay after performing another action. It is said that in the time before the Erdtree, stones were the firstweapons of the beasts who had gained intelligence. deals x% of your incant scaling in damage (INFORMATION NEEDED)
incantations.lore: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
incantations.effect: Swiftly flings numerous sharp rock shards
incantations.location: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the first Deathroot.

incantations.name: Bestial Vitality
incantations.description: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman. Fills the body with bestial vigor, restoring HP over a period of time. Having gained intelligence, the beasts must have felt how their wildness slipped away as civilization took hold. cost
incantations.lore: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
incantations.effect: Heals HP over a period of time
incantations.location: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the third Deathroot

incantations.name: Black Blade
incantations.description: Power gleaned from the remembrance of Maliketh. Caster creates an illusory black blade, then leaps forward to deliver a spinning slash that emits a wave of light. This can be followed up with one additional attack. This blade was once imbued with Destined Death. In addition to dealing damage, it reduces foes' maximum HP and continues to sap their current HP for a very short time.
incantations.lore: Power gleaned from the remembrance of Maliketh.
incantations.effect: Black blade spinning slash that emits wave of light
incantations.location: Trade Remembrance of the Black Blade with Enia at Roundtable Hold.

incantations.name: Black Flame
incantations.description: A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles. Throws a ball of raging black fire. Charging enhances potency and causes the fireball to explode. Black flame is weighty. After dealing damage it continues to sap foes' HP for a very short time. NOTE:
incantations.lore: A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.
incantations.effect: Throws a ball of raging black fire
incantations.location: This incantation is unlocked for purchase after giving a Godskin Prayerbook to Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows for 7,500 Runes.

incantations.name: Black Flame Blade
incantations.description: A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles. Engulfs armament held in the right hand with black flame. This incantation can be cast without delay after performing another action. Black flame is weighty. After dealing damage it continues to sap foes' HP for a very short time.
incantations.lore: A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.
incantations.effect: Enchants right-hand armament with black flame
incantations.location: This incantation is unlocked for purchase after giving a Godskin Prayerbook to Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows for 6,00 Runes.

incantations.name: Black Flame Ritual
incantations.description: Superior black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles. Summons a circle of black flame pillars around the caster. Charging increases the size of the circle. The Gloam-Eyed Queen led the apostles. It is said that she was an Empyrean chosen by the Fingers.
incantations.lore: Superior black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.
incantations.effect: Summons circle of black flame pillars around caster.
incantations.location: Dropped by Godskin Apostle and Godskin Noble boss fight in Spiritcaller's Cave.

incantations.name: Black Flame's Protection
incantations.description: A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles. Summons black fire within, increasing physical damage negation. However, sacred flasks and other such forms of HP restoration are impaired. The Apostles were all embraced by the Gloam-Eyed Queen, and the black flame was their armor within.
incantations.lore: A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.
incantations.effect: Increases physical damage negation
incantations.location: Received from Gideon Ofnir, after reaching Miquella's Haligtree.Purchasable at Twin Maiden Husks after defeating Maliketh, the Black Blade.

incantations.name: Blessing of the Erdtree
incantations.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations Grants a greater blessing to the caster and nearby allies, gradually restoring a large amount of HP.Hold to continue praying and delay activation. The Erdtree once flourished with abundance- yet it was only for a fleeting moment. Such is the course of all life.
incantations.lore: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
incantations.effect: Grants greater blessing to self and nearby allies
incantations.location: Found at Queens Bedchamber in Leyndell Royal Capital. [Map Link]

incantations.name: Blessing's Boon
incantations.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations. Grants a blessing to the caster and nearby allies, gradually restoring HP.Hold to continue praying and delay activation. Blessings once fell like tears from the Erdtree, and this incantation is but a lingering remnant of their power.
incantations.lore: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
incantations.effect: Grants blessing to self and nearby allies
incantations.location: Can be purchased from Miriel, Pastor of Vows at the Church of Vows for 4,000 Runes.

incantations.name: Bloodboon
incantations.description: Sacred incantation of Mohg, Lord of Blood. Thrust arm into the body of the Formless Mother, then scatter the bloodflame to set the area ablaze. This incantation can be cast while in motion. The mother of truth craves wounds. When Mohg stood before her, deep underground, his accursed blood erupted with fire, and besotted with the defilement that he was born into. NOTE:
incantations.effect: Scatters bloodflame before caster to set area aflame.
incantations.location: Trade Remembrance of the Blood Lord with Enia at Roundtable Hold.

incantations.name: Bloodflame Blade
incantations.description: A Blood Oath incantation, granted by the Lord of Blood. Engulfs armament held in the right hand with bloodflame.This incantation can be cast while in motion. After dealing damage, bloodflame continues to build up onset of blood loss for a very short time.
incantations.lore: A Blood Oath incantation, granted by the Lord of Blood.
incantations.effect: Enchants right-hand armament with bloodflame
incantations.location: Liurnia of the Lakes: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the marshes near the Rose Church, southwest of the lake. [Map Link] (Note that there is another scarab in this area that does not drop anything)

incantations.name: Bloodflame Talons
incantations.description: A Blood Oath incantation, granted by the Lord of Blood. Creates bloodflame lacerations before the caster, which explode in an instant. This incantation can be cast repeatedly. After dealing damage, bloodflame continues to build up onset of blood loss for a very short time. will NOTE:
incantations.lore: A Blood Oath incantation, granted by the Lord of Blood.
incantations.effect: Creates bloodflame lacerations that then explode
incantations.location: Dropped by Mohg. the Omen in Forsaken Depths under the Capital.

incantations.name: Borealis's Mist
incantations.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power of Borealis, the Freezing Fog. Transforms caster into a dragon to spew icy breath from above. Charging extends the duration. This incantation can be cast while jumping. The ice dragons were once lords of the mountaintops long ago, until they were defeated by the Fire Giants and chased from the peak.
incantations.lore:
Superior incantation of Dragon Communion.
Channels the power of Borealis, the Freezing Fog.
incantations.effect: Spews icy breath of Borealis from above
incantations.location: Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion. Players need to defeat Borealis the Freezing Fog in order to unlock this Incantation.

incantations.name: Burn, O Flame!
incantations.description: One of the incantations that draws directly from the power of the Fire Giants. Raises a series of flame pillars around the caster. Charging further increases the number of flame pillars. The Fire Giants borrowed from the power of a fell god, and still they were defeated. Yet their failure released them from their solitary curse: to serve as keepers of the Flame for eternity. Note:
incantations.lore: One of the incantations that draws directly from the power of the Fire Giants.
incantations.effect: Raises a series of flame pillars around caster
incantations.location: Trade Remembrance of the Fire Giant with Enia at Roundtable Hold.

incantations.name: Catch Flame
incantations.description: Incantation originating from a sinister prophecy. Momentarily sparks flame from the caster's hand. This incantation can be cast without delay after performing another action. The flame of ruin is anathema to the Erdtree. But prophets sometimes glimpse it within the faith all the same. Sadly when this occurs their sole reward is banishment.
incantations.lore: Incantation originating from a sinister prophecy.
incantations.effect: Momentarily sparks flame from hand
incantations.location: Starting equipment for the Prophet ClassPurchase from Brother Corhyn.

incantations.name: Cure Poison
incantations.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful. Alleviates poison buildup and cures poison. This incantation can be cast while in motion. The Two Fingers has high hopes for the Tarnished; that even if they should be wounded, even should they fall, they will continue to fight for their duty.
incantations.lore: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
incantations.effect: Cures poison ailment and reduces poison build-up.
incantations.location: Sold by Brother Corhyn at the Roundtable Hold for 1,000 Runes.

incantations.name: Darkness
incantations.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' servants, who once served as the assassins of the Roundtable Hold. Creates a veil of darkness that conceals the caster.This incantation can be cast while in motion or crouching. The assassins were themselves once Tarnished who had strayed from guidance, and they pursued their duty in the darkness that is without grace. Note:
incantations.effect: Creates area of darkness that conceals caster
incantations.location: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Assassin's Prayerbook for 3,500 Runes.

incantations.name: Death Lightning
incantations.description: Incantation that channels the power of the ancient dragon Fortissax, now corrupted by Death. Strikes surroundings with a storm of Death lightning. Inflicts Death blight upon foes. Charging extends duration of the storm. It is said that this golden lightning was wielded by Godwyn, who befriended Fortissax. NOTE:
incantations.lore: Incantation that channels the power of the ancient dragon Fortissax, now corrupted by Death.
incantations.effect: Strikes surroundings with storm of death lightning
incantations.location: Trade Remembrance of the Lichdragon with Enia at Roundtable Hold.

incantations.name: Discus of Light
incantations.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists. Produces a ring of light and fires it forwards. The ring of light returns to a position close to the caster before disappearing. This incantation can be cast repeatedly. A gift from the young Miquella to his father, Radagon. Note: Updated to patch 1.07. See Patch Notes for details. used on larger enemies used while on horseback
incantations.lore: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
incantations.effect: Fires ring of light before the caster
incantations.location: Purchase from Brother Corhyn for 11,000 Runes after he moves to Goldmask's location at Altus Plateau.

incantations.name: Divine Fortification
incantations.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful. Increases holy damage negation.This incantation can be cast while in motion. Follow the path that has been set for you, and you will make enemies of all others: the monks, the sorcerers, the ancient dragon knights and the scions of gold. Heed me the Lands Between offers no welcome to the Tarnished.
incantations.lore: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
incantations.effect: Increases holy damage negation
incantations.location: Weeping Peninsula: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab atop a collapsed stone structure overgrown with yellow moss. This structure is found a short distance southwest of the Tombsward Ruins.

incantations.name: Dragonbolt Blessing
incantations.description: Superior incantation of the capital's ancient dragon cult. Summons lightning to bolster the caster's body. Attacks become easier to deflect and resistance to all ailments is increased. However, lightning damage negation will be reduced. Only those loved by dragons can survive the ordeal of cladding their bodies in lightning.
incantations.lore: Superior incantation of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
incantations.effect: Bolsters caster's body with lightning
incantations.location: Found at Stormcaller Church, inside a chest that's against a wall. [Map Link]

incantations.name: Dragonclaw
incantations.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion. Transforms caster into a dragon to tear through foes with dragon claws. Allows one follow-up attack. Incantation of those who have hunted dragons and feasted upon their hearts. This is a pure and overwhelming power.
incantations.effect: Channels dragon to rend foes with dragon claws
incantations.location: Found on the island with the Church of Dragon Communion. You need 1 Dragon Heart in order to acquire it.

incantations.name: Dragonfire
incantations.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion. Transforms caster into a dragon to spew flaming breath. Charging extends duration. Incantation of those who have hunted dragons and feasted upon their hearts. Theirs is a pure and overwhelming power.
incantations.effect: Channels dragon to spew flame breath
incantations.location: Found on the island with the Church of Dragon Communion. You need 1 Dragon Heart in order to acquire it.

incantations.name: Dragonice
incantations.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion. Transforms caster into a dragon to spew icy breath.Charging extends duration. Those extraordinary individuals who perpetuate DragonCommunion are called the dragon-hearted.
incantations.effect: Channels dragon to spew icy breath
incantations.location: Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion for 1 Dragon Heart.

incantations.name: Dragonmaw
incantations.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion. Transforms caster into a dragon to bite enemies before them. Incantations of those who have hunted dragons and feasted upon their hearts. Theirs is a pure and overwhelming power. Note: either
incantations.effect: Channels dragon to bite foes before caster
incantations.location: Found on the island with the Church of Dragon Communion. You need 1 Dragon Heart in order to acquire it. Map Link.Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion for 1 Dragon Heart.

incantations.name: Ekzykes's Decay
incantations.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion.Channels the power of Ekzykes, the Decaying. Transforms caster into a dragon to spew scarlet rot breath from above.Charging extends duration. This incantation can be cast while jumping. Ekzykes, Dragon Communion Revenger, did not forget his hatred even as he succumbed to the scarlet rot. NOTE
incantations.lore:
Superior incantation of Dragon Communion.
Channels the power of Ekzykes, the Decaying.
incantations.effect: Spews scarlet rot breath of Ekzykes from above
incantations.location: Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion for 2 Dragon Hearts.

incantations.name: Elden Stars
incantations.description: This legendary incantation is the most ancient of those that derive from the Erdtree. Creates a stream of golden shooting stars that assail the area. It is said that long ago, the Greater Will sent a golden star bearing a beast into the Lands Between, which would later become the Elden Ring. NOTE:
incantations.lore: This legendary incantation is the most ancient of those that derive from the Erdtree.
incantations.effect: Creates a steam of golden shooting stars that assail the area.
incantations.location: From the Great Waterfall Crest until you find a pack of Giant Ants. Follow the roots and head inside the cave, you'll find Elden Stars inside.

incantations.name: Electrify Armament
incantations.description: One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult. Enchants armament held in the right hand with lightning-affinity attacks. Long ago, Godwyn the Golden defeated the ancient dragon Fortissax, and befriended his fallen foe an event that gave rise to the ancient dragon cult in the capital.
incantations.lore: One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
incantations.effect: Enchants right-hand armament with lightning damage
incantations.location: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Dragon Cult Prayerbook for 4,000 Runes.

incantations.name: Erdtree Heal
incantations.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations. Heals a vast amount of HP for the caster and nearby allies. Hold to continue praying and delay activation. The Erdtree once flourished with abundance - yet it was only for a fleeting moment. Such is the course of all life.
incantations.lore: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
incantations.effect: Vastly heals HP for self and nearby allies
incantations.location: Can be found in Queen's Bedchamber in Leyndell, Ashen Capital

incantations.name: Fire's Deadly Sin
incantations.description: Incantation originating from a deeply ominous prophecy. Sets both the caster and the surrounding area ablaze with raging flames. The caster's body will remain engulfed in flame for a while, burning them and any who draw near. Charging enhances potency. The prophet despaired, looking up at the Erdtree, for soon the kindling would burst into flame, bringing ruin. "The burning of the Erdtree is the first cardinal sin. That is not the domain of mere men."
incantations.lore: Incantation originating from a deeply ominous prophecy.
incantations.effect: Sets area and self ablaze with raging flames
incantations.location: Reward from completing the "Flightless Bird" painting puzzle.

incantations.name: Flame Fortification
incantations.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful. Increases fire damage negation. This incantation can be cast while in motion. Follow the path that has been set for you, and you will make enemies of all others: the monks, the sorcerers, the ancient dragon knights, and the scions of gold. Heed me the Lands Between offers no welcome to the Tarnished.
incantations.lore: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
incantations.effect: Increases fire damage negation
incantations.location: Purchase from Brother Corhyn for 3,000 Runes.

incantations.name: Flame Sling
incantations.description: Incantiation originating from a sinister prophecy. Throws a ball of raging fire. Charging enhances potency and causes the ball of fire to explode. The flame of ruin is anathema to the Erdtree. But prophets sometimes glimpse it within the faith all the same. Sadly when this occurs their sole reward is banishment. Note:
incantations.lore: Incantation originating from a sinister prophecy.
incantations.effect: Throws balls of raging fire
incantations.location: Sold by Brother Corhyn at the Roundtable Hold for 800 Runes.

incantations.name: Flame of the Fell God
incantations.description: This legendary incantation is one of several that draws directlyfrom the power of the Fire Giants.Releases a ball of raging fire said to be inhabited by a fell god. Thefireball floats toward enemies and explodes, setting the areaablaze.Arghanthy, the chief guardian of the Flame, had kept this incantation a well-kept secret until it was stolen by Adan. The fell god still lurks within the Fire Giants. Note:
incantations.lore: This legendary incantation is one of several that draws directly from the power of the Fire Giants.
incantations.effect: Summons raging fireball that explodes and sets the area ablaze
incantations.location: Liurnia of the Lakes: Dropped by Adan, Thief of Fire upon defeat. [Map Link]

incantations.name: Flame, Cleanse Me
incantations.description: One of the incantations of the Fire Monks.Creates a fire within that burns away toxins.Alleviates poison and scarlet rot buildup and cures these ailments.This incantation leaves the caster with subtle burns - a reminderthat they must fear the flame.
incantations.lore: One of the incantations of the Fire Monks.
incantations.effect: Alleviates buildup and cures both poison and scarlet rot
incantations.location: Held by one of the corpses at the Fire Monk camp.

incantations.name: Flame, Fall Upon Them
incantations.description: One of the incantations that draws directly from the power of the Fire Giants. Hurls several balls of fire at once. Charging enhances potency and causes the balls offire to explode. There is no record of this incantation in common prayerbooks. Only a select few prelates know of its existence. Notes:
incantations.lore: One of the incantations that draws directly from the power of the Fire Giants.
incantations.effect: Hurls several balls of fire at once
incantations.location: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving them the Giant's Prayerbook for 10,000 Runes.

incantations.name: Flame, Grant me Strength
incantations.description: Superior incantation of the Fire Monks. Creates an invigorating fire within that enhances physical and fire-affinity attack power. This incantation does not burn the caster, and so it is considered forbidden by the guardians of the Flame.
incantations.lore: Superior incantation of the Fire Monks.
incantations.effect: Raises physical and fire-affinity attack power
incantations.location: Found behind Fort Gael, on a body between two flame carts

incantations.name: Flame, Protect Me
incantations.description: The most ancient of the Fire Monks' incantations. Creates a fire within that greatly increases fire damage negation. It is said that this incantation was used during the War against the Giants long ago, during which it protected the champions of the Erdtree.
incantations.lore: The most ancient of the Fire Monks' incantations.
incantations.effect: Greatly increases fire damage negation
incantations.location: Found Behind the double Stone-Key fog door in Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave

incantations.name: Fortissax's Lightning Spear
incantations.description: Incantation that channels the power of the ancient dragon Fortissax. creates two spears of red lightning and stabs them into the ground from above, one after another. On impact, each spear will burst into trails of lightning covering the area. During the War of the Anicent Dragons, these twin red lightning stakes were the hallmark of the ancient dragon who was once called the mightiest boulderstone. Notes:
incantations.lore: Incantation that channels the power of the ancient dragon Fortissax.
incantations.effect: Stabs from above with two red lightning spears in tandem
incantations.location: Trade Remembrance of the Lichdragon with Enia at Roundtable Hold.

incantations.name: Frenzied Burst
incantations.description: Incantations originating from the maddening Three Fingers. Releases concentrated blasts of the yellow flame of frenzy from the caster's eyes. Charging enhances potency, enabling the blasts to penetrate the enemy's guard. In times past, every single person who attempted to control the flame of frenzy succumbed to madness after a desperate internal struggle. This incantation is testament to a meager victory. Note:
incantations.lore: Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.
incantations.effect: Emits concentrated blast of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes
incantations.location: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the Liurnia of the Lakes region. [Map Link]

incantations.name: Frozen Lightning Spear
incantations.description: Incantation that channels the power of the Dragonkin Soldiers.Creates a spear of ice lightning and stabs it into the ground fromabove. On impact, the spear will burst into trails of lightning advancing forwards.The Dragonkin were born in the Eternal City, where they knewno true sky, nor true lightning. Instead, ice lightning was theirweapon. Note:
incantations.lore: Incantation that channels the power of the Dragonkin Soldiers.
incantations.effect: Stabs with ice lightning spear from above
incantations.location: Dropped by Dragonkin Soldier of Nokstella

incantations.name: Giantsflame Take Thee
incantations.description: One of the incantations that draws directly from the power of the Fire Giants. Hurls a massive ball of raging fire. Charging enhances potency and causes the ball of fire to explode. There is no record of this incantation in common prayerbooks. Only a select few prelates know of its existence. NOTE:
incantations.lore: One of the incantations that draws directly from the power of the Fire Giants.
incantations.effect: Hurls massive ball of raging fire
incantations.location: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving them the Giant's Prayerbook for 13,000 Runes.

incantations.name: Glintstone Breath
incantations.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion. Transforms caster into a dragon to spew magic breath.Charging extends duration. Those extraordinary individuals who perpetuate DragonCommunion are called the dragon-hearted.
incantations.lore: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
incantations.effect: Channels dragon to spew magic breath
incantations.location: Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion for 1 Dragon Heart

incantations.name: Golden Lightning Fortification
incantations.description: An incantation of Erdtree Worship. Greatly increases lightning damage negation for the caster and nearby allies. Hold to continue praying, delaying the effect. This incantation was used by the knights of the Erdtree during the assault by the great ancient dragon Gransax, and the bitter War of the Ancient Dragons that followed.
incantations.lore: An incantation of Erdtree Worship.
incantations.effect: Greatly increases lightning damage negationfor self and allies
incantations.location: Crumbling Farum Azula: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found by the cliffs south of the fountain plaza. This area is located in the upper level after ascending the Dragon Temple Lift.

incantations.name: Golden Vow
incantations.description: An incantation of Erdtree Worship. Increases attack power and defense for the caster and nearby allies. Hold to continue praying and delay activation.
