armors.description: Red scarab worn directly on the head.The red scarabs roll clumps of crimson tears during their labors.Slightly increases the recovery effects of the Flask of Crimson Tears, but increases damage taken.
armors.lore:
Red scarab worn directly on the head.
The red scarabs roll clumps of crimson tears during their labors.
armors.special_effect: Increases the recovery effects of the Flask of Crimson Tears by 10%, but increases damage taken.
armors.how_to_acquire: On a rooftop at Volcano Manor, Altus Plateau. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Crucible Axe Helm
armors.description: Helm of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. The axe ornamentation is the knight Ordovis's mark, displayed also by his men. Holds the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations.
armors.lore: Helm of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord.
armors.special_effect: Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations by 4%.
armors.how_to_acquire: The whole Crucible Axe Set is dropped by Crucible Knight Ordovis Boss. Elden Ring Map Link.

armors.name: Crucible Tree Helm
armors.description: Helm of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. The great tree ornamentation is the knight Siluria's mark, displayed also by her men. Holds the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations.
armors.lore: Helm of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord.
armors.special_effect: Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations by 4%.
armors.how_to_acquire: The whole set is found in a chest within Deeproot Depths behind a Boss: Crucible Knight Siluria. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Cuckoo Knight Helm
armors.description: Helm worn by Raya Lucaria Academy knights.Its brow is adorned with a single cuckoo's feather.
armors.lore:
Helm worn by Raya Lucaria Academy knights.
Its brow is adorned with a single cuckoo's feather.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped from Raya Lucaria Academy Knights, also referred to as Cuckoo Knights. There are three near the East Raya Lucaria Gate site of grace.

armors.name: Depraved Perfumer Headscarf
armors.description: Headscarf worn by depraved perfumers.These heresy-inclined perfumers imbibe their own spices to alter body and mind. Their slow descent into self-destruction is what earned them their name.
armors.lore: Headscarf worn by depraved perfumers.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Depraved Perfumer Set pieces can be farmed from the Depraved Perfumer enemies located around The Shaded Castle.

armors.name: Diallos's Mask
armors.description: Replica of a twin-tailed silver helm with flowery adornments. Only, without the twin tails. Diallos Hoslow had an older brother who was a stern, self-possessed man of a few words. His achievements made him seem out of reach. And so the younger aspired to be like the older. Yearning for the day that he would tell the tale of House Hoslow, in blood. Knowing full well that it would break his brother's heart.
armors.lore: Replica of a twin-tailed silver helm with flowery adornments. Only, without the twin tails.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found upon completion of Diallos's questline.Can also be gained by killing Diallos in North Liurnia of the Lakes. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Drake Knight Helm
armors.description: Black iron helm worn by drake knights.Features the spoils of a dragon catch as an emblem of pride as both dragon hunter and partaker of communion.From birth, drake knights speak not a word. They spend their lives pursuing the strength of dragons, for its sublime beauty and inspiration of awe.
armors.lore:
Black iron helm worn by drake knights.
Features the spoils of a dragon catch as an emblem of pride as both dragon hunter and partaker of communion.
armors.how_to_acquire: The entire Drake Knight Set is found in Crumbling Farum Azula. From the Dragon Temple Roof site of Grace, kill both Stormhawks you see first, then descend the ladder. Look left from the bottom of the ladder and drop down onto a balcony. Follow the path and circle around the tower to find the set in a chest. [Elden Ring Map here]

armors.name: Drake Knight Helm (Altered)
armors.description: Black iron helm worn by drake knights.Features the spoils of a dragon catch as an emblem of pride as both dragon hunter and partaker of communion.From birth, drake knights speak not a word. They spend their lives pursuing the strength of dragons, for its sublime beauty and inspiration of awe.
armors.lore:
Black iron armor worn by drake knights.
Features the spoils of a dragon catch as an emblem of pride as both dragon hunter and partaker of communion.
armors.how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Drake Knight Helm if you have it in your possession.

armors.name: Duelist Helm
armors.description: Bronze helm decorated with innumerable snakes.Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum. The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes.The snake is viewed as a traitor to the Erdtree, and the audience delighted in seeing these bronze effigies beaten and battered.
armors.special_effect: Increases likelihood of being targeted by foes.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Duelist Set pieces can be dropped as loot from the Duelist enemies located in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

armors.name: Eccentric's Hood
armors.description: A pointy, ragged hood.Worn by the knight Jerren.The hood hides an aged, bearded mask.Jerren served General Radahn as a guest commander, and they are said to have sworn an oath of honorable death to one another.
armors.lore:
A pointy, ragged hood.
Worn by the knight Jerren.
armors.how_to_acquire: The entire Eccentric Set is obtained from choosing to kill Witch-Hunter Jerren at the end of Sorceress Sellen's questline. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Eccentric's Hood (Altered)
armors.description: A pointy, ragged hood.Worn by the knight Jerren.The hood hides an aged, bearded mask.Jerren served General Radahn as a guest commander, and they are said to have sworn an oath of honorable death to one another.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Eccentric's Hood into Eccentric's Hood (Altered).

armors.name: Elden Lord Crown
armors.description: Crown of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. The age of the Erdtree began amongst conflict, when Godfrey was lord of the battlefield. He led the War against the Giants. Faced the Storm Lord, alone. And then, there came a moment. When his last worthy enemy fell. And it was then, as the story is told, that the hue of Lord Godfrey's eyes faded.
armors.lore: Crown of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Godfrey, First Elden Lord and Hoarah Loux, Warrior.

armors.name: Envoy Crown
armors.description: The soft bundle worn on the head by Oracle Envoys.Densely wrapped in several layers of cloth.Raises the potency of bubble-based skills.No one knows what the cloth hides, but some claim to have heard a faint whimpering from inside. It must have been their imagination.
armors.special_effect: Increases Potency of bubble skills (unique skills on Envoy weapons) by 15%.
armors.how_to_acquire: Miquella's Haligtree. Southeast of the Haligtree Canopy site of grace, on a corpse at the southern tip of the thicker right branch. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Exile Hood
armors.description: Deep red hood that covers the whole head.Worn by soldiers sent to the penal colonies, who were required to keep their faces hidden.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop from Castle Guard.

armors.name: Festive Hood
armors.description: Hood worn by dancers at the festivities in Dominula, the village of windmills.Decorated with many-colored flowers.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped from the yellow clothed dancers in Dominula, Windmill Village

armors.name: Festive Hood (Altered)
armors.description: Hood worn by dancers at the festivities in Dominula, the village of windmills.Decorated with a stunning array of flowers.
armors.lore: Hood worn by dancers at the festivities in Dominula, the village of windmills.
armors.how_to_acquire: Obtained by altering Festive Hood at a site of grace or via Boc the Seamster.

armors.name: Fia's Hood
armors.description: Hood of black cloth that covers the whole head.Worn by Fia, the Deathbed Companion, on her journey after being exiled from her home.The fabric iteself is soft as silk.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found on Fia after progressing her questline and defeating Lichdragon Fortissax.

armors.name: Finger Maiden Fillet
armors.description: Fillet worn by maidens who serve the Two Fingers. The maidens live to serve a chosen Tarnished, sharing their guidance and the wisdom of the Two Fingers. The guidance of grace would ensure that the pair be brought together. Or at least, such was the promise long ago.
armors.lore: Fillet worn by maidens who serve the Two Fingers.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found inside Church of Inhibition directly beside a Grace. Run past NPC invader to touch Grace first. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Fingerprint Helm
armors.description: Iron helm singed and blistered by fingers.Worn by Vyke, knight of the Roundtable Hold.No other Tarnished was closer to the throne of the Elden Lord than Vyke. But without announcement, Vyke traveled far below the capital, and was scorched by the flame of frenzy.Did he make his choice for his maiden, or did some other force lure him with suggestion?
armors.lore:
Iron helm singed and blistered by fingers.
Worn by Vyke, knight of the Roundtable Hold.
armors.how_to_acquire: Lord Contender's Evergaol: Dropped by Roundtable Knight Vyke upon defeat. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Fire Monk Hood
armors.description: Mail hood of iron links covering a headband engraved with flames. Attire of the Fire Monks.The Fire Monks are guardians of the flame of ruin, forbidden by the Erdtree and said to be kept high in the Mountaintops of the Giants.
armors.lore:
Mail hood of iron links covering a headband
engraved with flames. Attire of the Fire Monks.
armors.how_to_acquire: Pieces of the Fire Monk Set are dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintop of the Giants.

armors.name: Fire Prelate Helm
armors.description: Helm engraved with a sacred countenance and housing a cauldron.Attire of the Fire Prelates, commanders of the Fire Monks.It is said the cauldron perched atop the head was originally furnished with embers, and would surge into flames when the wearer's faith reached its zenith. The fire of this cauldron has since died out, however.
armors.lore:
Helm engraved with a sacred countenance and housing a cauldron.
Attire of the Fire Prelates, commanders of the Fire Monks.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Fire Prelates, found in Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir or in the Guardians' Garrison in Mountaintop of the Giants.

armors.name: Foot Soldier Cap
armors.description: Flanged iron cap widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.
armors.lore: Flanged iron cap widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by enemy Foot Soldiers across the game.

armors.name: Foot Soldier Helm
armors.description: Wholly unembellished iron helm.Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.
armors.lore:
Wholly unembellished iron helm.
Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.
armors.how_to_acquire: It can be farmed at Caelid. Starting from the grace Chamber Outside the Plaza in Redmane Castle, go south and there will be four foot soldiers wearing the helm.

armors.name: Foot Soldier Helmet
armors.description: Helmet with a protective metal plate.Widely issued to foot soldiers in lord's army.
armors.lore:
Helmet with a protective metal plate.
Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Foot Soldiers in Liurnia of the Lakes.

armors.name: Gelmir Knight Helm
armors.description: Helm worn by knights once loyal to Praetor Rykard. Its crest of red feathers symbolizes Rykard's pedigree as Lord Radagon's son.
armors.lore:
Helm worn by knights once loyal to Praetor Rykard.
Its crest of red feathers symbolizes Rykard's pedigree as Lord Radagon's son.
armors.how_to_acquire: You can loot the entire Gelmir Knight Set in the Gelmir Hero's Grave dungeon from a Gelmir Knight corpse. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Gilded Foot Soldier Cap
armors.description: Flanged cap made from gilded iron.Issued to foot soldiers protecting the royal capital of Leyndell.
armors.lore:
Flanged cap made from gilded iron.
Issued to foot soldiers protecting the royal capital of Leyndell.
armors.how_to_acquire: Chance to drop from Soldier enemies found in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

armors.name: Glintstone Scarab
armors.description: Blue-green scarab worn directly on the head.These scarabs roll clumps of sorcery during their labors.Slightly reduces FP costs of sorceries, but increases damage taken.
armors.lore:
Blue-green scarab worn directly on the head.
These scarabs roll clumps of sorcery during their labors.
armors.special_effect: Reduces the FP cost of Sorceries by ~15%. Increases damage taken.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found inside a chest in Raya Lucaria Academy, past the Iron Ball Trap. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Godrick Knight Helm
armors.description: Helm worn by knights loyal to Godrick the Grafted.Adorned with a plum of withered, ashen hair.
armors.lore:
Helm worn by knights loyal to Godrick the Grafted.
Adorned with a plume of withered, ashen hair.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by the heavy Godrick Knights scattered across Limgrave.

armors.name: Godrick Soldier Helm
armors.description: Helm worn by soldiers loyal to Godrick the Grafted. Made from durable iron, layered with a chainmail coif beneath.
armors.lore:
Helm worn by soldiers loyal to Godrick the Grafted.
Made from durable iron, layered with a chainmail coif beneath.
armors.how_to_acquire: Gatefront Ruins: Dropped by the Godrick Soldiers patrolling the outpost

armors.name: Godskin Apostle Hood
armors.description: Hood made by seweing together patches of smooth skin.Worn by the Godskin Apostles.The apostles, once said to serve Destined Death, are wielders of the god-slaying black flame. But after their defeat by Maliketh, the Black Blade, the source of their power was sealed away.
armors.lore:
Hood made by sewing together patches of smooth skin.
Worn by the Godskin Apostles.
armors.how_to_acquire: Defeating Godskin Apostle, located at the bottom of Divine Tower of Caelid. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Godskin Noble Hood
armors.description: Hood made by sewing together patches of smooth skin.Subcutaneous fat makes it plump and soft.Worn by Godskin Nobles.Nobles are the most ancient apostles who are said to have assimilated inhuman physiology. Not unlike the crucible, the Erdtree in its primordial form.
armors.lore:
Hood made by sewing together patches of smooth skin.
Subcutaneous fat makes it plump and soft.
Worn by Godskin Nobles.
armors.how_to_acquire: Defeat the Godskin Noble found on the bridge that connects the study hall to the Divine Tower of Liurnia. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Grass Hair Ornament
armors.description: A headdress made from wildflowers.Wearing this might make you less easy to spot.
armors.lore:
A headdress made from wildflowers.
Wearing this might make you less easy to spot.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Grass Hair Ornament Helm is currently unavailable in-game.

armors.name: Great Horned Headband
armors.description: Headband decorated by a pair of great horns.Worn by ancestral follower warriors.
armors.lore:
Headband decorated by a pair of great horns.
Worn by ancestral follower warriors.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from Ancestral Follower in Siofra River

armors.name: Greathelm
armors.description: Sturdy greathelm made from iron. Though it is uncomfortably heavy and obstructs the vision of the wearer, it provides considerable damage negation.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in south Caelid for 1,800 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Greathood
armors.description: Hood far larger than the head it is meant to cover. A burial shroud of sorts for those who discover, at long last, the truth they sought.Increases intelligence and faith to the detriment of HP."Yes, surely this is the moon that young Rennala gazed upon."
armors.how_to_acquire: Given as a reward for solving the puzzle of the Sorcerer Painting. Travel slightly south of Castle Sol to the Snow Valley Ruins Overlook. From there, head for the nearby bridge, where a ghost of a painter can be found. Speak to the painter to receive the Greathood. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Guardian Mask
armors.description: Engraved golden mask.Worn by the guardians of the Minor Erdtrees.In accordance with an ancient pact with the Erdtree, it is said that their deaths lead not to destruction, but instead to renewed. eternal life as guardians.
armors.how_to_acquire: Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from Erdtree Guardians that are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.

armors.name: Guilty Hood
armors.description: Coarse hooded cloak of olive brown. The garb of those accused of lesser crimes, indicated by the collar of sharpened branches.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for 500 Runes. Elden Ring Map hereCan be found on a corpse in the sewers north of Avenue Balcony site in Leyndell Royal Capital. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Haima Glintstone Crown
armors.description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.Increases intelligence and strength to the detriment of FP.Scholars of the Haima Conspectus sought the power to quell conflict, and to this end studied the sorceries of cannon fire and the gavel.
armors.lore: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.
armors.special_effect: +2 Strength,+2 Intelligence. Reduces max FP by 10%.
armors.how_to_acquire: This piece is dropped by Battlemage enemies.The entire Battlemage Set drops from a particular Battlemage enemy, located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge. Elden Ring Map Link

armors.name: Haligtree Helm
armors.description: Helm worn by soldiers sworn to the Haligtree. An iron helm graced by a crown of unalloyed gold. Increases faith.
armors.how_to_acquire: Haligtree Soldiers drop all pieces of the set. They are located throughout all areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

armors.name: Haligtree Knight Helm
armors.description: Helm worn by knights sworn to the Haligtree.Graced by a crown of unalloyed gold.Increases faith.
armors.lore:
Helm worn by knights sworn to the Haligtree.
Graced by a crown of unalloyed gold.
armors.how_to_acquire: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: Looted from a corpse located near the Elphael Inner Wall site of grace. It is in the room at the top of the ladder directly adjacent to the grace site. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Hierodas Glintstone Crown
armors.description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy. Increases intelligence and endurance to the detriment of FP. The crown of Hierodas was granted to scholars who engaged in nomadic study away from the academy.
armors.lore: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.
armors.special_effect: +2 Intelligence, +2 Endurance. Reduces max FP by 10%
armors.how_to_acquire: Hermit Village in Mt. Gelmir: Found on a corpse behind a house on the south side of the village. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: High Page Hood
armors.description: Hood of a page selected for special privilege by the noble they serve.The unassuming sack-like appearance benefits their unseen and unknown stature.
armors.how_to_acquire: The High Page Hood and High Page Clothes can be farmed from High Pages.The earliest one that can be found is in Raya Lucaria Academy. From the Church of the Cuckoo site, enter the church and take the shortcut ladder up. On the other side of the room is a long hallway with a High Page at the end.They can also be found in Leyndell, Royal Capital in various buildings.

armors.name: Highwayman Hood
armors.description: Hideously stained and ragged hood. Worn by former foot soldiers who have turned to banditry.
armors.lore:
Hideously stained and ragged hood.
Worn by former foot soldiers who have turned to banditry.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by a Bandit at Murkwater Cave

armors.name: Hoslow's Helm
armors.description: A twin-tailed silver helm decorated with flowery adornments. Symbol of the head of the revered House of Hoslow.Juno Hoslow had a younger brother who was all talk and no trousers. His inability to commit to action was such that Juno inherited the Hoslow legacy without resistance, granting him the freedom to shower his little brother with adoration.
armors.how_to_acquire: All pieces of Hoslow's Set are dropped by Juno Hoslow along with Hoslow's Petal Whip as part of the final contract for the Volcano Manor questline. His invade rune be found in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants, east of Shack of the Lofty. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Iji's Mirrorhelm
armors.description: Helm fashioned from a crystal looking-glass, said to have never left War Counselor Iji's head.Easily broken and weak against striking attacks.Worn by those committed to high treason, it wards off the intervention of the Greater Will and its vassal Fingers.Iji was afraid. Terrified of his own treachery.
armors.lore:
Helm fashioned from a crystal looking-glass, said to have never left War Counselor Iji's head.
Easily broken and weak against striking attacks.
armors.how_to_acquire: After the player confronts Blaidd during Ranni's questline, War Counselor Iji will have new dialogue available. Upon exhausting that and returning to the area again, his corpse can be found near his usual spot at the Road to the Manor grace site. Upon his anvil the player will find Iji's Mirrorhelm as well as Iji's Bell Bearing. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Imp Head (Cat)
armors.description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem. Resembling a cat, it holds trace amounts of feline intelligence.
armors.how_to_acquire: Rare drop from Imps. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Imp Head (Corpse)
armors.description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem.Resembling the visage of a corpse, it holds trace amounts of lingering faith.
armors.lore: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem.
armors.how_to_acquire: Looted from a corpse in an alley off the avenue in Leyndell, Royal Capital. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Imp Head (Elder)
armors.description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem. Resembling an elder, it holds trace amounts of arcane knowledge.
armors.lore: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found as a treasure inside Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs, in a room in the second floor, guarded by a Burial Tree Watchdog. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Imp Head (Fanged)
armors.description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem.Resembling a fanged demon, it holds trace amounts of bestial strength.
armors.lore: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem.
armors.how_to_acquire: Rare drop from Imps

armors.name: Imp Head (Long-Tongued)
armors.description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem. Resembling a long-tongued demon, it holds trace amounts of vexatious dexterity.
armors.lore: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be looted off of Imps in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds

armors.name: Imp Head (Wolf)
armors.description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem.Resembling a wolf, it holds trace amounts of lupine endurance.
armors.lore: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found in the Minor Erdtree Catacombs within Caelid on a body laying over a sarcophagus. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Incantation Scarab
armors.description: Golden scarab worn directly on the head.These scarabs roll clumps of incantations during their labors.Slightly reduces the FP costs of incantations, but increases damage taken.As a scarab approaches death, it abandons its rolled treasure and stretches its wings wide for long journey to its home nest.
armors.lore:
Golden scarab worn directly on the head.
These scarabs roll clumps of incantations during their labors.
armors.special_effect: Reduces the FP cost of incantations by 15%. Increases damage taken by 5%
armors.how_to_acquire: Need to examine the Homing Instinct Painting at Artist's Shack first. The Incantation Scarab can be found Southwest of the Dragon-Burnt Ruins, there will be a gravestone with a ghost sitting in front of it. Interact with the ghost, and it will drop the Incantation Scarab. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Iron Helmet
armors.description: An iron helmet showing rust on its edges. Cloth covering the mouth and neck provides some resistance to poison and other irritants.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for 1500 Runes. Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Iron Kasa
armors.description: Iron kasa of the man who calls himself Shabriri.Crafted to imitate the woven straw hats worn in the Land of Reeds.The man, once known as Yura, kept a woman in the deepest reaches of his heart.
armors.how_to_acquire: Acquired by following Yura's questline. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Jar
armors.description: Jar that fits cleanly over the head when upturned.Made with pride by Iron Fist Alexander.In a uniquely jarlike gesture of friendship, it boosts the power of throwing pot items.
armors.special_effect: Boosts the power of Cracked Pot and Ritual Pot consumables by 15%
armors.how_to_acquire: Given to the player by Iron Fist Alexander. Follow his questline until you find him in Mt. Gelmir near Seethewater Terminus. Completing his dialogue here will award the player with the Jar. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Juvenile Scholar Cap
armors.description: Cap worn by young academy scholars, the juveniles birthed anew by the amber egg of Queen Rennala, the head of Raya Lucaria Academy. Yet their rebirth is not without imperfections, and thus do they repeat the process, eventually becoming utterly dependent upon it. Rebirth is as sleep to them, and with each awakening, memory fades into oblivion.
armors.lore: Cap worn by young academy scholars, the juveniles birthed anew by the amber egg of Queen Rennala, the head of Raya Lucaria Academy.
armors.how_to_acquire: The entire Juvenile Scholar Set and a Larval Tear is obtained by completing the Resurrection Painting puzzle. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Kaiden Helm
armors.description: Helm worn by Kaiden sellswords. These hulking, fearless mercenaries, said to hail from the mountaintops of the wintry north, are adept at fighting on horseback. Kaiden is the name of their home settlement.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from Kaiden Sellsword enemies. They can be found east of Limgrave's lake.

armors.name: Karolos Glintstone Crown
armors.description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy. Increases intelligence to the detriment of stamina. The Karolos Conspectus is the oldest of the academy's lineages of study, begat by the sorcerer Azur. Scholars who follow in his footsteps pursue the mysteries of comets.
armors.lore: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.
armors.how_to_acquire: From the Debate Parlor Site of Grace in Raya Lucaria Academy, head out the door and hug the western wall, ignoring the broken staircase or any open doorways. A crystal crab is hiding in the corner near the cliff edge. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Knight Helm
armors.description: Iron helm of an unknown knight. It is made of thin iron plate. Such metal armor is heavy, but provides considerable damage negation.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for 3,000 Runes.

armors.name: Land of Reeds Helm
armors.description: Helm made from strips of iron fastened together. Worn by warriors of the Land of Reeds. The Land of Reeds has long been locked in a miserable civil war, during which time it has remained alienated from the cultures of its neighbors. Little wonder that the entire nation has succumbed to blood-soaked madness, or so it is said.
armors.lore:
Helm made from strips of iron fastened together.
Worn by warriors of the Land of Reeds.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class.Sold by Isolated Merchant Dragonbarrow for 1,000 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Lazuli Glintstone Crown
armors.description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.Increases intelligence and dexterity to the detriment of HP.Scholars of the Lazuli Conspectus study Carian sorceries - a heterodox pursuit that views the moon as equal to the stars.
armors.lore: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.
armors.how_to_acquire: See the location on the Elden Ring Map here.Found at Raya Lucaria Academy.

armors.name: Leyndell Knight Helm
armors.description: Helm worn by knights sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.The golden canopy represents the honor of standing among the tree's defenders.
armors.lore: Helm worn by knights sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.
armors.how_to_acquire: Chance to drop from Leyndell Knights encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

armors.name: Leyndell Soldier Helm
armors.description: Helm worn by soldiers sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.Made from durable iron, layered with a chainmail coif beneath.
armors.lore:
Helm worn by soldiers sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.
Made from durable iron, layered with a chainmail coif beneath.
armors.how_to_acquire: This helm and other pieces of the Leyndell Soldier Set can be looted as drops from the foot soldiers scattered around Altus Plateau, and Leyndell, Royal Capital.

armors.name: Lionel's Helm
armors.description: Round iron helm with a distinctive large brim. Worn by Lionel the Lionhearted. When this chivalrous dauntless knight met Fia, who had been driven from her home, he declared himself to be her father.
armors.how_to_acquire: Lionel's Armor Set is found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Lusat's Glintstone Crown
armors.description: The giant blue glintstone crown worn by Lusat, primeval current sorcerer.This crown replaced Lusat's brain and skull altogether, and now, removed from his body, it is all but dead. What power remains within raises the potency of Lusat's primeval current sorceries at the cost of additional FP consumption.
armors.lore: The giant blue glintstone crown worn by Lusat, primeval current sorcerer.
armors.special_effect: Increases the damage of Stars of Ruin by 15%, and Star Shower and Glintstone Stars by 10%. Increases FP consumption from sorceries by 15%.
armors.how_to_acquire: Lusat's Glintstone Crown can be found after completing Sorceress Sellen's Questline, return to Lusat's location in the Sellia Hideaway. The legwraps will be there, along with the rest of his set for the taking. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Malenia's Winged Helm
armors.description: Winged helm made of unalloyed gold.Worn by Malenia, Blade of Miquella.Malenia awaited Miquella at the foot of the husk.My brother will keep his promise. He possesses the wisdom, the allure, of a god he is the most fearsome Empyrean of all.
armors.lore:
Winged helm made of unalloyed gold.
Worn by Malenia, Blade of Miquella.
armors.how_to_acquire: Purchased from Enia for 12,000 runes after defeating Malenia Blade of Miquella

armors.name: Malformed Dragon Helm
armors.description: A malformed golden helm. Adorned with various dragon imagery and worn by the misshapen Tree Sentinels. After the great ancient dragon Gransax attacked, the sentinels had an epiphany. The only way to truly protect the Erdtree was to become dragons themselves
armors.lore:
A malformed golden helm.
Adorned with various dragon imagery and worn by the misshapen Tree Sentinels.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by the Draconic Tree Sentinel in Crumbling Farum Azula. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Maliketh's Helm
armors.description: Beast's helm made of black iron and decorated with gold. Worn by Maliketh the Black Blade.Maliketh, Queen Marika's loyal half-brother, bore a blade imbued with Destined Death, and there was not one demigod who did not fear him. Champions knew what was at stake. Indeed, that is what made them champions
armors.lore:
Beast's helm made of black iron and decorated with gold.
Worn by Maliketh the Black Blade.
armors.how_to_acquire: Bought from the Enia in the Roundtable Hold after defeating Maliketh, the Black Blade.

armors.name: Marais Mask
armors.description: Mask in the image of a white-haired young noble. Customarily worn by the head of House Marais. Increases arcane. The Marais family has a dual history spanning generations, serving as both executioners and castellans of the Shaded Castle. This mask bears the likeness of the first of their line.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan, a hostile NPC found in the fields west of The Shaded Castle. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Marionette Soldier Birdhelm
armors.description: Metal helm formed in the likeness of the face of a bird.Worn by avionette soldiers, crafted to serve the sorcerers.The construction of this helm is remarkably crude.For a doll, the only thing that matters is that it does not break.
armors.lore:
Metal helm formed in the likeness of the face of a bird.
Worn by avionette soldiers, crafted to serve the sorcerers.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped from winged Marionette Soldiers.

armors.name: Marionette Soldier Helm
armors.description: Cylindrical helm of plate metal reinforced with a lattice. Worn by marionette soldiers, crafted to serve the sorcerers.The construction of this helm is remarkably crude.For a doll, the only thing that matters is that it does not break.
armors.lore:
Cylindrical helm of plate metal reinforced with a lattice.
Worn by marionette soldiers, crafted to serve the sorcerers.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from Marionette Soldiers often found at Liurnia of the Lakes or Mt. Gelmir.

armors.name: Mask of Confidence
armors.description: Mask with the mouth sewn shut with gold thread. Increases arcane. When Radagon married Rennala, he ordered the Carian magic preceptors to don these masks. To make it clear that all of their matters were to be kept strictly private.
armors.lore:
Mask with the mouth sewn shut with gold thread.
Increases arcane.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found on a corpse laying on the walls of the secret area of the Carian Study Hall unlocked using the Carian Inverted Statue. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Mushroom Crown
armors.description: Mushrooms found growing all over the body. These overgrown mushrooms form a towering headpiece. Raises attack power when something nearby suffers from poison or rot. Long ago, great lords served the scarlet rot. Perhaps such fungal bodies served as their crowns.
armors.special_effect: Raises attack power (+10% AR for 20 seconds) when something nearby suffers from poison or rot.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found on a corpse hanging off of a pillar ruin in the south-eastern corner of Lake of Rot. Climb around the outside of the ruin to reach it. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Mushroom Head
armors.description: Mushrooms found growing all over the body. These overgrown mushroom have colonized the head. To those enraptured by the scarlet rot, they are holy vestments that root one to the earth.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found in a cavern in Seethewater Cave filled with mushroom people and a Giant Poison Flower. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Navy Hood
armors.description: A hooded cloak of deep navy. Worn by expatriated royalty. Increases mind. Such cloaks were gifted to those who departed on missions to faraway lands, from which they would never return. But what choice did they have, having seen the guidance of grace?
armors.how_to_acquire: The Navy Hood along with other pieces of the Noble's Set can be found at East Windmill Pasture, Altus Plateau, in a burning pile of corpses surrounded by a circle of dancing women. Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Night Maiden Twin Crown
armors.description: Twin crowns worn by the nightmaidens of the Eternal City.Indicates the highest clerical rank, and hides the eyes with silk.Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.
armors.lore:
Twin crowns worn by the nightmaidens of the Eternal City.
Indicates the highest clerical rank, and hides the eyes with silk.
armors.how_to_acquire: Pieces of the Night Maiden Set are dropped by Night Maiden enemies found in Nokron and Nokstella.Two can be found in the Night's Sacred Ground area in the church with the large Silver Tear Ball. Once this building's shortcut is opened these two can be easily farmed by resetting at the Night's Sacred Ground site of grace.

armors.name: Night's Cavalry Helm
armors.description: Pitch-black helm with flowing black hair.Worn by the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds.The Night's Cavalry, who now wander the dim roads at night, were once led by the Fell Omen and were deliverers of death for great warriors, knights, and champions.
armors.lore:
Pitch-black helm with flowing black hair.
Worn by the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds.
armors.how_to_acquire: You can find the Night's Cavalry Set within the Consecrated Snowfield: From the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace at night, look southwest and there will be a caravan being pulled by two giants and two Night's Cavalry escorts. Kill both the escorts to receive the armor alongside an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone. See the location in the Elden Ring Map

armors.name: Night's Cavalry Helm (Altered)
armors.description: Pitch-black helm thinly painted with dried blood.Worn by the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds.The Night's Cavalry, who now wander the dim roads of night, were once led by the Fell Omen and were deliverers of death for great warriors, knights, and champions.
armors.lore:
Pitch-black helm thinly painted with dried blood.
Worn by the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds.
armors.how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Night's Cavalry Helm, if you have it in your possession.

armors.name: Nomadic Merchant's Chapeau
armors.description: Chapeau of the nomadic merchants.Decorated with tiny gems in a wide spectrum of colors.These merchants once thrived as the Great Caravan, but after being accused of heretical beliefs, their entire clan was rounded up and buried alive far underground.Then, they chanted a curse of despair, and summoned the flame of frenzy.
armors.lore:
Chapeau of the nomadic merchants.
Decorated with tiny gems in a wide spectrum of colors.
armors.how_to_acquire: After defeating Mohg, the Omen, open the secret passage behind the altar and journey into the mass grave. The full Nomadic Merchant's Set is found behind the first breakable tent you can see. Break the tent by baiting out a Frenzy attack from the Nomad there. [Elden Ring Map here]

armors.name: Nox Mirrorhelm
armors.description: Helm fashioned from a crystal looking-glass. One among the Eternal City's ritual implements. Easily broken and weak against striking attacks. Worn by those committed to high treason, it wards off the intervention of the Greater Will and its vassal Fingers.
armors.how_to_acquire: Cliffbottom Catacombs: In the sealed room, accessible by using a Stonesword Key at the Imp Statue. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Nox Monk Hood
armors.description: Silk hood worn by the monks of the Eternal City.Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be looted from the Nox Priest common enemies in Nokstella, Eternal City.

armors.name: Nox Monk Hood (Altered)
armors.description: Hood worn by the monks of the Eternal City.Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.
armors.lore: Hood worn by the monks of the Eternal City.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Nox Monk Hood into Nox Monk Hood (Altered).

armors.name: Nox Swordstress Crown
armors.description: Crown worn by the swordstresses of the Eternal City.These women are the personal guards of the nightmaidens, and the silk hides their eyes.Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.
armors.lore:
Crown worn by swordstresses of the Eternal City.
These women are the personal guards of the nightmaidens, and the silk hides their eyes.
armors.how_to_acquire: Pieces of the Nox Swordstress Set are dropped by Nox Swordstress enemies found in Nokron and Nokstella.Three can be found in relatively close proximity to the Nokstella, Eternal City site of grace. One up the stairs in a side room, and 2 in the river riding giant ants.

armors.name: Nox Swordstress Crown (Altered)
armors.description: Crown worn by swordstresses of the Eternal City.The silk eye covering is removed, flaunting convention.Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.
armors.lore:
Crown worn by swordstresses of the Eternal City.
The silk eye covering is removed, flaunting convention.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Nox Swordstress Crown into Nox Swordstress Crown (Altered).

armors.name: Octopus Head
armors.description: A land octopus whelp worn directly on the head. Has a lingering warmth reminiscent of human skin. Those who can withstand the smell will find its organic elasticity excellent for negating strikes.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found by killing Land Octopus or Giant Land OctopusThere are dozens of them south-west of Temple Quarter site of grace

armors.name: Okina Mask
armors.description: A wooden mask that depicts an old man baring his teeth. The source of the sobriquet of the great swordman of the Land ofReeds.Raises dexterity as it lowers focus.The more he sharpened his mind, the more the absurdities of theworld came into stark relief. And so Okina renounced it all, androse to a higher plane. There was only himself. His katana. And itsmastery.Before long, Okina became a demon of a swordsman.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Bloody Finger Okina at Mountaintops of the Giants. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Old Aristocrat Cowl
armors.description: Cowl made of soft cloth.Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital. Garb favored by the aged.Abandoning their birthplace after the Shattering, these undead wanderers are the pitiful product of unending life.
armors.lore:
Cowl made of soft cloth.
Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital. Garb favored by the aged.
armors.how_to_acquire: All pieces of the Old Aristocrat Set are dropped by the Old Aristocrat enemies, often found within larger groups of Aristocrats wandering the roads of most areas. The green cowl makes them easily distinguishable from other Aristocrats.There are a number of Old Aristocrats within the caravan of enemies north of the Agheel Lake South site of grace.Altus Plateau- There are Old Aristocrats to the left of Gold Mask's Bridge.

armors.name: Olivinus Glintstone Crown
armors.description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy. Increases intelligence to the detriment of HP. The lineage of the Olivinus Conspectus began with the sorcerer Lusat, and its adherents continue his study of meteors.
armors.lore: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.
armors.how_to_acquire: From the Schoolhouse Classroom site of grace, turn left and head to the room at the end of the corridor. Attack the empty bookshelf to reveal a hidden passage. Head out, turn left, and then jump up the rocks to find this item on a corpse. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Omen Helm
armors.description: Malformed helm resembling an Omen with its horns cut off.Worn by the Dung Eater, their form is a vision of the landscape of his mind, and of his appearance as he wished to see it.The heart of an omen without the body to match; could there be any crueler existence? What does it matter, then, if the curse claims at all?
armors.special_effect: Increases damage of Omen Bairn and Regal Omen Bairn by 5%.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Omen set can be found after killing the Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds at the Leyndell Royal Capital. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Omensmirk Mask
armors.description: Mask with long, hideously twisted horns worn by the Omenkillers.Increases strength. Bears the smirking face of an elder, twisted in wicked delight. This visage is carved in the image of the evil spirits that haunt the Omen in their nightmares.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Omensmirk and wearing mask outside of Lower Capital Church Site of Grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Page Hood
armors.description: Hood worn by pages who serve the nobility and are mindful to keep them out of harm's way. The unassuming sack-like appearance befits their unseen and unknown stature.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from Page enemies.

armors.name: Perfumer Hood
armors.description: Hood of an Erdtree Capital perfumer.In time past, the role of perfumer was much respected; a blessed apothecary in the eyes of the many. But after entering the battlefields of the Shattering they performed no such role, trading their aromatics for poisons and explosives.
armors.lore: Hood of an Erdtree Capital perfumer.
armors.how_to_acquire: Chance to drop from Perfumer enemies encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

armors.name: Preceptor's Big Hat
armors.description: Large hat with the movements of the stars drawn on the inside of the brim. Worn by the magic preceptors who served the Carian royals.Increases mind to the detriment of stamina.Glintstone sorcerers are the descendants of astrologers, a fact that the Carians remain of aware of. Even if their fate has been long severed from the stars.
armors.lore:
Large hat with the movements of the stars drawn on the inside of the brim.
Worn by the magic preceptors who served the Carian royals.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found on Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Prisoner Iron Mask
armors.description: Iron mask forced on a prisoner convicted of an appalling crime. Thick, heavy, and utterly stifling. A foul creation designed to torment the wearer, either slowly fermenting hatred within their heart, or a spiritual fervor that is near indistinguishable from it.
armors.lore:
Iron mask forced on a prisoner convicted of an appalling crime.
Thick, heavy, and utterly stifling.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Prisoner Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Ainsel River for 1000 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Prophet Blindfold
armors.description: Blindfold of exiled prophets who foretold misfortune and were persecuted and driven from their homes as a result. Why hesitate, if the path leading to the future is clear? Just close your eyes, and walk.
armors.lore: Blindfold of exiled prophets who foretold misfortuneand were persecuted and driven from their homes as a result.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Prophet Class.Can be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for 1,000 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Pumpkin Helm
armors.description: An oval helmet large enough to cover any head. Very heavy and very hard.Reduces damage from headshots and impacts.The inside of the helm is pitch black, keeping the crazed warrior within from panicking. Perhaps its rather roomy interior also helps alleviate feelings of pressure and claustrophobia.
armors.special_effect: Reduces damage from headshots and impacts.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Pumpkin Head. Can be found in Castle Morne's courtyard, [Elden Ring Map here] or at Waypoint Ruins. [Elden Ring Map here]

armors.name: Queen's Crescent Crown
armors.description: A tall crown depicting the moon. Worn by Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon. Increases intelligence. When Rennala, head of both the Academy of Raya Lucaria and the Carian royal family, lost her husband Radagon, her heart went along with him. And then, those at the academy realized. That Rennala was no champion, after all.
armors.lore:
A tall crown depicting the moon.
Worn by Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon. Increases intelligence.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Queen's Crescent Crown Helm can be purchased to Enia in Roundtable Hold for 7,000 Need to defeat Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon Bossfight first.

armors.name: Radahn Soldier Helm
armors.description: Helm worn by soldiers who fought by General Radahn's side. Its visor is fashioned after a lion's fangs.
armors.lore:
Helm worn by soldiers who fought by General Radahn's side.
Its visor is fashioned after a lion's fangs.
armors.how_to_acquire: Easily found in large numbers around Fort Gael. Elden Ring Map Here

armors.name: Radahn's Redmane Helm
armors.description: Helm of the golden lion, with flowing red hair.Worn by General Radahn.Radahn inherited the furious, flaming red hair of his father Radagon, and is fond of its heroic implications."I was born a champion's cub. Now I am the Lord of the Battlefield's lion."
armors.lore:
Helm of the golden lion, with flowing red hair.
Worn by General Radahn.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for 8,000 runes once Starscourge Radahn has been defeated.

armors.name: Radiant Gold Mask
armors.description: A mask designed to resemble a blazing golden halo.Created and left behind by Lord Goldmask, a staunch pursuer of Golden Order fundamentalism.Strenthens Golden Order incantations.Its striking design represents both the brilliant inspiration that once shone upon him, and the vision of a ring that he will surely find at the end of his pursuit."To you who seek to shine as I do, wear it well!"
armors.lore:
A mask designed to resemble a blazing golden halo.
Created and left behind by Lord Goldmask, a staunch pursuer of Golden Order fundamentalism.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found on collapsed bridge NW of Writheblood Ruins. Drop down two times heading south and it is on a body. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Ragged Hat
armors.description: Helm pieced together from scavenged metal.
armors.how_to_acquire: Not currently obtainable.

armors.name: Ragged Hat (Altered)
armors.description: Helm pieced together from scavenged metal.
armors.how_to_acquire: Not currently obtainable.

armors.name: Raging Wolf Helm
armors.description: A helm worn by Vargram the Raging Wolf, one of the first Tarnished to visit the Roundtable Hold. Vargram earned his nickname from the white wolf pelt that adorns this helm.
armors.lore: Helm worn by Vargram the Raging Wolf, one of the first Tarnished to visit the Roundtable Hold.
armors.how_to_acquire: Leyndell, Royal Capital. After obtaining the second to last letter from Volcano Manor, you will be sent to assist Knight Bernahl with assassinating Vargram the Raging Wolf and Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm. On successful invasion, you will receive the full Raging Wolf Set. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Raya Lucarian Helm
armors.description: Helm worn by Raya Lucaria Academy soldiers.Its brow adorned with a single cuckoo's feather.
armors.lore:
Helm worn by Raya Lucaria Academy soldiers.
Its brow is adorned with a single cuckoo's feather.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Carian Manor drop all pieces of the Raya Lucarian Soldier Set. They are easily farmed on the ramparts after the Manor Lower Level site of grace.

armors.name: Redmane Knight Helm
armors.description: Helm worn by knights who fought by General Radahn's side.The red plume is a symbol of Radahn's pedigree as Lord Radagon's son - the mane of the proud Red Lion.
armors.lore: Helm worn by knights who fought by General Radahn's side.
armors.how_to_acquire: Chance to drop from Radahn Knight in Fort Gael. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Rotten Duelist Helm
armors.description: Bronze helm decorated with innumerable snakes, eaten through by scarlet rot. Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum. The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes.
armors.lore: Bronze helm decorated with innumerable snakes, eaten through by scarlet rot.
armors.special_effect: Increases likelihood of being targeted by foes.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by a Rotten Duelist in the Consecrated Snowfield. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Royal Knight Helm
armors.description: Silver helm of Loretta, a Knight who served Miquella's Haligtree.Loretta, once a royal Carian Knight, went on a journey in search of a haven for Albinaurics, and determined that the Haligtree was their best chance for eventual salvation.
armors.lore: Silver helm of Loretta, a knight who served Miquella's Haligtree.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be brought from Finger Reader Enia, at Roundtable Hold after defeating Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree for 4000.

armors.name: Royal Remains Helm
armors.description: Helm graced with gold human bones.Worn by the unspeaking adherent of Sir Gideon the All-Knowing.Slowly replenishes HP when HP is reduced.It is said that the bones belong to an ancient lord - the soulless king. The lord of the lost and desperate, who was known as Ensha.
armors.lore:
Helm graced with gold human bones.
Worn by the unspeaking adherent of Sir Gideon the All-Knowing.
armors.special_effect: Slowly replenishes HP when HP is under 18%.
armors.how_to_acquire: Upon attaining the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right), Ensha of the Royal Remains will invade the players world the next time they travel back to Roundtable Hold. The full Royal Remains Set is acquired after beating him.

armors.name: Ruler's Mask
armors.description: Mask in the image of a wizened sage. Customary dress among lords in a smaller nation. Increases faith. Such a mask illustrates the qualities of an ideal lord: chiefly, wise and possessing a certain defanged geniality. One at the center of society often finds these qualities most expedient.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Ruler's Mask Helm can be found on a corpse laying face-down on a carriage northeast of the Abandoned Coffin site of grace in west Altus Plateau, alongside the Ruler's Robe. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Sacred Crown Helm
armors.description: Flanged iron cap adorned with a crown of unalloyed gold.Increases faith.Worn by foot soldiers sworn to the Haligtree.Who is it that Miquella shall bless, if not the low and the meek?
armors.lore:
Flanged iron cap adorned with a crown of unalloyed gold.
Increases faith.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from the ballista soldiers just outside of the Elpheal Inner Wall site of Grace. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Sage Hood
armors.description: A burgundy pointed hood. Attire of the wise sages who were deemed heretical. Evidence that the wearer was driven from town.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found in Stillwater Cave - Liurnia of the Lakes, just ahead and below the Lake Facing Cliffs, it's all sitting on a poison submerged corpse near the end, guarded by Giant Bats that will attack you when you take it. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Sanguine Noble Hood
armors.description: Hood of dyed black cloth featuring gold embroidery. Worn by the nobles who serve the Lord of Blood. Known to strike from pools of blood, these assassins are missionaries come to share the gospel of accursed blood.
armors.lore:
Hood of dyed black cloth featuring gold embroidery.
Worn by the nobles who serve the Lord of Blood.
armors.how_to_acquire: The entire Sanguine Noble Set is dropped by Sanguine Noble NPC invasion in west Mountaintops of The Giants. Includes Sanguine Noble Hood, Sanguine Noble Robe and Sanguine Noble Waistcloth. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Scaled Helm
armors.description: Helm worn by Old Knight Istvan.The corroded metal is reinforced with rock-hard scales, making it highly effective against non-physical attacks.Istvan is one of a few wizened Tarnished who survive to this day.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found after killing the first assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Old Knight Istvan. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Shining Horned Headband
armors.description: Headband decorated by a pair of shining horns. Worn by ancestral follower shamans.Horns with buds that also shine are ideal ceremonial items for ancestral worship. Strengthens Ancestral Infant's Head.
armors.lore:
Headband decorated by a pair of shining horns.
Worn by ancestral follower shamans.
armors.special_effect: Increases the attack power of Ancestral Infant's Head by 20%.
armors.how_to_acquire: Chance to drop from Ancestral Follower Shaman, which can be found singing in the Ancestral Woods in Siofra River.The Ancestral Woods area is only available after gaining access to Nokron, Eternal City.

armors.name: Silver Tear Mask
armors.description: Mask fashioned from the corpse of a formless Silver Tear, supported by its hardened, shed husk. Greatly increases arcane to the detriment of physical attack power. To imitate the imitator is a cunning play indeed.
armors.lore: Mask fashioned from the corpse of a formless Silver Tear, supported by its hardened, shed husk.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by the Mimic Tear boss in Nokron, Eternal City. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Skeletal Mask
armors.description: Skeletal mask that tightly grips the face.Worn by the assassin's of Ravensmount.This ritual implement relentlessly digs into the wearer's face, preserving one's human instincts while dressed in imitation of the Deathbirds.
armors.how_to_acquire: he Sage's Cave, in a chest behind an illusory wall. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Snow Witch Hat
armors.description: Witch's pointed hat, frigid and frozen through. Of a style associated with practitioners of heretical sorcery. Strengthens cold sorcery. Once worn by the snowy crone who the young Ranni encountered deep in the woods. She was a witch, and well versed in cold sorceries. It is said that the doll that houses Ranni's soul was modeled after her. That old witch was Ranni's secret mentor.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found in a chest on the upper floor of Renna's Rise during the progression of Ranni's questline. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Spellblade's Pointed Hat
armors.description: Glintstone sorcerer Rogier's traveling attire, graced with an intricate, aristocratic decoration. Strengthens glintstone sorcery skills. Rogier spent his entire life behaving with utter detachment. No one noticed the anger, grief, regret, or fear that existed along with it.
armors.lore: Glintstone sorcerer Rogier's pointed hat, a sign of a heretical practitioner. Strengthens glintstone sorcery skills.
armors.special_effect: Strengthens magic and cold weapon skills by 2%.
armors.how_to_acquire: Roundtable Hold - Drops from Rogier.

armors.name: Traveler's Hat
armors.description: Hat of a traveling perfumer of no renown. An associate of a healer, he is said to be in search of new aromatics and flower gardens, in hopes of treating Misbegotten, Omen and all those seen as impure.
armors.lore: Hat of a traveling perfumer of no renown.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found in a corpse in one of the corners of the buildings within Street of Sages Ruins, in Caelid's Swamp area, alongside the entire Traveler's Set. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Traveling Maiden Hood
armors.description: Hood worn by traveling maidens.Maidens traversed the Lands Between for different reasons. Some to seek audience with the Fingers. Others, to find the Tarnished who they were destined to guide.
armors.lore: Hood worn by traveling maidens.
armors.how_to_acquire: On a corpse inside the Shack of The Lofty in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants. The rest of the set can also be looted here. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Tree Sentinel Helm
armors.description: Golden helm of the heavy cavalry Tree Sentinels who serve the Erdtree.Very few are permitted to wear a golden wood crest of such size as seen on this helm.
armors.lore: Golden helm of the heavy cavalry Tree Sentinels who serve the Erdtree.
armors.how_to_acquire: The entire Tree Sentinel Set is obtained by destroying all three chariots in the Auriza Hero's Grave. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Twinned Helm
armors.description: Helm depicting entwined twins of gold and silver.The two known as D are inseparable twins.They are of two bodies and two minds, but one single soul. Not once do they stand together; not one word do they speak to one another.Perhaps this armor longs to find its way to the other D.
armors.how_to_acquire: Earliest location: Limgrave East upon killing D Hunter. Elden Ring Map hereObtained at end of D Hunter's questline.

armors.name: Twinsage Glintstone Crown
armors.description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy. Greatly increases intelligence to the detriment of HP and stamina. Scholars of the Twinsage Conspectus were the elites of the academy, permitted to study and excel in sorceries of all kinds.
armors.lore: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.
armors.special_effect: +6 Intelligence. Reduces max Stamina and max HP by 9%.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by a crab in Raya Lucaria Academy. Very close to Azur's Glintstone Staff. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Vagabond Knight Helm
armors.description: Helm of a knight banished from their motherland.Dirty and battered after enduring a lengthy vagabond journey. The visor is broken and can no longer be lowered. Metal armor is heavy, but also sturdy, offering significant damage negation.
armors.lore:
Helm of a knight banished from their motherland.
Dirty and battered after enduring a lengthy vagabond journey.
armors.how_to_acquire: A Starting Equipment Piece for the Vagabond Class.Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 1,000 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Veteran's Helm
armors.description: An old helm that has seen many battles.Worn by Niall, the great veteran general of Sol.Nial was a lone survivor who commanded spirits to defend his long-passed master.This aging general could not die, nor did he have anywhere to fade away.
armors.lore:
An old helm that has seen many battles.
Worn by Niall, the veteran general of Sol.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be bought from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Commander Niall

armors.name: Vulgar Militia Helm
armors.description: Helm worn by lean, mean, and filthy militiamen. The upward extension serves to create an appearance of larger size, however slightly.
armors.lore: Helm worn by lean, mean, and filthy militiamen.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found by killing Vulgar Militiamen enemies.

armors.name: White Mask
armors.description: "Bloodstained, faintly grinning mask.Worn by war surgeons who were effectively mercy killers.The Lord of Blood's curse enlivens the wearer when bloodletting occurs. Slightly raises attack power when there is blood loss nearby."
armors.special_effect: Slightly raises attack power (10% for 20s) when there is blood loss nearby.
armors.how_to_acquire: The entire War Surgeon Set is obtained after defeating all three Nameless White Mask NPC invaders in the blood swamp near the Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum.

armors.name: Witch's Glintstone Crown
armors.description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.Increases intelligence and arcane to the detriment of stamina.This gentle-looking crown was granted to a scholar who excelled in her studies, which also merited the title of "witch."
armors.lore: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.
armors.special_effect: +3 Intelligence. +3 Arcane. Reduces max Stamina by 18%.
armors.how_to_acquire: Obtained by progressing in Sorceress Sellen's Questline. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Zamor Mask
armors.description: Mask worn by knights of Zamor, hailed as heroes in the War against the Giants. These long-lived warriors, clad in biting, freezing winds, are said to have been the mortal enemies of the Fire Giants since time immemorial.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor fought at the Mountaintops of the Giants. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Dryleaf Robe
armors.description: Sun-faded and lightly soiled travel attire worn by clergymen. The gold necklace found under the breast belongs to a group of spiritual seekers known as the Dryleaf Sect. This sect rejects dependence on others in all matters of faith, seeking self-discipline and self-sufficiency above all else.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found under a waterfall in the lower portions under Bonny Village. This area can only be accessed by using the ladder in Shadow Keep to get down to a special teleport coffin (this Elden Ring Map location). This will take you to Ruins of Unte and you must follow the cliffs downstream and then carefully drop down to bottom level to reach the mausoleum. [Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Dryleaf Robe (Altered)
armors.description: Sun-faded and lightly soiled travel attire worn by clergymen. The leather satchel hanging from the shoulder is decorated with one of Miquella's emblems, a golden grass motif.
armors.lore: Sun-faded and lightly soiled travel attire worn by clergymen.
armors.how_to_acquire: Alter Dryleaf Robe at any site of Grace.

armors.name: Gaius's Armor
armors.description: The black iron chest armor of Commander Gaius. Part of an armor set patterned after fallen seeds. Gaius was the most senior disciple of the same Alabaster Lord who taught Radahn and Gaea gravitational technique.
armors.how_to_acquire: Purchased from the Enia at the Roundtable Hold after defeating Commander Gaius.

armors.name: Leda's Armor
armors.description: Chest armor of Needle Knight Leda. Slightly strengthens attacks following a dodge roll or backstep, as well as dash attacks. Embroidered with a golden crossed-tree motif, the chalk white cloak and surcoat symbolize the honor of the Needle Knights. "Kindly Miquella fashioned us as his needles to quell all, to ward away all."
armors.special_effect: Slightly strengthens attacks following a dodge roll or backstep, as well as dash attacks.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found on Needle Knight Leda's body after invading and defeating her

armors.name: Oathseeker Knight Armor
armors.description: Oathseeker Knight chest armor. Black with gold ornamentation. These knights set off on quests of discovery, hoping to find by themselves an oath of their own choosing to serve in perfect, lifelong devotion.
armors.lore:
Oathseeker Knight chest armor.
Black with gold ornamentation.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found inside a hanging body, just outside the Church of Benediction. It contains the whole set: Oathseeker Knight Greaves, Oathseeker Knight Gauntlets, Oathseeker Knight Armor, and Oathseeker Knight Helm. It also contains Pata weapon. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Verdigris Armor
armors.description: Chest armor made from an unusual metal known as verdigris. Verdigris is said to be the gift of an outer god. Possessed of an enormously hefty yet supple strength thanks to its rusted nature.
armors.lore: Chest armor made from an unusual metal known as verdigris.
armors.how_to_acquire: Complete Moore's questline

armors.name: Iron Rivet Armor
armors.description: Chest armor of Red Bear, whose name is lost to madness. A vest reinforced with iron rivets. After killing the great red bear in a blood-soaked bout, he became fascinated by the untainted glory of its naked strength. "I wish to be a bear, no more, and no less."
armors.lore:
Chest armor of Red Bear, whose name is lost to madness.
A vest reinforced with iron rivets.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Red Bear. Red Bear can be found at the Northern Nameless Mausoleum. The Northern Nameless Mausoleum is located East of the Temple Ruins. [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Thiollier's Garb
armors.description: The dark attire of those who wield poison in secret. The silver hair is arranged in the same style as St. Trina's, increasing arcane. Additionally, countless needles are sewn onto the exterior, apparently for talismanic effect.
armors.lore: The dark attire of those who wield poison in secret.
armors.how_to_acquire: Summon Thiollier during the battle at the end of his questline, then loot his body in the boss arena after the fight

armors.name: Thiollier's Garb (Altered)
armors.description: The dark attire of those who wield poison in secret.Countless needles are sewn onto the exterior for talismanic effect.
armors.lore: The dark attire of those who wield poison in secret.
armors.how_to_acquire: Alter Thiollier's Garb at any site of grace.

armors.name: High Priest Robe
armors.description: Robe of Count Ymir, High Priest. Conceals the abundance of squirming beneath. Gold embroidery decorates the purple cloth, with a jewelled ruff that sparkles like a flower wet with dew.
armors.lore:
Robe of Count Ymir, High Priest.
Conceals the abundance of squirming beneath.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Count Ymir, Mother of Fingers, who can be found in the Cathedral of Manus Metyr after interacting with the throne, you can only find Count Ymir there after you have defeated Metyr, Mother of Fingers. [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Finger Robe
armors.description: Robe of Count Ymir, High Priest. The front is open, exposing the squirming fingers beneath. This robe is the image of his fervent desire having broken free, laying bare his greatest wish, and wearing it enhances finger sorceries. "I will be the true mother. My fingers will grant us redemption!"
armors.how_to_acquire: Once you obtain the High Priest Robe you can alter it at a grace site to become this robe.

armors.name: Braided Cord Robe
armors.description: Ragged black cloth overlaid with braided cord. Attire of a vengeance-seeking hornsent. The braided cord ties together the vow of the revenger with the victims' grudges. It must never come undone. Enhances both watchful spirits and the vengeful spirits summoned by horned bairns.
armors.lore: Ragged black cloth overlaid with braided cord. Attire of a vengeance-seeking hornsent.
armors.special_effect: Enhances watchful and vengeful spirits summoned by horned bairns by 15%.
armors.how_to_acquire: Complete Hornsent quest. [Video Location]

armors.name: Dancer's Dress
armors.description: Bright-red dress of the Ranah dancers. Enhances the power of dancing attacks. The dance of Ranah is one of burning passion, and the most passionate dancers never allow their fiery dance to end, losing even their names as they dance on. To see the passion fade is to see the dancer's flame extinguished.
armors.special_effect: Enhances the power of dancing attacks by 2.5%.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by defeating Dancer of Ranah at the Southern Nameless Mausoleum [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Interactive Map]

armors.name: Dancer's Dress (Altered)
armors.description: Altered form of the deep crimson dress of the Ranah dancers. These are the black undergarments worn beneath. Enhances the power of dancing attacks.
armors.lore:
Altered form of the deep crimson dress of the Ranah dancers.
These are the black undergarments worn beneath.
armors.special_effect: Enhances the power of dancing attacks by 2.5%.
armors.how_to_acquire: Alter Dancer's Dress.

armors.name: Armor of Night
armors.description: Bottomless black chest armor, cool to the touch.Flowing lines in the seeming shape of a fingerprint adorn the surface. Imprisons the wearer in utterly lightless dark.Bestowed upon those born deep underground, ordaining them as Swordhands of Night.
armors.how_to_acquire: Bonny Gaol: Use the jar lift near the bridge twice to reach the top level of the gaol. First, hop on the jar, go to the bridge level, and activate the switch. Ride the jar lift for the second time to go to the top level. You can find the Night Set on a corpse laying on top of a table. [See SOTE Elden Ring DLC Map] [Video Link]

armors.name: Igon's Armor
armors.description: Armor of the broken drake warrior Igon, from a set comprised of a miscellany of parts. Filthy belongings are attached to this tattered piece of protective-wear. The poor scavenger of battlefields found honor through Dragon Communion.
armors.how_to_acquire: Loot Igon after defeating Bayle the Dread.

armors.name: Igon's Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor of the broken drake warrior Igon, from a set comprised of a miscellany of parts. Patched with scraps of cloth. The poor scavenger of battlefields found honor through Dragon Communion.
armors.lore: Armor of the broken drake warrior Igon, from a set comprised of a miscellany of parts. Patched with scraps of cloth.
armors.how_to_acquire: Alter Igon's Armor at a site of grace.

armors.name: Ansbach's Attire
armors.description: Attire of Sir Ansbach. The embroidered crest of the Pureblood Knights has now all but faded away. Slightly enhances Blood Oath and dynastic skills. Ansbach understood that keeping his oath to his old master was not an act of logic, nor would it bear any justice, but it was for these very reasons he was unable to let go.
armors.lore: Attire of Sir Ansbach. The embroidered crest of the Pureblood Knights has now all but faded away.
armors.special_effect: Slightly enhances Blood Oath and dynastic skills by 3%.
armors.how_to_acquire: Complete Sir Ansbach's questline all the way through the end, and side with him when facing Leda, and then Promised Consort Radahn/ Radahn, Consort of Miquella. After the fight is over, Sir Ansbach's body will be near the site of grace, alongside with his equipment and his Incantation. [Map Link]

armors.name: Ansbach's Attire (Altered)
armors.description: Attire of Sir Ansbach. Black cloth adorned with gold embroidery. Slightly enhances Blood Oath and dynastic skills.
armors.lore: Attire of Sir Ansbach. Black cloth adorned with gold embroidery.
armors.special_effect: Slightly enhances Blood Oath and dynastic skills by 3%.
armors.how_to_acquire: Alter Ansbach's Atirre at a Site of Grace.

armors.name: Freyja's Armor
armors.description: Golden armor of Redmane Freyja, member of General Radahn's most distinguished knights. Affixed with a black woolen mantle. After witnessing Freyja's valor as a gladiator in his youth, Radahn invited her to join the ranks of his most trusted warriors.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop by Redmane Freyja.

armors.name: Freyja's Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Golden armor of Redmane Freyja, member of General Radahn's most distinguished knights. After witnessing Freyja's valor as a gladiator in his youth, Radahn invited her to join the ranks of his most trusted warriors.
armors.lore: Golden armor of Redmane Freyja, member of General Radahn's most distinguished knights.
armors.how_to_acquire: Alter Freyja's Armor at any site of grace.

armors.name: Armor of Solitude
armors.description: Steel chest armor of the Knights of the Solitary Gaol. Part of a heavy armor set that covers the whole body in overlapping plates of steel, and bedecked with a black cloak. The nameless mausoleums of the realm of shadow are said to hold the spirits of warriors who lost their names, or their hearts.
armors.lore:
Steel chest armor of the Knights of the Solitary Gaol.
Part of a heavy armor set that covers the whole body in overlapping plates of steel, and bedecked with a black cloak.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be obtained after defeating the Blackgaol Knight found inside Northern Nameless Mausoleum. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Armor of Solitude (Altered)
armors.description: Steel chest armor of the Knights of the Solitary Gaol. Part of a heavy armor set that covers the whole body in overlapping plates of steel. The nameless mausoleums of the realm of shadow are said to hold the spirits of warriors who lost their names, or their hearts.
armors.lore:
Steel chest armor of the Knights of the Solitary Gaol.
Part of a heavy armor set that covers the whole body in overlapping plates of steel.
armors.how_to_acquire: Alter Armor of Solitude at any site of grace.

armors.name: Messmer Soldier Armor
armors.description: Armor worn by soldiers who serve Messmer the Impaler. A ragged cloak is draped over rusted mail. Though the chestpiece features a Scadutree motif, gold has been used for its engraving. A small consolation to those forced to wage a war without grace or honor.
armors.lore: Armor worn by soldiers who serve Messmer the Impaler. A ragged cloak is draped over rusted mail.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop by Messmer Soldiers

armors.name: Messmer Soldier Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor worn by soldiers who serve Messmer the Impaler. The mail has rusted while fighting in unending war. Though the chestpiece features a Scadutree motif, gold has been used for its engraving. A small consolation to those forced to wage a war without grace or honor.
armors.lore: Armor worn by soldiers who serve Messmer the Impaler. The mail has rusted while fighting in unending war.
armors.how_to_acquire: Alter Messmer Soldier Armor at any site of grace.

armors.name: Black Knight Armor
armors.description: Armor worn by the Black Knights, servants of Messmer the Impaler. Though the engraving above the heart is a Scadutree design, it is etched in gold. A small consolation to those forced to wage a war without grace or honor.
armors.lore: Armor worn by the Black Knights, servants of Messmer the Impaler.
armors.how_to_acquire: Black Knight Set pieces are dropped from Black Knights, found throughout the Lands of Shadow.

armors.name: Rakshasa Armor
armors.description: Armor of Rakshasa, soaked in the spurting blood of her victims.
