Tatters of ragged cloth jut out haphazardly, as if her lust for carnage threatens to break free.Increases damage dealt to foes, but greatly increases damage taken by the wearer.Cut down and devour. Only those who repeat the cycle without rest can truly subvert the self and become Rakshasa.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Rakshasa in Eastern Nameless Mausoleum. This area can only be accessed by using the ladder in Shadow Keep to get down to a special teleport coffin (this Elden Ring Map location). This will take you to Ruins of Unte and you must follow the cliffs downstream and then carefully drop down to bottom level to reach the mausoleum. [Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Fire Knight Armor
armors.description: Armor of the Fire Knights under Messmer the Impaler's personal command. Distinguished by its red cape and twin golden snakes which adorn the neck, enhancing incantations of Messmer's flame. These were the only ones who truly knew Messmer. His flames, like serpents. The painful fate that accompanied his accursed form.
armors.lore: Armor of the Fire Knights under Messmer the Impaler's personal command.
armors.special_effect: Enhances incantations of Messmer's flame by 5%.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop by Fire Knights in the Shadow Keep

armors.name: Fire Knight Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor of the Fire Knights under Messmer the Impaler's personal command. Each and every knight hailed from a renowned family of the Erdtree's upper echelons, but were shunned and chased from their homes after pledging allegiance to Messmer as their master.
armors.lore: Armor of the Fire Knights under Messmer the Impaler's personal command.
armors.how_to_acquire: Alter Fire Knight Armor at any site of grace.

armors.name: Gloried Attire
armors.description: Traditional garb of highland warriors, made from woven fabric and finished with fur. This garment is made from fabrics with both blue and red patterns. Red-patterned fabrics were allowed only to those who hunted bearsthe greatest and most glorious of the highlanders.
armors.how_to_acquire: To the northwest of the Ravine North Site of Grace, there is a forest inhabited by runebears. At the center of this forest, you'll find a large stone with several items on it, this whole armor set is at the top of the stone. [Map Link]

armors.name: Highland Attire
armors.description: Traditional garb of highland warriors, made from woven fabric and finished with a blue patterned cloth. Highland warriors are known to be hunters of bears; to them, there is no act more glorious than the subjugation of a savage beast.
armors.lore: Traditional garb of highland warriors, made from woven fabric and finished with a blue patterned cloth.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found laying on the grounds in the middle of the woods, alongside the rest of the Highland Warrior Set. [Map Link]

armors.name: Death Knight Armor
armors.description: Golden armor of the Death Knights, adorned with an antiquated depiction of the Erdtree. Enhances skills and incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult. These knights, once Godwyn's personal guard, quested to find their transfigured master's cadaver surrogatefor the coming age of the Duskborn.
armors.lore: Golden armor of the Death Knights, adorned with an antiquated depiction of the Erdtree.
armors.special_effect: Enhances skills and incantations of the ancient dragon cult by 2%.
armors.how_to_acquire: Darklight Catacombs, on a Death Knight corpse

armors.name: Messmer's Armor
armors.description: Black armor of Messmer the Impaler. Draped with a red cloak bearing his crest embroidered. On his mother's wishes, Messmer made himself a symbol of fear, undertaking the cleansing crusade she desired. "Direct thy maledictions, thine ire, and thy grief towards me alone."
armors.lore:
Black armor of Messmer the Impaler.
Draped with a red cloak bearing his crest embroidered.
armors.how_to_acquire: Purchase from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Messmer the Impaler

armors.name: Gravebird's Blackquill Armor
armors.description: Stone armor with a tinge of green. One of a set of armor pieces cast in the image of the Gravebird. Featuring a cape of black Deathbird feathers, it enhances jumping attacks. Gravebirds are ancient golems, created to guard the spiritgraves built where all manners of Death ultimately drift.
armors.lore:
Stone armor with a tinge of green. One of a set of armor pieces cast in the image of the Gravebird.
Featuring a cape of black Deathbird feathers, it enhances jumping attacks.
armors.how_to_acquire: From the Temple Town Ruins site of grace head north, past the Red Pests servants of rot, and stick to the left. The path will start to head upwards and you will find several Gravebirds. Continue upwards and you will eventually reach an area where there are gravebird statues at the side, in the middle, against the wall, you will find the armor. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Gravebird Armor
armors.description: Stone armor with a tinge of green. One of a set of armor pieces cast in the image of the Gravebird. Gravebirds are ancient golems, created to guard the spiritgraves built where all manners of Death ultimately drift.
armors.lore: Stone armor with a tinge of green. One of a set of armor pieces cast in the image of the Gravebird.
armors.how_to_acquire: In the area, there are four statues of Gravebirds, and at the end is where you'll find the Armor. Once you approach the statues, at least 3 of them will turn into enemies. This location is situated to the far west of the Abandoned Ailing Village, nearly reaching the outer walls of Belurat, Tower Settlement. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Common Soldier Cloth Armor
armors.description: Cloth armor of the rank-and-file soldiers of Messmer's army. A pitch-dark soot clings to it, much like the inner faces of the men who wore them.
armors.lore: Cloth armor of the rank-and-file soldiers of Messmer's army.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop by soldiers in Castle Ensis

armors.name: Horned Warrior Armor
armors.description: Armor of the horned warriors, keepers of the tower. The ochre fabric is draped over a chest-piece made to resemble the unclothed form of a hero from older times.
armors.lore: Armor of the horned warriors, keepers of the tower.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from Horned Warriors ( Small Private Altar site of grace in Belurat, Tower Settlement)

armors.name: Divine Beast Warrior Armor
armors.description: Armor of feted horned warriors chosen to become divine beast warriors, adorned with a lion's pelt. Among the divine beast warriors, only those who truly excel at divine invocation become sculpted keepers, and are granted the honor of the lion dance.
armors.lore: Armor of feted horned warriors chosen to become divine beast warriors, adorned with a lion's pelt.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Divine Beast Warriors, Enir Ilim

armors.name: Divine Bird Warrior Armor
armors.description: Armor of divine bird warriors, the very first of all horned warriors, made from a golden metal. The golden-hued divine birds are known to be cruel, never taking to human companionship. Those who invoked their divinity were few and far between.
armors.lore: Armor of divine bird warriors, the very first of all horned warriors, made from a golden metal.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Divine Bird Warriors

armors.name: Rellana's Armor
armors.description: Ornate armor of Rellana, the Twin Moon Knight, fashioned from silver steel. Adorned with the lapis-lazuli blue that is symbolic of Caria, its radiance is yet to fully fade.
armors.lore: Ornate armor of Rellana, the Twin Moon Knight, fashioned from silver steel.
armors.how_to_acquire: The complete set (Rellana's Set) can be bought from Enia in the Roundtable Hold upon defeating Rellana Twin Moon Knight.

armors.name: Young Lion's Armor
armors.description: The golden armor worn by Radahn in his younger years. Proudly adorned with heroic red accents, it is fitting attire for a lion. When Malenia, Blade of Miquella, let the rotflower blossom in Aeonia, Radahn heard a murmur in his ear "Miquella awaits thee, O promised consort."
armors.lore: The golden armor worn by Radahn in his younger years. Proudly adorned with heroic red accents, it is fitting attire for a lion.
armors.how_to_acquire: Purchase from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Promised Consort Radahn / Radahn, Consort of Miquella in Enir-Ilim [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Young Lion's Armor (Altered)
armors.description: The golden armor worn by Radahn in his younger years. Worn by a fierce lion. When Malenia, Blade of Miquella, let the rotflower blossom in Aeonia, Radahn heard a murmur in his ear "Miquella awaits thee, O promised consort."
armors.lore: The golden armor worn by Radahn in his younger years. Worn by a fierce lion.
armors.how_to_acquire: Alter Young Lion's Armor at any site of grace.

armors.name: Shadow Militiaman Armor
armors.description: Armor as dark as shadow, worn by vulgar militiamen. Freshly-singed battlegrounds effusing with the stench of the dead. Forbidden lands that will be excised from the memory of history. What better place than the realms of shadow then, for such an army?
armors.lore: Armor as dark as shadow, worn by vulgar militiamen.
armors.how_to_acquire: can be found by killing Shadow Militiaman enemies

armors.name: Ascetic's Loincloth
armors.description: Attire of the tower's ascetics, embodying their commitment to an austere existence of strict self-control. In order to ascend from their mortal flesh into tutelary deities of the land, they heighten their spirituality through severe ascetic training.
armors.lore: Attire of the tower's ascetics, embodying their commitment to an austere existence of strict self-control.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop by Curseblade enemies.

armors.name: All-Knowing Armor
armors.description: Armor set with countless eyes and ears. Worn by Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing. Knowledge begins with the recognition of one's ignorance. The realization that the search for knowledge is unending. But when Gideon glimpsed into the will of Queen Marika, he shuddered in fear. At the end that should not be.
armors.lore:
Armor set with countless eyes and ears.
Worn by Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing.
armors.how_to_acquire: The entire All-Knowing Set is dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing upon defeat. Sir Gideon is encountered as a boss in Leyndell, Capital of Ash, an alternate version of the Royal Capital accessible only after making significant progress in the storyElden Ring Map here

armors.name: Alberich's Robe
armors.description: Mad Tongue Alberich's robe.Set with red glintstones said to be formed by the blood of sacrifices. Strengthens thorn sorcery. Alberich was an aloof yet disturbed heretical sorcerer said to have been driven mad by jeering tongues during his service to the Roundtable Hold long ago.
armors.lore: Mad Tongue Alberich's robe.
armors.how_to_acquire: The entire Alberich's Set can be found in the main hall of the Fortified manor in Leyndell, Royal Capital, near the Fortified Manor, first floor Site of Grace. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Aristocrat Coat
armors.description: Tanned leather coat adorned with fine gold embroidery. Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital, and the belonging of a family which claims a knight as an ancestor. Abandoning their birthplace after the Shattering, these undead wanderers are the pitiful product of unending life.
armors.lore:
Tanned leather coat adorned with fine gold embroidery.
Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital, and the belonging of a family which claims a knight as an ancestor.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Undead Soldiers

armors.name: Aristocrat Garb
armors.description: High quality garb adorned with fine golden embroidery. Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital. Terribly faded and tattered.Abandoning their birthplace after the Shattering, these undead wanderers are the pitiful product of unending life.
armors.lore:
High quality garb adorned with fine golden embroidery.
Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital. Terribly faded and tattered.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Undead Soldiers

armors.name: Astrologer Robe
armors.description: Robe fashioned from supple cloth. Worn by those who look to the cosmos above. They read fate in the stars, and are said to be heirs of the glintstone sorcerers. But alas, the night sky no longer cradles fate.
armors.lore:
Robe fashioned from supple cloth.
Worn by those who look to the cosmos above.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Astrologer Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for 1500 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Azur's Glintstone Robe
armors.description: A robe reserved for grand masters at the Academy of Raya Lucaria.Corroded by blue-green glintstones.Since the grand masters Azur and Lusat were driven from the academy, no one has achieved their formerly-held rank.
armors.lore:
A robe reserved for grand masters at the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
Corroded by blue-green glintstones.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Sorceress Sellen's Questline, return to Primeval Sorcerer Azur's location. Azur's Glintstone Robe will be on the floor where Azur used to be, along with the rest of the set.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Bandit Garb
armors.description: Leather garb worn by bandits.Light for ease of movement, and supple for masking sound. In trade, they offer little damage negation.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class.Gatekeeper Gostoc will sell it after entering Stormveil Castle, but before killing Godrick the Grafted. Elden Ring Map hereCan be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after offering Gostoc's Bell Bearing.

armors.name: Banished Knight Armor
armors.description: Thick, full set of armor covering the entire body. This armor was worn by knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes. These fierce warriors were each and all accomplished. Perhaps that is why, despite their territorial losses, they were still named knights.
armors.lore:
Thick, full set of armor covering the entire body.
This armor was worn by knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Banished Knights

armors.name: Beast Champion Armor
armors.description: Silver armor engraved with tiny beasts. Worn by Bernahl the Recusant. Beasts are drawn to champions, and to lords. And this armor befits a champion worthy of becoming a lord. And that is what Bernahl was. Until his maiden threw herself into the fire.
armors.lore:
Silver armor engraved with tiny beasts.
Worn by Bernahl the Recusant.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. If not killed before, he will eventually invade you at Crumbling Farum Azula, dropping the entire set with an altered version of the chest piece. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Black Knife Armor
armors.description: Scale armor used by the Black Knife Assassins, forged to make no sound. Traces of power yet remain in its concealing veil, which muffles the sound of footsteps. The assassins that carried out the deeds of the Night of the Black Knives were all women, and rumored to be Numen who had close ties with Marika herself.
armors.lore: Scale armor used by the Black Knife Assassins, forged to make no sound.
armors.special_effect: Wearer's movement becomes silent, Rolls, jumping and walking make no noise
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found on a corpse under an archway behind Ordina, Liturgical Town in Consecrated Grounds.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Blackflame Monk Armor
armors.description: Black iron armor adorned with ashen cloth.Attire of the Blackflame Monks.The Blackflame Monks, enthralled by the god-slaying black flame, became traitors, abandoning their posts as guardians. The seduction of a taboo is never easily spurned.
armors.lore:
Black iron armor adorned with ashen cloth.
Attire of the Blackflame Monks.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop from Blackflame Monks.

armors.name: Bloodhound Knight Armor
armors.description: Metal armor with a jutting breastplate. Worn by the Bloodhound Knights. The Bloodhound Knights are trained as hunters and known to be unshakable trackers. Without the use of language, each knight chooses his own master. Once the decision has been made, the knight stays loyal for life.
armors.lore:
Metal armor with a jutting breastplate.
Worn by the Bloodhound Knights.
armors.how_to_acquire: The entire Bloodhound Knight Set drops in Gelmir Hero's Grave - Mt. Gelmir. Dropped by the Bloodhound Knight guarding the Gelmir Knight Set pickup. The set must then be picked up from the corpse of the Knight. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Blue Cloth Vest
armors.description: Vest of a nomadic warrior. The blue color of its fabric symbolizes brisk waters, as fluid and flowing as the sword in the hand of its wearer.Just as still waters turn foul, stagnation leads to decay. Warriors must remain ever drifting.
armors.lore:
Vest of a nomadic warrior.
The blue color of its fabric symbolizes brisk waters, as fluid and flowing as the sword in the hand of its wearer.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Warrior Class.Purchasable from Isolated Merchant (Raya Lucaria).Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Blue Silver Mail Armor
armors.description: Chainmail armor crafted with blue silver. Worn by the wolf-riding Albinauric archers. Blue silver is a metal born from the same mother as the archers themselves, and provides protection from magic and frost.
armors.lore:
Chainmail armor crafted with blue silver.
Worn by the wolf-riding Albinauric archers.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop from Albinauric archers at Ordina, Liturgical Town.

armors.name: Briar Armor
armors.description: Battered iron armor from a foreign land.Worn by Elemer of the Briar. The winding, rusted iron briars are a mark of the guilty and typically indicate a sentence of death. They also cause this armor to deal damage when performing dodge rolls.Elemer murdered numerous instructors and merchants, and was known as the Bell Bearing Hunter.
armors.special_effect: Deals damage when rolling into targets. Damage increases exponentially with more briar pieces
armors.how_to_acquire: Purchased from the Palm Reader in Roundtable Hold after defeating Elemer of the Briar in The Shaded Castle

armors.name: Bull-Goat Armor
armors.description: Great Horned Tragoth's armor. Covers its wearer with a pair of giant horns, providing staunch poise. Tragoth is a famed knight of assistance. Countless Tarnished, facing adversity in the Lands Between, have survived thanks only to the Great Horned One's aid.
armors.lore: Great Horned Tragoth's armor. Covers its wearer with a pair of giant horns, providing staunch poise.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found after killing Patches' assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Great Horned Tragoth.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Carian Knight Armor
armors.description: Armor of the enchanted knights that once served the Carian royal family.The enchanted knights, anointed by the Lunar Queen, were heroes of the highest honors, but fell into disarray with the decline of the royal family.
armors.lore: Armor of the enchanted knights that once served the Carian royal family.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found in a chest behind Sorceress Sellen, in Ruined Cellar, Post Town Remains.You can find the Carian Knight Set in Raya Lucaria Academy.Elden Ring Map hereTo find the Carian Knight Set, you will need to fast travel back to the Church of the Cuckoo site and head to the graveyard section, specifically where the large rotating lift is. On the right side of the gate's entrance, look down as you are hugging the wall to find a platform that you can drop to. Walk on the narrow path and you'll notice a group of Glintstone Zombies worshipping a statue, simply kill the enemies and pick up the glowing item next to the statue to receive the set.

armors.name: Chain Armor
armors.description: Armor made of woven chain. Standard issue for ordinary soldiers. Though plain in appearance, it offers dependable protection.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found at Church of Elleh, purchased from Merchant Kale. It costs 1500 Runes.Elden Ring Map hereCan be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Kale's Bell Bearing.

armors.name: Chain-Draped Tabard
armors.description: Padded cloth armor with a chainmail shawl draped over the shoulders. Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.
armors.lore: Padded cloth armor with a chainmail shawl draped over the shoulders.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Soldiers.

armors.name: Champion Pauldron
armors.description: Pauldron reserved for the badlands' bravest. Proof that the wearer has slaughtered countless foes. Following the example of their chieftain Hoarah Loux, the brave warriors of the badlands shun excess adornment.
armors.lore:
Pauldron reserved for the badlands' bravest.
Proof that the wearer has slaughtered countless foes.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Hero Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in south Caelid for 1,500 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Cleanrot Armor
armors.description: Armor of the Cleanrot Knights, celebrated for their undefeated campaign in the Shattering.The Cleanrot Knights vowed to fight alongside Malenia, despite the inevitable, if gradual, putrefaction of their flesh. Their acceptance of their fate made these battles fiercest of all.
armors.lore: Armor of the Cleanrot Knights, celebrated for their undefeated campaign in the Shattering.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from Cleanrot Knights in Inner Aeonia, Caelid.

armors.name: Cloth Garb
armors.description: Clothing made of coarse material, commonly worn in the Lands Between.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found at the chest located at the end of Murkwater Cave, alongside Cloth Trousers.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Commoner's Garb
armors.description: Garb with a thick embroidered cape attached.Standard wear for commoners of the Lands Between.The board hung from the neck depicts a sprawling tree, its rootsand branches forming two holes. This is a self-imposed shackle, avoluntary display of allegiance to the Erdtree that increases faith.
armors.lore:
Garb with a thick embroidered cape attached.
Standard wear for commoners of the Lands Between.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Commoner enemies found in Stormveil Castle, Leyndell, Royal Capital, and other areas of the map.

armors.name: Commoner's Simple Garb
armors.description: Garb with a modest cloth cape attached. Standard wear for commoners of the Lands Between. The board hung from the neck depicts a sprawling tree, its roots and branches forming two holes. This is a self-imposed shackle, a voluntary display of allegiance to the Erdtree that increases faith.
armors.lore:
Garb with a modest cloth cape attached.
Standard wear for commoners of the Lands Between.
armors.how_to_acquire: Location: Stormveil Castle.Elden Ring Map hereLooted off a corpse that is located at the balcony of the inner gatehouse of the castle's main gate. The safest way to reach this room is by entering through the back of the castle since the enemies that are guarding the main gate and the front won't expect you to be coming in from behind.

armors.name: Confessor Armor
armors.description: Black leather armor for blending in with the darkness. Worn by church confessors. The churches outside the Lands Between, dedicated to the teachings of the Two Fingers, send confessors out to follow the guidance of grace. The confessors are loyal servants to the Two Fingers, ready to hunt down and quietly dispose of their enemies.
armors.lore:
Black leather armor for blending in with the darkness.
Worn by church confessors.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Confessor Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for 1500 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Crucible Axe Armor
armors.description: Armor of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. Worn by the knight Ordovis and his men. Holds the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations.
armors.lore: Armor of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord.
armors.special_effect: Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Crucible Knight Ordovis.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Crucible Tree Armor
armors.description: Armor of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. Worn by the knight Siluria and her men. Holds the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations.
armors.lore: Armor of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord.
armors.special_effect: Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations
armors.how_to_acquire: The whole set is found in a chest within Deeproot Depths behind a Boss: Crucible Knight Siluria. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Cuckoo Surcoat
armors.description: Armor worn by Raya Lucaria Academy soldiers. The surcoat depicts twinned cuckoos peering into a flourishing mass of glintstone. To a glintstone sorcerer, the body is a transient thing. The Cuckoo alone knows its insignificance, yet watches over it all the same.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from Raya Lucaria Soldiers.Easily farmed from the Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Caria Manor after the Manor Lower Level site of grace.

armors.name: Deathbed Dress
armors.description: Extremely thin and sheer white dress worn by the Deathbed Companion as she embraces the dead.Slowly replenishes the HP of nearby allies, but not that of the wearer.The touch of the fabric is exceedingly soft, so as not to harm even the most withered corpse, while still sharing her warmth.
armors.special_effect: Slowly replenishes the HP of nearby allies, but not that of the wearer.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Depraved Perfumer Robe
armors.description: Robe worn by depraved perfumers.The embroidery on the apron is itself a curse upon the Erdtree.These heresy-inclined perfumers imbibe their own spices to alter body and mind. Their slow descent into self-destruction is what earned them their name.
armors.lore:
Robe worn by depraved perfumers.
The embroidery on the apron is itself a curse upon the Erdtree.
armors.how_to_acquire: Acquire this from the enemy directly up the hill from the site of grace at the Village of the Albinaurics. He is the enemy who wields fire, you may have to kill him a few times to get it.The Depraved Perfumer Set can also be farmed from the Depraved Perfumer enemies located around The Shaded Castle.

armors.name: Eccentric's Armor
armors.description: Unusually colorful armor. Worn by the knight Jerren. Jerren preferred a nomadic existence, but after spending time as a guest of the Carian royals, he became a guest commander for General Radahn. And for the first time, the restless tumbleweed would be bound by honorable oath.
armors.lore:
Unusually colorful armor.
Worn by the knight Jerren.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops for defeating Witch-Hunter Jerren.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Elden Lord Armor
armors.description: Armor of Godfrey the first Elden Lord.The age of the Erdtree began amongst conflict, when Godfrey was lord of the battlefield.He led the War against the Giants. Faced the Storm Lord, alone. And then, there came a moment. When his last worthy enemy fell. And it was then, as the story is told, that the hue of Lord Godfrey's eyes faded.
armors.lore: Armor of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord.
armors.how_to_acquire: Available from Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Godfrey, First Elden Lord and Hoarah Loux, Warrior.

armors.name: Erdtree Surcoat
armors.description: Armor worn by soldiers sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell. The surcoat bears a majestic likeness of the Erdtree. Its golden backing is an honor bestowed on no other soldiers.
armors.lore: Armor worn by soldiers sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Erdtree Surcoat Chest Armor occasionally drops from Leyndell Soldiers.

armors.name: Errant Sorcerer Robe
armors.description: Commonplace robe made of thick cloth. Worn by the Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm, one of the first Tarnished to visit Roundtable Hold. A silent seeker of sorcery, who had gone so far as to make contact with the primeval current, Wilhelm was led by guidance into confrontation with his friend Vargram, and it is said that he was then taken prisoner in Roundtable Hold.
armors.lore:
Commonplace robe made of thick cloth.
Worn by the Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm, one of the first Tarnished to visit Roundtable Hold.
armors.how_to_acquire: Looted off a corpse in Hermit Village, Mt. Gelmir. The corpse is found in a house in the northeast corner of the village.Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Exile Armor
armors.description: Damaged armor draped with a large deep-red cloth. Worn by soldiers sent to the penal colonies.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Castle Guards

armors.name: Eye Surcoat
armors.description: Brown surcoat draped over chainmail. The insignia emblazoned on the front marks out the wearer as the eyes and ears of Sir Gideon the All-Knowing.
armors.how_to_acquire: Eye Surcoat can be found on the ground in the boss arena of Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy. Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Fia's Robe
armors.description: Robe of black cloth that covers the entire body.Worn by Fia, the Deathbed Companion, on her journey after being exiled from her home.The fabric itself is soft as silk and thin enough that those embraced can feel every pulse; every bit of her warmth.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found on Fia's location after progressing her questline and defeating Lichdragon Fortissax.

armors.name: Fia's Robe (Altered)
armors.description: Worn by Fia, the Deathbed Companion, on her journey after being exiled from her home.
armors.how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Fia's Robe if you have it in your possession.

armors.name: Fell Omen Cloak
armors.description: "A cloak of ragged fur worn about the exposed body of Margit, the Fell Omen.Having slaughtered countless champions during the Shattering, the Fell Omen has become a horror to those who harbor ambitions for the Erdtree, or for Lordship."
armors.lore: A cloak of ragged fur worn about the exposed body of Margit, the Fell Omen.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Fell Omen Cloak Chest Armor can be purchased from Enia in the Roundtable Hold after the player has defeated Morgott.

armors.name: Finger Maiden Robe
armors.description: Robe worn by maidens who serve the Two Fingers. The maidens live to serve a chosen Tarnished, sharing their guidance and the wisdom of the Two Fingers. The guidance of grace would ensure that the pair be brought together. Or at least, such was the promise long ago.
armors.lore: Robe worn by maidens who serve the Two Fingers.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found inside Church of Inhibition directly beside a Grace. Run past NPC invader to touch Grace first.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Fire Monk Armor
armors.description: Black iron armor adorned with a red cloth.Attire of the Fire Monks.The grotesque face sculpted on the chest is said to depict the corrupt ancient god of the flame.Taboos transform into lasting obsessions by virtue of the fear that they inspire.
armors.lore:
Black iron armor adorned with a red cloth.
Attire of the Fire Monks.
armors.how_to_acquire: Pieces of the Fire Monk armor set are dropped by Fire Monk Abbots found at a few camps and patrols in Liurnia of the Lakes.

armors.name: Fur Raiment
armors.description: Raiment fashioned from a bristly pelt.Worn by ancestral follower warriors.The ancestral followers keep their distance from the Erdtree,awaiting new buds. They are certain to sprout from their veryflesh, and indeed, their souls.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Ancestral Follower.

armors.name: Gelmir Knight Armor
armors.description: Armor worn by knights once loyal to Praector Rykard.It bears an emblem that none wear any longer, standing as it does for a lord that fell from loft ambition into gluttonous depravity. As the lord lost his dignity, so too did these knights lose their master.
armors.lore: Armor worn by knights once loyal to Praetor Rykard.
armors.how_to_acquire: You can loot the entire Gelmir Knight Set in the Gelmir Hero's Grave dungeon from a Gelmir Knight corpse. Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Godrick Knight Armor
armors.description: Armor worn by knights loyal to Godrick The Grafted.Its left breast is emblazoned with a two-headed war axe, an emblem of the golden lineage. The knights surely boasted of their strength in days long gone.
armors.lore: Armor worn by knights loyal to Godrick the Grafted.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Godrick Knights.

armors.name: Godskin Apostle Robe
armors.description: Robe made by sewing together patches of smooth skin.Worn by the Godskin Apostles.The apostles, once said to serve Destined Death, are wielders of the god-slaying black flame. But after their defeat by Maliketh, the Black Blade, the source of their power was sealed away.
armors.lore:
Robe made by sewing together patches of smooth skin.
Worn by the Godskin Apostles.
armors.how_to_acquire: Defeating Godskin Apostle, located at the bottom of Divine Tower of Caelid.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Tree-and-Beast Surcoat
armors.description: Armor worn by soldiers loyal to Godrick the Grafted.The surcoat depicts the distant Erdtree and the beast regent, an emblem of the golden lineage.Both are symbols of glory now past.
armors.lore: Armor worn by soldiers loyal to Godrick the Grafted.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Godrick Soldiers.Easily farmed at the Gatefront Ruins.

armors.name: Haligtree Crest Surcoat
armors.description: Armor worn by soldiers sworn to the Haligtree. The surcoat bears the crest of the Haligtree. Though watered with Miquella's own blood since it was a sapling, the Haligtree ultimately failed to grow into an Erdtree.
armors.lore: Armor worn by soldiers sworn to the Haligtree.
armors.how_to_acquire: Haligtree Soldiers drop all pieces of the set. They are located throughout all areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

armors.name: Highwayman Cloth Armor
armors.description: Hideously stained and ragged cloth armor.Worn by former foot soldiers who have turned to banditry.
armors.lore:
Hideously stained and ragged cloth armor.
Worn by former foot soldiers who have turned to banditry.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by the Bandits found in Murkwater Cave.

armors.name: Hoslow's Armor
armors.description: Garish silver armor decorated with red embellishments. Passed down through the Hoslow family. When Juno Hoslow received an invitation to the Volcano Manor, he discreetly refused. "I have already walked many a road drenched in blood, yet never would I consider myself a champion."
armors.lore:
Garish silver armor decorated with red embellishments.
Passed down through the Hoslow family.
armors.how_to_acquire: All pieces of Hoslow's Set are dropped by Juno Hoslow along with Hoslow's Petal Whip as part of the final contract for the Volcano Manor questline.Juno Hoslow is a Hostile NPC that you can invade after progressing through the questline. His invade rune be found in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants, east of Shack of the Lofty.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Juvenile Scholar Robe
armors.description: Robe worn by young academy scholars, the juveniles birthed anew by the amber egg of Queen Rennala, the head of Raya Lucaria Academy. Yet their rebirth is not without imperfections, and thus do they repeat the process, eventually becoming utterly dependent upon it. Rebirth is as sleep to them, and with each awakening, memory fades into oblivion.
armors.lore: Robe worn by young academy scholars, the juveniles birthed anew by the amber egg of Queen Rennala, the head of Raya Lucaria Academy.
armors.how_to_acquire: Collect the Resurrection Painting from the Artist's Shack in eastern Liurnia. Elden Ring Map LinkWith the painting on hand, head to the graveyard area east of Caria Manor. This location is only accessible after completing the manor and defeating Royal Knight Loretta. The item is found by touching a ghost sitting on a chair at the graveyard. The ghost disappears as soon as you touch it and the Juvenile Scholar Robe will appear on the ground along with a Juvenile Scholar Cap and 1 x Larval Tear. Elden Ring Map Link

armors.name: Knight Armor
armors.description: Iron armor of an unknown knight. It is made of thin iron plate. Such metal armor is heavy, but provides considerable damage negation.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from the Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold for 4,500 Runes.

armors.name: Kaiden Armor
armors.description: Armor worn by Kaiden sellswords. These hulking, fearless mercenaries, said to hail from the mountaintops of the wintry north, are adept at fighting on horseback. Kaiden is the name of their home settlement.
armors.lore:
Armor worn by Kaiden sellswords.
Made with the pelt of a snow-wolf, which protects against the cold.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Northern Mercenaries and Mounted Northern Mercenaries found in Limgrave.

armors.name: Land of Reeds Armor
armors.description: Armor made from strips of iron fastened together. Worn by warriors of the Land of Reeds. The grimy outer mantle is made from withered reeds from the warrior's birthplace.Perhaps its comforts extend to nostalgic thoughts of home.Altered:The Land of Reeds has long been locked in a miserable civil war, during which time it has remained alienated from the cultures of its neighbors. Little wonder that the entire nation has succumbed to the blood-soaked madness, or so it has said.
armors.lore:
Armor made from strips of iron fastened together.
Worn by warriors of the Land of Reeds.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class.Sold by Isolated Merchant Dragonbarrow for 1,500 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Leather-Draped Tabard
armors.description: Padded cloth armor with a leather shawl draped over the shoulders.Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.
armors.lore: Padded cloth armor with a leather shawl draped over the shoulders.
armors.how_to_acquire: Chance to drop from regular Soldier enemies found in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

armors.name: Lionel's Armor
armors.description: Round iron armor with a banner extending from its back. Worn by the Lionel the Lionhearted. When this chivalrous dauntless knight met Fia, who had been driven from her home, he declared himself to be her father.
armors.lore:
Round iron armor with a banner extending from its back.
Worn by Lionel the Lionhearted.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Lord of Blood's Robe
armors.description: Attire of Mohg, Lord of Blood, embroidered with an extravagant gold emblem on black cloth. The dress of a Luminary, the reigning lord and hierarch of the coming dynasty of Mohgwyn. Or perhaps, of a raving lunatic.
armors.lore: Attire of Mohg, Lord of Blood, embroidered with an extravagant gold emblem on black cloth.
armors.how_to_acquire: This becomes available for purchase for 20,000 Runes from Enia at Roundtable Hold after you defeat Mohg, Lord of Blood.

armors.name: Malformed Dragon Armor
armors.description: Malformed golden armor. Adorned with various dragon imagery and worn by the misshapen Tree Sentinels. After the great ancient dragon Gransax attacked, the sentinels had an epiphany. The only way to truly protect the Erdtree was to become dragons themselves.
armors.lore:
Malformed golden armor.
Adorned with various dragon imagery and worn by the misshapen Tree Sentinels.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be obtained from killing the Tree Sentinel up the stairs from the Beside the Great Bridge site of grace. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Maliketh's Armor
armors.description: Beast's armor made of black iron and decorated with gold. Worn by Maliketh the Black Blade. Maliketh, Queen Marika's loyal half-brother, bore a blade imbued with Destined Death, and there was not one demigod who did not fear him. Champions knew what was at stake. Indeed, that is what made them champions.
armors.lore:
Beast's armor made of black iron and decorated with gold.
Worn by Maliketh the Black Blade.
armors.how_to_acquire: Bought from the Palm Reader in the Roundtable Hold after defeating Maliketh, the Black Blade.

armors.name: Marais Robe
armors.description: Robe with a black mantle across the shoulders. Customarily worn by the head of House Marais.The sons of House Marais are all sickly born. Little wonder that Maleigh Marais would be so beguiled by the beautiful and fierce goddess who was born into rot.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan in the fields west of The Shaded Castle. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Millicent's Robe
armors.description: Robe worn by Millicent the Rotting
armors.how_to_acquire: This armor piece is not currently obtainable.

armors.name: Millicent's Tunic
armors.description: Tunic worn by Millicent the Rotting
armors.how_to_acquire: This armor piece is not currently obtainable.

armors.name: Mushroom Body
armors.description: Mushrooms found growing all over the body. These overgrown mushroom have colonized the torso. To those enraptured by the scarlet rot, they are holy vestments that root one to the earth.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found in a cavern in Seethewater Cave filled with mushroom people and a Giant Poison Flower.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Noble's Traveling Garb
armors.description: Traveling attire fashioned from metallic white silk thread. Worn by expatriated royalty. A gift of such rare beauty, a royal wouldn't disgrace their illustrious heritage even if found dead, in a ditch, in the middle of nowhere, while wearing such splendid raiment.
armors.lore: Traveling attire fashioned from metallic white silk thread. Worn by expatriated royalty.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Noble's Traveling Garb along with other pieces of the Noble's Set can be found at East Windmill Pasture, Altus Plateau, in a burning pile of corpses surrounded by a circle of dancing women. Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Old Aristocrat Gown
armors.description: Gown of soft cloth adorned with fine gold embroidery. Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital. Garb favored by the aged. Abandoning their birthplace after the Shattering, these undead wanderers are the pitiful product of unending life.
armors.lore:
Gown of soft cloth adorned with fine gold embroidery.
Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital. Garb favored by the aged.
armors.how_to_acquire: All pieces of the Old Aristocrat Set are dropped by the Old Aristocrat enemies, often found within larger groups of Aristocrats wandering the roads of most areas. The green cowl makes them easily distinguishable from other Aristocrats.

armors.name: Omenkiller Robe
armors.description: Robe worn by the Omenkillers, butchers of twisted conscience. Its thick apron is worn in remembrance Rollo, the progenitor of the Omenkillers and a perfumer of antiquity.
armors.lore: Robe worn by the Omenkillers, butchers of twisted conscience.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by an Omenkiller enemy at Perfumer's Ruins, together with Omenkiller Long Gloves and Omenkiller Boots. Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Perfumer's Traveling Garb
armors.description: Garb of a traveling perfumer of no renown. An associate of a healer, he is said to be in search of new aromatics and flower gardens, in hopes of treating Misbegotten, Omen and all those seen as impure.
armors.lore: Garb of a traveling perfumer of no renown.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found in a corpse in one of the corners of the buildings within Street of Sages Ruins, in Caelid's Swamp area, alongside the entire Perfumer Traveler's Set.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Preceptor's Long Gown
armors.description: A long, bright blue gown with the movements of the stars drawn upon it. Worn by the magic preceptors who served the Carian royals. Glintstone sorcerers are the descendants of astrologers, a fact that the Carians remain aware of. Even if their fate has been long severed from the stars.
armors.lore:
A long, bright blue gown with the movements of the stars drawn upon it.
Worn by the magic preceptors who served the Carian royals.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found on Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Prisoner Clothing
armors.description: Tattered clothing. Worn by a prisoner convicted of an appalling crime. Never once washed, every fiber is filthy.
armors.lore:
Tattered clothing.
Worn by a prisoner convicted of an appalling crime.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Prisoner Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Ainsel River for 1500 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Prophet Robe
armors.description: Robe of exiled prophets who foretold misfortune and were persecuted and driven from their homes as a result. The shackles around the neck warn passersby not to lend an ear to their sermons.Altered:Made from rough fabric that scrapes against the slin like a sharpening file.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Prophet Class.Can be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for 1,500 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Queen's Robe
armors.description: Robe indicating the highest order of sorcerer. Worn by Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon. When Rennala, head of both the Academy of Raya Lucaria and the Carian royal family, lost her husband Radagon, her heart went along with him. And then, those at the academy realized. That Rennala was no champion, after all.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Queen's Robe can be purchased to Enia in Roundtable Hold for 10,000 Need to defeat Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon Bossfight first.

armors.name: Radahn's Lion Armor
armors.description: Armor depicting the golden lion.Worn by General Radahn.The golden lion is said to symbolize Godfrey, the Elden Lord, and his beast regent, Serosh. From his youngest years, Radahn was naturally captivated by the Lord of the Battlefield.
armors.lore:
Armor depicting the golden lion.
Worn by General Radahn.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for 12,000 runes once Starscourge Radahn has been defeated.

armors.name: Raging Wolf Armor
armors.description: Armor worn by Vargram the Raging Wolf, one of the first Tarnished to visit the Roundtable Hold. According to the old legends, wolves are the shadows of the Empyrean. Vargram aspired to such a state himself.
armors.lore: Armor worn by Vargram the Raging Wolf, one of the first Tarnished to visit the Roundtable Hold.
armors.how_to_acquire: Leyndell Royal Capital. After obtaining the second to last letter from Volcano Manor, You will be sent to assist Bernahl with an invade in a familiar location. On completion of the invade, You will receive the full Raging Wolf set. Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Raya Lucarian Robe
armors.description: Robe worn by Raya Lucaria's magic scholars. Those who dedicate themselves to the study of glintstones formed from starry amber receive this modest yet elegant deep blue garb along with their vows of virtue and austerity. But with extended life, one is apt to forget old vows.
armors.lore: Robe worn by Raya Lucaria's scholars of sorcery.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Raya Lucaria Sorcerer in Raya Lucaria Academy.

armors.name: Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak
armors.description: Thick, bristly cloak eaten through by scarlet rot.The symbol of an underground gravekeeper's station. Altered:Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum.The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes.
armors.lore: Thick, bristly cloak eaten through by scarlet rot.
armors.special_effect: Increases likelihood of being targeted by foes
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by the boss of Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs in Consecrated Snowfield, Putrid Grave Warden Duelist.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Ruler's Robe
armors.description: Luxurious robe worn by lords in a smaller nation. Its fine blue mantle serves to prove its wearer's status.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found on a corpse laying face-down on a carriage northeast of the Abandoned Coffin site of grace in west Altus Plateau, alongside the Ruler's Mask. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Sage Robe
armors.description: Thick burgundy robe. Attire of the wise sages who were deemed heretical. Evidence that the wearer was driven from town.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found in Stillwater Cave - Liurnia of the Lakes, just ahead and below the Lake Facing Cliffs, it's all sitting on a poison submerged corpse near the entrance, guarded by Giant Bats that will attack you when you take it. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Sanguine Noble Robe
armors.description: Robe of dyed black cloth featuring gold embroidery. Worn by the nobles who serve the Lord of Blood. The grand metallic pattern on the shoulder is a signifier of the noble rank they intend to claim upon the advent of the new dynasty they are working to install.
armors.lore:
Robe of dyed black cloth featuring gold embroidery.
Worn by the nobles who serve the Lord of Blood.
armors.how_to_acquire: The entire Noble Robe Set is dropped by Sanguine Noble NPC invasion in west Mountaintops of The Giants.Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Scale Armor
armors.description: Armor reinforced with small metal scales. The cape covering the shoulders is made with treated rock lizard skin, and provides ample protection against fire.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for 2400 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Scaled Armor
armors.description: Armor worn by Old Knight Istvan.The corroded metal is reinforced with rock-hard scales, making it high effective against non-physical attacks.Istvan is one of a few wizened Tarnished who survived to this day.
armors.lore:
Armor worn by Old Knight Istvan.
The corroded metal is reinforced with rock-hard scales, making it highly effective against non-physical attacks.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found after killing the first assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Old Knight Istvan. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Snow Witch Robe
armors.description: Witch's robe in the color of snow. Once worn by the snowy crone who the young Ranni encountered deep in the woods. She was a witch, and well versed in cold sorceries. It is said that the doll that houses Ranni's soul was modeled after her. That old witch was Ranni's secret mentor.
armors.lore: Witch's robe in the color of snow.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found in a chest on the upper floor of Renna's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Traveling Maiden Robe
armors.description: Robe worn by traveling maidens. Maidens traversed the Lands Between for different reasons. Some to seek audience with the Fingers. Others, to find the Tarnished who they were destined to guide.
armors.lore: Robe worn by traveling maidens.
armors.how_to_acquire: On a corpse inside the Shack of The Lofty in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants. The rest of the set can also be looted here. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Twinned Armor
armors.description: Armor depicting entwined twins of gold and silver. The two known as D are inseparable twins.They are of two bodies and two minds, but one single soul. Not once do they stand together; not one word do they speak to one another.Perhaps this armor longs to find its way to the other D.
armors.how_to_acquire: Earliest location: Limgrave East upon killing D, Hunter of the Dead. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Upper-Class Robe
armors.description: Embroidered, bright green robe worn by noble children. Donning such a robe is traditionally the child's first show of burgeoning independence.
armors.lore:
Embroidered, bright green robe worn by noble children.
Donning such a robe is traditionally the child's first show of burgeoning independence.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found at Leyndell Royal Capital, at the end of the passageway where you fight a few Perfumers.Elden Ring Map hereCan be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for 2,400 Runes.

armors.name: Vagabond Knight Armor
armors.description: Chest piece of a knight banished from their motherland. Dirty and battered after enduring a lengthy vagabond journey.The crest emblazoned on the front is worn and dingy, no longer able to evoke sentiment.Metal armor is heavy, but also study ordering significant damage negation.
armors.lore:
Chest piece of a knight banished from their motherland.
Dirty and battered after enduring a lengthy vagabond journey.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Vagabond Class.Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 1,500 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Veteran's Armor
armors.description: Old armor that has seen many battles. Worn by Niall, the veteran general of Sol. Niall was a lone survivor who commanded spirits to defend his long-passed master. This aging general could not die, nor did he have anywhere to fade away.
armors.lore:
Old armor that has seen many battles.
Worn by Niall, the veteran general of Sol.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after killing Commander Niall at Castle Sol Rooftop.

armors.name: White Reed Armor
armors.description: Armor of the White Reeds, fashioned from banded iron plates. Worn by the Inaba, head disciples of the great swordsman Okina. The Inaba traveled in pursuit of not only the master who abandoned them, but also proper deaths, won honorably through hard-fought combat. To be a White Reed is to seek death; fitting for the Inaba, who desired nothing more than to die by the sword.
armors.lore:
Armor of the White Reeds, fashioned from banded iron plates.
Worn by the Inaba, head disciples of the great swordsman Okina.
armors.how_to_acquire: Spiritcaller's Cave in the Mountaintops of the Giants: Found on a corpse in a long cavern filled with spirit wolves. The White Reed Gauntlets and White Reed Greaves can also be found on this corpse.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Zamor Armor
armors.description: Armor worn by knights of Zamor, hailed as heroes in the War against the Giants. These long-lived warriors, clad in biting, freezing winds, are said to have been the mortal enemies of the Fire Giants since time immemorial.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor fought at the Mountaintops of the Giants.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Marionette Soldier Armor
armors.description: Armor of metal bands arranged in a lattice.Worn by marionette soldiers, crafted to serve the sorcerers.The construction of this armor is remarkably crude, now rusted over and severely dented.For a doll, the only thing that matters is that it does not break.
armors.lore:
Armor of metal bands arranged in a lattice.
Worn by marionette soldiers, crafted to serve the sorcerers.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Marionette Soldier fought at Witchbane Ruins.

armors.name: Alberich's Robe (Altered)
armors.description: Mad Tongue Alberich's robe. Alberich was an aloof yet disturbed heretical sorcerer said to have been driven mad by jeering tongues during his service to the Roundtable Hold long ago.
armors.lore: Mad Tongue Alberich's robe.
armors.how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Alberich's Robe if you have it in your possession.

armors.name: All-Knowing Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor set with countless eyes and ears. Worn by Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing. Knowledge begins with the recognition of one's ignorance. The realization that the search for knowledge is unending. But when Gideon glimpsed into the will of Queen Marika, he shuddered in fear. At the end that should not be.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter All-Knowing Armor into All-Knowing Armor (Altered).

armors.name: Aristocrat Garb (Altered)
armors.description: High quality garb adorned with fine golden embroidery.Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital. Terribly faded and tattered.Abandoning their birthplace after the Shattering, these pitiful wanderers are the pitiful product of unending life.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from the Aristocrat enemies found wandering the roads in most areas.An early spot to farm them is the traveling carriage escort on the road north of the Agheel Lake South site of grace.

armors.name: Astrologer Robe (Altered)
armors.description: Robe fashioned from supple cloth. Worn by those who look to the cosmos above. They read fate in the stars, and are said to be heirs of the glintstone sorcerers. But alas, the night sky no longer cradles fate.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Astrologer Robe into Astrologer Tobe (Altered).

armors.name: Banished Knight Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Thick, full set of armor covering the entire body. This armor was worn by knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes. These fierce warriors were each and all accomplished. Perhaps that is why, despite their territorial losses, they were still named knights.
armors.lore:
Thick, full set of armor covering the entire body.
This helm was worn by knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes.
armors.how_to_acquire: Stormveil Castle. Dropped by the Banished Knight in the room with the human limbs hanging from the roof.Cathedral of Dragon Communion. Dropped by the Banished Knight patrolling the perimeter of the Cathedral.

armors.name: Battlemage Robe
armors.description: Robe worn by scholars of the Raya Lucaria Academy, tattered from being worn on the battlefield.Whenever war broke out and the academy sealed its gates, only Haima's scholars dared venture outside. Seclusion is no way to foster discovery; it is only a convenient form of escape.
armors.lore: Robe worn by scholars of the Raya Lucaria Academy scholar, tattered from being worn on the battlefield.
armors.how_to_acquire: This piece is dropped by Battlemage enemies.

armors.name: Beast Champion Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Silver armor engraved with tiny beasts.Worn by Bernahl the Recusant.Beasts are drawn to champions, and to lords. And this armor befits a champion worthy of becoming a lord. And that is what Bernahl was.Until his maiden threw herself into the fire.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. If not killed before, he will eventually invade you at Crumbling Farum Azula, dropping the entire set with an altered version of the chest piece. Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Black Knife Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor used by the Black Knife Assassins. Crafted with scale armor that makes no sound. The assassins that carried out the deeds of the Night of the Black Knives were all women, and rumored to be Numen who had close ties with Marika herself.
armors.lore:
Armor used by the Black Knife Assassins.
Crafted with scale armor that makes no sound.
armors.how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Black Knife Armor if you have it in your possession.

armors.name: Blaidd's Armor
armors.description: Well-worn black armor of the man-wolf BlaiddThe pelt serves as a cape, protecting from cold.Blaidd was the blade of Ranni, but the cold bothered him anyway.
armors.lore: Well-worn black armor of the man-wolf Blaidd.
armors.how_to_acquire: Following Ranni's questline, after she is given the Dark Moon Ring, return to Ranni's Rise and you will hear Blaidd talking to himself in front of the tower. When he finishes his dialogue he will turn hostile, and defeating him will grant the player Blaidd's Armor, Blaidd's Gauntlets, and Blaidd's Greaves (as well as the Royal Greatsword).Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Blaidd's Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Well-worn black armor of the man-wolf Blaidd. Blaidd, who served as Ranni's shadow, was a loyal ally who would defy destiny itself if it would have him turn upon his Lady.
armors.lore: Well-worn black armor of the man-wolf Blaidd.
armors.how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Blaidd's Armor if you have it in your possession.

armors.name: Bloodhound Knight Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Metal armor with a jutting breastplate. Worn by the Bloodhound Knights. The Bloodhound Knights are trained as hunters and known to be unshakable trackers. Without the use of language, each knight chooses his own master. Once the decision has been made, the knight stays loyal for life.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Bloodhound Knight Armor into Bloodhound Knight Armor (Altered).

armors.name: Bloodsoaked Tabard
armors.description: Padded cloth armor with indelible bloodstains around the neck.Worn by headless foot soldiers who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum.
armors.lore: Padded cloth armor with indelible bloodstains around the neck.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from Mausoleum Foot Soldiers.

armors.name: Blue Festive Garb
armors.description: Ceremonial garb worn by dancers at the festivities in Dominula, the village of windmills. Use of this garb, dyed in a stunning blue, is only permitted for the young maids who play the central role in the festival.
armors.lore: Ceremonial garb worn by dancers at the festivities in Dominula, the village of windmills.
armors.how_to_acquire: The set pieces are dropped by dancers in Dominula, Windmill Village. The regular festive set is dropped by those wearing the yellow hood and garb.

armors.name: Blue Silver Mail Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Chainmail armor crafted with blue silver. Worn by the wolf-riding Albinauric archers. Blue silver is a metal born from the same mother as the archers themselves, and provides protection from magic and frost.
armors.how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Blue Silver Mail Armor, if you have it in your possession.

armors.name: Brave's Battlewear
armors.description: Battlewear fashioned from leather armor adorned with a large sheet of cloth. Garb worn by warriors of the frigid uplands. The red cloth signifies participation in the Long March long, long ago and this ceremonial garb beseeches the favor of the Warrior King who led them.
armors.lore:
Battlewear fashioned from leather armor
adorned with a large sheet of cloth.
Garb worn by warriors of the frigid uplands.
armors.how_to_acquire: This Chest Armor is currently unobtainable.

armors.name: Brave's Battlewear (Altered)
armors.description: Helm wrapped in thick leather. Garb worn by warriors of the frigid uplands.
armors.lore:
Helm wrapped in thick leather.
Garb worn by warriors of the frigid uplands.
armors.how_to_acquire: This Chest Armor is currently unobtainable.

armors.name: Briar Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Battered iron armor from a foreign land. Worn by Elemer of the Briar. The winding, rusted iron briars are a mark of the guilty, and typically indicate a sentence of death. They also cause this armor to deal damage when performing dodge rolls. Elemer murdered numerous instructors and merchants, and was known as the Bell Bearing Hunter.
armors.how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Briar Armor, if you have it in your possession.

armors.name: Carian Knight Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor of the enchanted knights that once served the Carian royal family. The enchanted knights, anointed by the Lunar Queen, were all heroes of the highest honors, but fell into disarray with the decline of the royal family.
armors.lore:
Black iron armor worn by drake knights.
Features the spoils of a dragon catch as an emblem of pride as both dragon hunter and partaker of communion.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Carian Knight Armor into Carian Knight Armor (Altered).

armors.name: Cleanrot Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor of the Cleanrot Knights, celebrated for their undefeated campaign in the Shattering. The Cleanrot Knights vowed to fight alongside Malenia, despite the inevitable, if gradual, putrefaction of their flesh. Their acceptance of their fate made these battles the fiercest of all.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Cleanrot Armor into Cleanrot Armor (Altered).

armors.name: Commoner's Garb (Altered)
armors.description: Garb decorated with intricate embroidery.Standard wear for commoners of the Lands Between.The board hung from the neck depicts a sprawling tree, its roots and branches forming two holes. This is a self-imposed shackle, a voluntary display of allegiance to the Erdtree that increases faith.
armors.lore:
Garb decorated with intricate embroidery.
Standard wear for commoners of the Lands Between.
armors.how_to_acquire: Commoner's Garb is dropped by Commoner enemies found in Stormveil Castle, Leyndell, Royal Capital, and other areas of the map.

armors.name: Commoner's Simple Garb (Altered)
armors.description: Modest garb made of cloth.Standard wear for Commoners of the Lands Between.The board hung from the neck depicts a sprawling tree, its roots and branches forming two holes. This is a self-imposed shackle, a voluntary display of allegiance to the Erdtree that increases faith.
armors.lore:
Modest garb made of cloth.
Standard wear for commoners of the Lands Between.
armors.how_to_acquire: Commoner's Simple Garb is found Stormveil Castle. Located on a corpse on the balcony just outside the Gateside Chamber site of grace room.

armors.name: Confessor Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Black leather armor for blending in with the darkness. Worn by church confessors. The churches outside the Lands Between, dedicated to the teachings of the Two Fingers, send confessors out to follow the guidance of grace. The confessors are loyal servants to the Two Fingers, ready to hunt down and quietly dispose of their enemies.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Confessor Armor into Confessor Armor (Altered).

armors.name: Consort's Robe
armors.description: Fine robe of white silk worn by Tanith, Lady of the Volcano Manor.Long ago, when Rykard first set eyes on Tanith, she was working as a dancer in a foreign land. Soon, he made her his consort.She was the only human to remain by his side when he became the serpent of blasphemy.In that moment, Tanith was truly charmed by him.
armors.lore: Fine robe of white silk worn by Tanith, Lady of the Volcano Manor.
armors.how_to_acquire: Looted from the corpse of Tanith after attacking her and defeating the summoned Tanith's Knight near the Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy Site of Grace in Volcano Manor, Altus Plateau. Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Corhyn's Robe
armors.description: Robe of Corhyn the cleric.Even after exile, Corhyn refused to recant his prophecies. And for this, he was blessed with the guidance of grace.Since then, the cart wheel draped on his neck has served as a reminder. That true guidance awaits those with iron wills. Those with unwavering faith.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Corhyn at the end of his questline, in Leyndell, Capital of Ash. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Crucible Axe Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. Worn by the knight Ordovis and his men. Holds the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations.
armors.special_effect: Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Crucible Axe Armor into Crucible Axe Armor (Altered).

armors.name: Crucible Tree Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. Worn by the knight Siluria and her men. Holds the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations.
armors.special_effect: Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Crucible Tree Armor into Crucible Tree Armor (Altered).

armors.name: Cuckoo Knight Armor
armors.description: Armor worn by Raya Lucaria Academy knights.Its left breast is emblazoned with a peering cuckoo, whence came their name.Perhaps the bird's shrewd gaze is an expression of their refusal to be mere servants of the academy.
armors.lore: Armor worn by Raya Lucaria Academy knights.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped from Raya Lucaria Academy Knights, also referred to as Cuckoo Knights. There are three nearby to the East Raya Lucaria Gate site of grace.

armors.name: Cuckoo Knight Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor worn by Raya Lucaria Academy knights. Its left breast is emblazoned with a peering cuckoo, whence came their name. Perhaps the bird's shrewd gaze is an expression of their refusal to be mere servants of the academy.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped from Raya Lucaria Academy Knights, also referred to as Cuckoo Knights. There are three nearby to the East Raya Lucaria Gate site of grace.

armors.name: Depraved Perfumer Robe (Altered)
armors.description: Robe worn by depraved perfumers. The embroidery on the apron is itself a curse upon the Erdtree. These heresy-inclined perfumers imbibe their own spices to alter body and mind. Their slow descent into self-destruction is what earned them their name.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from Depraved Perfumers.

armors.name: Dirty Chainmail
armors.description: Chainmail worn by young Albinaurics.The appearance of a protruding belly provides no benefits worthy of note.
armors.lore:
Chainmail worn by young Albinaurics.
The appearance of a protruding belly provides no benefits worthy of note.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by the Second Generation Albinaurics that are visibly wearing the chest piece.An easily farmable group of 4 is located near the Academy Gate Town site of grace in Liurnia of the Lakes. Head northwest from the site of grace until you reach an L-shaped building with a small tower at the corner. There will be 2 on the left sloped roof and 2 near the tower that can all drop the chest.

armors.name: Drake Knight Armor
armors.description: Black iron armor worn by drake knights.Features the spoils of a dragon catch as an emblem of pride as both dragon hunter and partake of communion.The cape is crafted with dragon wing membrane.Altered:From birth, drake knights speak not a word. They spend their lives pursuing the strength of dragons, for its sublime beauty and inspiration of awe.
armors.lore:
Black iron armor worn by drake knights.
Features the spoils of a dragon catch as an emblem of pride as both dragon hunter and partaker of communion.
armors.how_to_acquire: You can find the Drake Knight Set in Crumbling Farum Azula.Travel to the Beside The Great Bridge site of grace and go in the opposite direction of the boss room. Go through the building and outside onto the balcony. From here drop down to the Beastman with the big cleaver. Go along the bridge and call up the elevator. Ride the Elevator down and go Outside. The Drake Knight Set is on the left in a big chest. [Elden Ring Map here]

armors.name: Drake Knight Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Black iron armor worn by drake knights. Features the spoils of a dragon catch as an emblem of pride as both dragon hunter and partaker of communion. From birth, drake knights speak not a word. They spend their lives pursuing the strength of dragons, for its sublime beauty and inspiration of awe.
armors.lore:
Black iron armor worn by drake knights.
Features the spoils of a dragon catch as an emblem of pride as both dragon hunter and partaker of communion.
armors.how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Drake Knight Armor, if you have it in your possession.

armors.name: Elden Lord Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. The age of the Erdtree began amongst conflict, when Godfrey was lord of the battlefield. He led the War against the Giants. Faced the Storm Lord, alone. And then, there came a moment. When his last worthy enemy fell. And it was then, as the story is told, that the hue of Lord Godfrey's eyes faded.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Elden Lord Armor into Elden Lord Armor (Altered).

armors.name: Errant Sorcerer Robe (Altered)
armors.description: Commonplace robe made of thick cloth. Worn by the Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm, one of the first Tarnished to visit Roundtable Hold. A silent seeker of sorcery, who had gone so far as to make contact with the primeval current, Wilhelm was led by guidance into confrontation with his friend Vargram, and it is said that he was then taken prisoner in Roundtable Hold.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Errant Sorcerer Robe into Errant Sorcerer Robe (Altered).

armors.name: Festive Garb
armors.description: Ceremonial garb worn by dancers at the festivities in Dominula, the village of windmills.Faintly bloodstained.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by yellow clothed dancers in Dominula, Windmill Village.

armors.name: Festive Garb (Altered)
armors.description: Ceremonial garb worn by dancers at the festivities in Dominula, the village of windmills.Faintly bloodstained.
armors.how_to_acquire: Item dropped by the dancing women at Windmill Village, Altus Plateau.This item is a drop only and cannot be created by altering the Festive Garb.

armors.name: Finger Maiden Robe (Altered)
armors.description: Robe worn by maidens who serve the Two Fingers. The maidens live to serve a chosen Tarnished, sharing their guidance and the wisdom of the Two Fingers. The guidance of grace would ensure that the pair be brought together. Or at least, such was the promise long ago.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Finger Maiden Robe into Finger Maiden Robe (Altered).

armors.name: Fingerprint Armor
armors.description: Iron armor singed and blistered by fingers.Worn by Vyke, knight of the Roundtable Hold.No other Tarnished was closer to the throne of the Elden Lord than Vyke. But without announcement, Vyke traveled far below the capital, and was scorched by the flame of frenzy.Did he make his choice for his maiden, or did some other force lure him with suggestion?
armors.lore:
Iron armor singed and blistered by fingers.
Worn by Vyke, knight of the Roundtable Hold.
armors.how_to_acquire: Lord Contender's Evergaol: Dropped by Roundtable Knight Vyke upon defeat. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Fingerprint Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Iron armor singed and blistered by fingers. Worn by Vyke, knight of the Roundtable Hold. No other Tarnished was closer to the throne of the Elden Lord than Vyke. But without announcement, Vyke traveled far below the capital, and was scorched by the flame of frenzy. Did he make his choice for his maiden, or did some other force lure him with suggestion?
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Fingerprint Armor into Fingerprint Armor (Altered).

armors.name: Fire Prelate Armor
armors.description: Black iron armor adorned with a red cloth.Attire of the Fire Prelates, commanders of the Fire Monks.The weighty frames of the Prelates symbolized the onus of their grave vows as guardians of the flame. "Etch this sight upon thine breast. Of my thunderous gravity."
armors.lore:
Black iron armor adorned with a red cloth.
Attire of the Fire Prelates, commanders of the Fire Monks.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Fire Prelate enemies.The altered version without the red tabard is dropped by one found in Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir.The non-altered version is dropped by one found in Guardians' Garrison in Mountaintop of the Giants. Drops from Fire Prelate wielding it nearby Whiteridge Road grace. Mob has 5638 HP total (Non-NG)

armors.name: Fire Prelate Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Black iron armor. Attire of the Fire Prelates, commanders of the Fire Monks. The weighty frames of the Prelates symbolized the onus of their grave vows as guardians of the flame. "Etch this sight upon thine breast. Of my thunderous gravity."
armors.lore:
Black iron armor.
Attire of the Fire Prelates, commanders of the Fire Monks.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from Fire Prelates.

armors.name: Foot Soldier Tabard
armors.description: Padded cloth armor with more than a few stains. Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.
armors.lore:
Padded cloth armor with more than a few stains.
Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.
armors.how_to_acquire: All pieces of the Godrick Foot Soldier Set drop from Godrick Foot Soldiers

armors.name: Gelmir Knight Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor worn by knights once loyal to Praetor Rykard. It bears an emblem that none wear any longer, standing as it does for a lord that fell from lofty ambition into gluttonous depravity. As the lord lost his dignity, so too did these knights lose their master.
armors.lore: Armor of the Fire Knights under Messmer the Impaler's personal command.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Gelmir Knight Armor into Gelmir Knight Armor (Altered).

armors.name: Godrick Knight Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor worn by knights loyal to Godrick the Grafted. Its left breast is emblazoned with a two-headed war axe, an emblem of the golden lineage. The knights surely boasted of their strength in days long gone.
armors.lore:
Black iron armor worn by drake knights.
Features the spoils of a dragon catch as an emblem of pride as both dragon hunter and partaker of communion.
armors.how_to_acquire: Gatefront Ruins: Dropped by the heavy Godrick Knight patrolling the outpost. Fort Haight: Chance to drop from the Godrick Knight atop the fort walls.

armors.name: Godskin Noble Robe
armors.description: Robe made by sewing together patches of smooth skin. Subcutaneous fat makes it plump and soft. Worn by Godskin Nobles, known for their seven-face aprons.Strengthens the Noble Presence incantation.Nobles are the most ancient apostles who are said to have assimilated inhuman physiology. Not unlike the crucible, the Erdtree in its primordial form.
armors.lore:
Robe made by sewing together patches of smooth skin.
Subcutaneous fat makes it plump and soft. Worn by Godskin Nobles, known for their seven-face aprons.
armors.how_to_acquire: Defeat the Godskin Noble found on the bridge that connects the study hall to the Divine Tower of Liurnia.Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Goldmask's Rags
armors.description: Worn rags that just barely cover the body.Lord Goldmask felt no draw to the vain excess of clothing; what use is finery to one who seeks greater brilliance?
armors.lore: Worn rags that just barely cover the body.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can all be found on Goldmask's body after the completion of Brother Corhyn's questline. Head south from the Capital of Ash site of grace and go down the small path in the direction of the colosseum. Go past the plant enemies and stick to the left and you will find Goldmask.
