Look the rune from him, and reset the area and return to find his set (Except for the Helmet) on his body. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Gravekeeper Cloak
armors.description: Defensive wear encircled by bronze snakes.Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum. The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes.The snake is viewed as a traitor to the Erdtree, and the audience delighted in seeing these bronze effigies beaten and battered.
armors.lore: Thick, bristly cloak that is the symbol of an underground gravekeeper.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Duelist Set pieces can be dropped as loot from the Duelist enemies located in Leyndell, Royal Capital.There is an apparent Colosseum on a hill in the southeast area of the city that has two Duelists, one patrolling the path and one at the top. Both of these enemies have a chance to drop all three pieces.

armors.name: Gravekeeper Cloak (Altered)
armors.description: Defensive wear encircled by bronze snakes. Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum. The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes. The snake is viewed as a traitor to the Erdtree, and the audience delighted in seeing these bronze effigies beaten and battered.
armors.lore:
Defensive wear encircled by bronze snakes.
Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum. The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Gravekeeper Cloak into Gravekeeper Cloak (Altered).

armors.name: Guardian Garb
armors.description: Engraved golden garb.Worn by guardians of the Minor Erdtree.In accordance with an ancient pact with the Erdtree, it is said that their deaths led not to destruction, but instead to renewed, eternal life as guardians.
armors.how_to_acquire: Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from Erdtree Guardians that are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.

armors.name: Guardian Garb (Full Bloom)
armors.description: Engraved golden garb. Worn by the guardians of the Minor Erdtrees.Raises the HP recovery effects of the Flask of Crimson Tears, but greatly lowers fire damage negation.It is said that the blood-red flowers blooming on their backs mark the senescence of their ancient pact. Perhaps the guardians are part tree already
armors.lore:
Engraved golden garb.
Worn by the guardians of the Minor Erdtrees.
armors.special_effect: Increases healing from Flask of Crimson Tears, Lowers fire negation
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from Erdtree Guardians at Erdtree Sanctuary site of grace [Map Link]. The guardians will stop spawning after defeating Maliketh, the Black Blade

armors.name: Haligtree Knight Armor
armors.description: Armor worn by knights sworn the Haligtree.Its left breast is emblazoned with the crest of the Haligtree. Though watered with Miquella's own blood since it was a sapling, the Haligtree ultimately failed to grow into an Erdtree.
armors.lore: Armor worn by knights sworn to the Haligtree.
armors.how_to_acquire: Haligtree Knights drop the Haligtree Knight Armor, Haligtree Knight Gauntlets, and Haligtree Knight Greaves. They can be found in the latter areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

armors.name: Haligtree Knight Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor worn by knights sworn to the Haligtree. Its left breast is emblazoned with the crest of the Haligtree. Though watered with Miquella's own blood since it was a sapling, the Haligtree ultimately failed to grow into an Erdtree.
armors.lore: Armor of the Fire Knights under Messmer the Impaler's personal command.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Haligtree Knight Armor into Haligtree Knight Armor (Altered).

armors.name: High Page Clothes
armors.description: Clothes of a page selected for special privileges by the noble they serve.Traveling wear tailored with exquisite precision, to avoid any undue shame for the page's master.
armors.lore: Clothes of a page selected for special privileges by the noble they serve.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be farmed from High Pages.The earliest one that can be found is in Raya Lucaria Academy. From the Church of the Cuckoo site, enter the church and take the shortcut ladder up. On the other side of the room is a long hallway with a High Page at the end.They can also be found in Leyndell, Royal Capital in various buildings.

armors.name: High Page Clothes (Altered)
armors.description: Clothes of a page selected for special privileges by the noble they serve. Traveling wear tailored with exquisite precision, to avoid any undue shame for the page's master.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by the one different looking page beside a staircase leading indoors near West Capital Rampart site of grace in Leyndell

armors.name: Hoslow's Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Garish silver armor decorated with red embellishments. Passed down through the Hoslow family. When Juno Hoslow received an invitation to the Volcano Manor, he discreetly refused. "I have already walked many a road drenched in blood, yet never would I consider myself a champion."
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Hoslow's Armor into Hoslow's Armor (Altered).

armors.name: Ivory-Draped Tabard
armors.description: Padded cloth armor with a shawl in the color of ivory draped over the shoulders.Worn by foot soldiers sworn to the Haligtree.
armors.lore: Padded cloth armor with a shawl in the color of ivory draped over the shoulders.
armors.how_to_acquire: Chance to drop from Foot Soldiers in Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree

armors.name: Land of Reeds Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor made from strips of iron fastened together. Worn by warriors of the Land of Reeds. The Land of Reeds has long been locked in a miserable civil war, during which time it has remained alienated from the cultures of its neighbors. Little wonder that the entire nation has succumbed to blood-soaked madness, or so it is said.
armors.lore:
Armor made from strips of iron fastened together.
Worn by warriors of the Land of Reeds.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class.Sold by the Isolated Merchant in Dragonbarrow for 1,500 Runes. [Elden Ring Map here]

armors.name: Lazuli Robe
armors.description: Robe worn by scholars of the Lazuli Conspectus, singular among the greater Raya Lucaria Academy.These scholars, who sought to master Carian sorcery, instead learned to see the moon as equal to the stars.This robe, in the hue of the full moon, signifies their heresy.
armors.how_to_acquire: Chance to drop from Lazuli Sorcerers in Raya Lucaria Academy.

armors.name: Leather Armor
armors.description: Lightweight and battle-proven leather armor worn by a savvy soldier.Many admire the wearer of this armor for his chivalrous and forthright spirit.
armors.how_to_acquire: Murkwater Cave. Drops from Patches if he's killed after pleading for mercy. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Leyndell Knight Armor
armors.description: Armor worn by knights sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.Its left breast is emblazoned with a symbol of Erdtree Worship, said to have once been imbued with an incantation of protection.
armors.lore: Armor worn by knights sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Leyndell Knights

armors.name: Leyndell Knight Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor worn by knights sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell. Its left breast is emblazoned with a symbol of Erdtree Worship, said to have once been imbued with an incantation of protection.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from Leyndell Knights.

armors.name: Lionel's Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Round iron armor. Worn by Lionel the Lionhearted. When this chivalrous, dauntless knight met Fia, who had been driven from her home, he declared himself to be her father.
armors.lore:
Round iron armor.
Worn by Lionel the Lionhearted.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Lionel's Armor into Lionel's Armor (Altered).

armors.name: Lord of Blood's Robe (Altered)
armors.description: Attire of Mohg, Lord of Blood, embroidered with an extravagant gold emblem on black cloth. The dress of a Luminary, the reigning lord and hierarch of the coming dynasty of Mohgwyn. Or perhaps, of a raving lunatic.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Lord of Blood's Robe into Lord of Blood's Robe (Altered).

armors.name: Lusat's Robe
armors.description: A robe reserved for grand masters at the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Corroded by blue glintstones.Since the grand masters Azur and Lusat were driven from the academy, no one has achieved their formerly-held rank.
armors.how_to_acquire: All three armor pieces can be found after completing Sorceress Sellen's questline and siding with Sellen, return to Lusat's location in the Sellia Hideaway. The entire set will be on the ground where he used to occupy. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Malenia's Armor
armors.description: Armor made of unalloyed gold. Worn by Malenia, Blade of Miquella.Malenia awaited Miquella at the foot of the husk."My brother will keep his promise. He possesses the wisdom, the allure, of a god - he is the most fearsome Empyrean of all."
armors.lore:
Armor made of unalloyed gold.
Worn by Malenia, Blade of Miquella.
armors.how_to_acquire: Purchased from Enia for 12,000 runes after defeating Malenia Blade of Miquella.

armors.name: Malenia's Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor made of unalloyed gold. Worn by Malenia, Blade of Miquella. Malenia awaited Miquella at the foot of the husk. "My brother will keep his promise. He possesses the wisdom, the allure, of a godhe is the most fearsome Empyrean of all."
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Malenia's Armor into Malenia's Armor (Altered).

armors.name: Maliketh's Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Beast's armor made of black iron and decorated with gold. Worn by Maliketh the Black Blade. Maliketh, Queen Marika's loyal half-brother, bore a blade imbued with Destined Death, and there was not one demigod who did not fear him. Champions knew what was at stake. Indeed, that is what made them champions.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Maliketh's Armor into Maliketh's Armor (Altered).

armors.name: Mausoleum Knight Armor
armors.description: Armor worn by headless knights who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum.The wing-shaped ornaments on its back evoke the Deathbird. A self-inflicted curse that ties the spirits of these loyal knights to the land, having willingly beheaded themselves so that they may serve their masters in death.
armors.lore: Armor worn by headless knights who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum.
armors.how_to_acquire: Mausoleum Knight Set Pieces are randomly dropped by the Mausoleum Knights. Typically found in Liurnia of the Lakes. The easiest one to farm is directly outside the Black Knife Catacombs entrance, which can be reset quickly with the site of grace. Also found near the Walking Mausoleum in Weeping Peninsula.

armors.name: Mausoleum Knight Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor worn by headless knights who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum. The wing-shaped ornaments on its back evoke the Deathbird. A self-inflicted curse that ties the spirits of these loyal knights to the land, having willingly beheaded themselves so that they may serve their masters in death.
armors.how_to_acquire: Mausoleum Knight Set Pieces are randomly dropped by the Mausoleum Knights. Typically found in Liurnia of the Lakes. The easiest one to farm is directly outside the Black Knife Catacombs entrance, which can be reset quickly with the site of grace. Also found near the Walking Mausoleum in Weeping Peninsula.

armors.name: Mausoleum Surcoat
armors.description: Armor worn by headless soldiers who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum.The surcoat depicts the mausoleum bell, which rings in constant mourning for the soulless demigods.
armors.lore: Armor worn by headless soldiers who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum.
armors.how_to_acquire: Mausoleum Soldier Set pieces drop from Mausoleum Soldiers. They can be found patrolling areas around some of the Wandering Mausoleums.An easy spot to farm this set is east of the East Gate Bridge Trestle site of grace in Liurnia of the Lakes. Several groups of 3 or 4 Mausoleum Soldiers are patrolling around this Wandering Mausoleum.

armors.name: Night Maiden Armor
armors.description: Armor worn by the nightmaidens of the Eternal City.Indicates the highest clerical rank, and includes a silk cape.Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.
armors.lore:
Armor worn by the nightmaidens of the Eternal City.
Indicates the highest clerical rank, and includes a silk cape.
armors.how_to_acquire: Pieces of the Night Maiden Set are dropped by Night Maiden enemies found in Nokron and Nokstella.Two can be found in the Night's Sacred Ground area in the church with the large Silver Tear Ball. Once this building's shortcut is opened these two can be easily farmed by resetting at the Night's Sacred Ground site of grace.

armors.name: Night's Cavalry Armor
armors.description: Pitch-black armor thinly painted with dried blood.Worn by the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds.The Night's Cavalry, who now wander the dim roads at night, were once led by the Fell Omen and were deliverers of death for great warriors, knights, and champions.
armors.lore:
Pitch-black armor thinly painted with dried blood.
Worn by the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds.
armors.how_to_acquire: You can find the Night's Cavalry Set within the Consecrated Snowfield: From the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace at night, look southwest and there will be a caravan being pulled by two giants and two Night's Cavalry escorts. Kill both the escorts to receive the armor alongside an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone. Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Night's Cavalry Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Pitch-black armor thinly painted with dried blood. Worn by the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds. The Night's Cavalry, who now wander the dim roads of night, were once led by the Fell Omen and were deliverers of death for great warriors, knights, and champions.
armors.lore:
Pitch-black helm thinly painted with dried blood.
Worn by the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds.
armors.how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Night's Cavalry Armor, if you have it in your possession.

armors.name: Nomadic Merchant's Finery
armors.description: Finery of the nomadic merchants. Decorated with tiny gems in a wide spectrum of colors.These merchants once thrived as the Great Caravan, but after being accused of heretical beliefs, their entire clan was rounded up and buried alive far underground.Then, they chanted a curse of despair, and summoned the flame of frenzy.
armors.lore:
Finery of the nomadic merchants.
Decorated with tiny gems in a wide spectrum of colors.
armors.how_to_acquire: In the hidden tunnels behind the altar in Mohg, the Omen's boss room at the Cathedral of the Forsaken Site of Grace in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds below Leyndell, Royal Capital. After opening the secret passage behind the altar and taking the stairs down, crossing the narrow fallen rafter directly to the left is a tent and in the far corner you can find Nomadic Merchant's Finery and the full Nomadic Merchant's Set. Elden Ring Map hereTo get access to the set, you need to aggro the enemy walking around close by and lead it next to the tent and have it use its frenzy attack to break the tent.

armors.name: Nomadic Merchant's Finery (Altered)
armors.description: Finery of the nomadic merchants. Decorated with tiny gems in a wide spectrum of colors. These merchants once thrived as the Great Caravan, but after being accused of heretical beliefs, their entire clan was rounded up and buried alive far underground. Then, they chanted a curse of despair, and summoned the flame of frenzy.
armors.lore:
Finery of the nomadic merchants.
Decorated with tiny gems in a wide spectrum of colors.
armors.how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Nomadic Merchant's Finery, if you have it in your possession.

armors.name: Nox Monk Armor
armors.description: Armor worn by the monks of the Eternal City, with a silk cape attached. Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.
armors.lore: Armor worn by the monks of the Eternal City, with a silk cape attached.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be looted from the Nox Swordstress and Nox Priest common ennemies in Nokstella, Eternal City. However, note that the Nox Swordstress & Nox Priest boss found in Sellia, Town of Sorcery will not drop the set. Elden Ring Interactive Map link

armors.name: Nox Monk Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor worn by the monks of the Eternal City. Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.
armors.lore: Armor worn by the monks of the Eternal City.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Nox Monk Armor into Nox Monk Armor (Altered).

armors.name: Nox Swordstress Armor
armors.description: Armor worn by swordstresses of the Eternal City.These women are the personal guards of the nightmaidens, and wear silk capes.Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.
armors.lore:
Armor worn by swordstresses of the Eternal City.
These women are the personal guards of the nightmaidens, and wear silk capes.
armors.how_to_acquire: Pieces of the Nox Swordstress Set are dropped by Nox Swordstress enemies found in Nokron and Nokstella.Three can be found in relatively close proximity to the Nokstella, Eternal City site of grace. One up the stairs in a side room, and 2 in the river riding giant ants.

armors.name: Nox Swordstress Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor worn by swordstresses of the Eternal City. These women are the personal guards of the nightmaidens. Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.
armors.lore:
Armor worn by swordstresses of the Eternal City.
These women are the personal guards of the nightmaidens.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Nox Swordstress Armor into Nox Swordstress Armor (Altered

armors.name: Official's Attire
armors.description: Grubby blue robe worn by magisterial officials to carry out their grim tasks.Surveillance, executions, gruesome rituals... The darkest duties drive the wheels of mankind.
armors.lore: Grubby blue robe worn by magisterial officials to carry out their grim tasks.
armors.how_to_acquire: From the Forbidden Lands site of grace, turn back and head towards the elevator. Face southwest before activating the elevator, and then watch for an opening to jump off into. The Official's Attire is on the corpse in this hidden hallway, alongside Blade of Calling. Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Omen Armor
armors.description: Malformed armor resembling an Omen with its horns cut off.Worn by the Dung Eater. The heavy, sun-shaped medallion represents both the guidance he once saw, and the ring to which it will one day lead.
armors.special_effect: Increases damage of Omen Bairn and Regal Omen Bairn
armors.how_to_acquire: The Omen Set can be found after killing the Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds at Leyndell Royal Capital. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Page Garb
armors.description: Garb worn by pages who serve the nobility and are mindful to keep them out of harm's way.Traveling wear tailored with exquisite precision, to avoid any undue shame for the page's master.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Page Garb Chest Armor can be occasionally found as loot drops from Page enemies Three are easily found behind the Royal Moongazing Grounds site of grace in Carian Manor. They are also scattered throughout Leyndell, Royal Capital and at Tombsward Ruins at the Underground.

armors.name: Page Garb (Altered)
armors.description: Garb worn by pages who serve the nobility and are mindful to keep them out of harm's way. Traveling wear tailored with exquisite precision, to avoid any undue shame for the page's master.
armors.how_to_acquire: Tombsward Ruins Underground. See it on the Elden Ring Map Here.Boc the Seamster can alter the original Page Garb, if you have it in your possession.

armors.name: Perfumer Robe
armors.description: Robe of an Erdtree Capital perfumer.The thick front apron embroidered with a depiction of the Erdtree is proof of mastery of the apothecarial arts, and its weight symbolizes the onus of both pride and responsibility.
armors.lore: Robe of an Erdtree Capital perfumer.
armors.how_to_acquire: Looted from the Perfumers found throughout Leyndell, Royal Capital.

armors.name: Perfumer Robe (Altered)
armors.description: Robe of an Erdtree Capital perfumer. The thick front apron embroidered with a depiction of the Erdtree is proof of mastery of the apothecarial arts, and its weight symbolizes the onus of both pride and responsibility.
armors.how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Perfumer Robe if you have it in your possession.

armors.name: Perfumer's Traveling Garb (Altered)
armors.description: Garb of a traveling perfumer of no renown. The thick front apron, the badge of a perfumer, has been replaced with a more simple one made from soft leather.
armors.lore: Garb of a traveling perfumer of no renown.
armors.how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Perfumer's Traveling Garb if you have it in your possession.

armors.name: Preceptor's Long Gown (Altered)
armors.description: Modest garb, previously worn under a long, bright blue gown with the movements of the stars drawn upon it.
armors.lore: Modest garb, previously worn under a long, bright blue gown with the movements of the stars drawn upon it.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Preceptor's Long Gown into Preceptor's Long Gown (Altered).

armors.name: Prophet Robe (Altered)
armors.description: Robe of exiled prophets who foretold misfortuneand were persecuted and driven from their homes as a result. Made from rough fabric that scrapes against the skin like a sharpening file.
armors.lore: Robe of exiled prophets who foretold misfortuneand were persecuted and driven from their homes as a result.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Prophet Robe into Prophet Robe (Altered).

armors.name: Radahn's Lion Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor depicting the golden lion. Worn by General Radahn. The golden lion is said to symbolize Godfrey, the first Elden Lord, and his beast regent, Serosh. From his youngest years, Radahn was naturally captivated by the Lord of the Battlefield.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Radahn's Lion Armor into Radahn's Lion Armor (Altered).

armors.name: Ragged Armor
armors.description: Armor pieced together from scavenged metal.
armors.how_to_acquire: Not currently obtainable.

armors.name: Ragged Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor pieced together from scavenged metal.
armors.how_to_acquire: Not currently obtainable.

armors.name: Raging Wolf Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor worn by Vargram the Raging Wolf, one of the first Tarnished to visit the Roundtable Hold.According to the old legends, wolves are the shadows of the Empyrean.Vargram aspired to such a state himself.
armors.how_to_acquire: Altering the Raging Wolf Armor at a Site of Grace or through Boc the Seamster.

armors.name: Raptor's Black Feathers
armors.description: Robe crafted with the black feathers of a bird of prey. Worn by the assassins of Ravenmount.A ritual implement for transforming into a Deathbird, if only by imitation.Strengthens jump attacks."We are birds of prey, bringers of death."
armors.lore:
Robe crafted with the black feathers of a bird of prey.
Worn by the assassins of Ravenmount.
armors.how_to_acquire: Inside the Sage's Cave, in a chest behind an illusory wall. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Redmane Knight Armor
armors.description: Armor worn by knights who fought by General Radahn's side.When they were driven to defeat by Malenia's scarlet rot, the Redmane Knights burned the crest on the left breast of their armor to indicate their resolve."Alas, dear home, I shan't see you again! For our duty is to remain here, a bulwark against the blight."
armors.lore: Armor worn by knights who fought by General Radahn's side.
armors.how_to_acquire: Chance to drop from Radahn Knight in Fort Gael. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Redmane Knight Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor worn by knights who fought by General Radahn's side. When they were driven to defeat by Malenia's scarlet rot, the Redmane Knights burned the crest on the left breast of their armor to indicate their resolve. "Alas, dear home, I shan't see you again! For our duty is to remain here, a bulwark against the blight."
armors.lore:
Black iron armor worn by drake knights.
Features the spoils of a dragon catch as an emblem of pride as both dragon hunter and partaker of communion.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, the player (or Boc) can alter Redmane Knight Armor into Redmane Knight Armor (Altered).

armors.name: Redmane Surcoat
armors.description: Armor worn by soldiers who fought by General Radahn's side.The surcoat depicts a red-maned lion raising a sword in the image of Radahn. Thus, they were redmanes, and all proved they were worthy of the name.
armors.lore: Armor worn by soldiers who fought by General Radahn's side.
armors.how_to_acquire: Easily found in large numbers around Fort Gael. Elden Ring Map Here.

armors.name: Ronin's Armor
armors.description: Armor of the man who calls himself Shabriri.Highly functional and heavily worn.The man, once known as Yura, kept a woman in the deepest reaches of his heart.
armors.how_to_acquire: Acquired by following Yura's questline and eventually defeating Shabriri.. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Ronin's Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor of the man who calls himself Shabriri. Highly functional and heavily worn. The man, once known as Yura, kept a woman in the deepest reaches of his heart.
armors.how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Ronin's Armor if you have it in your possession.

armors.name: Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak (Altered)
armors.description: Cloak wrapped with bronze snakes, eaten through by scarlet rot. Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum. The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes.
armors.lore: Cloak wrapped with bronze snakes, eaten through by scarlet rot.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak into Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak (Altered).

armors.name: Royal Knight Armor
armors.description: Silver armor of Loretta, a knight who served Miquella's Haligtree.Loretta was once a royal Carian Knight, and her lapis-lazuli blue cape is the emblem of the knightly pride that continues to guide her.
armors.lore: Silver armor of Loretta, a knight who served Miquella's Haligtree.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be brought from Finger Reader Enia, at Roundtable Hold after defeating Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree for 6000.

armors.name: Royal Knight Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Silver armor of Loretta, a knight who served Miquella's Haligtree. Loretta, once a royal Carian knight, went on a journey in search of a haven for Albinaurics, and determined that the Haligtree was their best chance for eventual salvation.
armors.lore: Silver armor of Loretta, a knight who served Miquella's Haligtree.
armors.how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Royal Knight Armor, if you have it in your possession.

armors.name: Royal Remains Armor
armors.description: Armory graces with gold human bones.Worn by the unspeaking adherent of Sir Gideon the All-Knowing.Slowly replenishes HP when HP is reduced.It is said that the bones belong to an ancient lord - the soulless king. The lord of the lost and desperate, who was known as Ensha.
armors.lore:
Armor graced with gold human bones.
Worn by the unspeaking adherent of Sir Gideon the All-Knowing.
armors.special_effect: Slowly replenishes HP when HP is reduced
armors.how_to_acquire: Upon attaining the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right), Ensha of the Royal Remains will invade the players world the next time they travel back to Roundtable Hold. The full Royal Remains Set is acquired after beating him.

armors.name: Scaled Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor worn by Old Knight Istvan. The corroded metal is reinforced with rock-hard scales, making it highly effective against non-physical attacks. Istvan is one of a few wizened Tarnished who survive to this day.
armors.how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Scaled Armor if you have it in your possession.

armors.name: Scarlet Tabard
armors.description: Padded cloth armor with the telltale stains of the scarlet rot. Worn by foot soldiers in General Radahn's army
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from radahn foot soldiers. Can be dropped in Fort Gael, got some from footmen at Fort Gael North.

armors.name: Shaman Furs
armors.description: Raiment fashioned from a bristly pelt.Worn by ancestral follower shamans.The ancestral followers live a distance from the Erdtree, awaiting new buds. They are certain to sprout from their very flesh, and indeed, their souls.
armors.how_to_acquire: The chest piece can be looted off of the Ancestral Follower Shaman in the Ancestral Woods area of Siofra River.

armors.name: Snow Witch Robe (Altered)
armors.description: Witch's robe in the color of snow. Once worn by the snowy crone who the young Ranni encountered deep in the woods. She was a witch, and well versed in cold sorceries. It is said that the doll that houses Ranni's soul was modeled after her. That old witch was Ranni's secret mentor.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Snow Witch Robe into Snow Witch Robe (Altered).

armors.name: Spellblade's Traveling Attire
armors.description: Glintstone sorcerer Rogier's traveling attire, graced with an intricate, aristocratic decoration. Strengthens glintstone sorcery skills. Rogier spent his entire life behaving with utter detachment. No one noticed the anger, grief, regret, or fear that existed along with it.
armors.lore: Glintstone sorcerer Rogier's traveling attire, graced with an intricate, aristocratic decoration. Strengthens glintstone sorcery skills.
armors.special_effect: Strengthens magic and cold weapon skills by 2%
armors.how_to_acquire: Roundtable Hold - Drops from Rogier.

armors.name: Spellblade's Traveling Attire (Altered)
armors.description: Glintstone sorcerer Rogier's traveling attire, graced with an intricate, aristocratic decoration. Strengthens glintstone sorcery skills. Rogier spent his entire life behaving with utter detachment. No one noticed the anger, grief, regret, or fear that existed along with it.
armors.lore: Glintstone sorcerer Rogier's traveling attire, graced with an intricate, aristocratic decoration. Strengthens glintstone sorcery skills.
armors.special_effect: Strengthens magic and cold weapon skills by 2%
armors.how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Spellblade's Traveling Attire if you have it in your possession.

armors.name: Traveler's Clothes
armors.description: Light yet sturdy clothes.Worn by young women who set off into the world to confront their fate.
armors.lore: Light yet sturdy clothes.
armors.how_to_acquire: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: The entire Traveler's Set is found deep underground in a side room with a large orange flower, adjacent to the Haligtree Roots site of grace. Elden Ring Map Link

armors.name: Traveling Maiden Robe (Altered)
armors.description: Modest garb of traveling maidens, typically worn under their robes.
armors.lore: Modest garb of traveling maidens, typically worn under their robes.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Traveling Maiden Robe into Traveling Maiden Robe (Altered).

armors.name: Tree Sentinel Armor
armors.description: Golden armor of the heavy cavalry Tree Sentinels who serve the Erdtree.Adorned with a cape featuring the mark of the sacred tree.Imposingly sturdy and nigh unbreakable, the grace of old yet lingers.
armors.lore: Golden armor of the heavy cavalry Tree Sentinels who serve the Erdtree.
armors.how_to_acquire: Obtained by solving a puzzle that destroys the chariots in Auriza Hero's Grave. Elden Ring Map here.See the Tree Sentinel Set page for a guide on how to attain the set.

armors.name: Tree Sentinel Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Golden armor of the heavy cavalry Tree Sentinels who serve the Erdtree. Imposingly sturdy and nigh unbreakable, the grace of old yet lingers.
armors.lore: Golden armor of the heavy cavalry Tree Sentinels who serve the Erdtree.
armors.how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Tree Sentinel Armor, if you have it in your possession.

armors.name: Tree Surcoat
armors.description: Blue surcoat draped over chainmail.The tree insignia emblazoned on the front depicts the Erdtree, and is a design beloved throughout the Lands Between.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant West Altus Plateau for 3500 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Twinned Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Armor depicting entwined twins of gold and silver.The two known as D are inseparable twins. They are two bodies and two minds, but a single soul. Not once do they stand together; not one word do they speak to one another.Perhaps this armor longs to find its way to the other D.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Twinned Armor into Twinned Armor (Altered).

armors.name: Vagabond Knight Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Chest piece of a knight banished from their motherland. Dirty and battered after enduring a lengthy vagabond journey. The crest emblazoned on the front is worn and dingy, no longer able to evoke sentiment. Metal armor is heavy, but also sturdy, offering significant damage negation.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Vagabond Knight Armor into Vagabond Knight Armor (Altered).

armors.name: Veteran's Armor (Altered)
armors.description: Old armor that has seen many battles. Worn by Niall, the veteran general of Sol. Niall was a lone survivor who commanded spirits to defend his long-passed master. This aging general could not die, nor did he have anywhere to fade away.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Veteran's Armor into Veteran's Armor (Altered).

armors.name: Vulgar Militia Armor
armors.description: Armor worn by lean, mean, and filthy militiamen.Freshly-singed battlegrounds effusing with the stench of the dead. Forbidden lands that will be excised from the memory of history. This is where the vulgar militia serve, as untiring, unsung watchkeepers.
armors.lore: Armor worn by lean, mean, and filthy militiamen.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Vulgar Militia Armor Chest Armor can be found by killing Vulgar Militiamen enemies found around the Bestial Sanctum and Farum Greatbridge sites of grace.

armors.name: War Surgeon Gown
armors.description: "Bloodstained white gown of the war surgeons who were effectively mercy killers.Of the surgeons that were abducted by the Lord of Blood none were able to tame the accursed blood.None but Varre, that is; though he was an exception."
armors.lore: Bloodstained white gown of the war surgeons who were effectively mercy killers.
armors.how_to_acquire: Revert the War Surgeon Gown (Altered) at a site of grace.

armors.name: War Surgeon Gown (Altered)
armors.description: Bloodstained white gown of the war surgeons who were effectively mercy killers. Of the surgeons that were abducted by the Lord of Blood, none were able to tame the accursed blood. None but Varre, that is; though he was an exception.
armors.how_to_acquire: Defeat all three Nameless White Mask NPC invaders in the blood swamp near the Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum.

armors.name: Dryleaf Arm Wraps
armors.description: Sun-faded and lightly soiled arm wraps. Wound tightly around the arms as if it might prevent them from being broken.
armors.lore: Sun-faded and lightly soiled arm wraps.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found under a waterfall in the lower portions under Bonny Village. This area can only be accessed by using the ladder in Shadow Keep to get down to a special teleport coffin (this Elden Ring Map location). This will take you to Ruins of Unte and you must follow the cliffs downstream and then carefully drop down to bottom level to reach the area. [Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Gaius's Gauntlets
armors.description: The black iron gauntlets of Commander Gaius. Part of an armor set patterned after fallen seeds. Gaius was the most senior disciple of the same Alabaster Lord who taught Radahn and Gaea gravitational technique.
armors.lore:
The black iron gauntlets of Commander Gaius.
Part of an armor set patterned after fallen seeds.
armors.how_to_acquire: Purchased from the Enia at the Roundtable Hold after defeating Commander Gaius

armors.name: Oathseeker Knight Gauntlets
armors.description: Oathseeker Knight gauntlets. Black with gold ornamentation. These knights set off on quests of discovery, hoping to find by themselves an oath of their own choosing to serve in perfect, lifelong devotion.
armors.lore:
Oathseeker Knight gauntlets.
Black with gold ornamentation.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found inside a hanging body, just outside the Church of Benediction. It contains the whole set: Oathseeker Knight Greaves, Oathseeker Knight Gauntlets, Oathseeker Knight Armor, and Oathseeker Knight Helm. It also contains Pata weapon. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Verdigris Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets made from an unusual metal known as verdigris. Verdigris is said to be the gift of an outer god. Possessed of an enormously hefty yet supple strength thanks to its rusted nature.
armors.lore: Gauntlets made from an unusual metal known as verdigris.
armors.how_to_acquire: Complete Moore's questline

armors.name: Iron Rivet Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets of Red Bear, whose name is lost to madness. Reinforced with iron rivets. After killing the great red bear in a blood-soaked bout, he became fascinated by the untainted glory of its naked strength. "I wish to be a bear, no more, and no less."
armors.lore:
Gauntlets of Red Bear, whose name is lost to madness.
Reinforced with iron rivets.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Red Bear. Red Bear can be found at the Northern Nameless Mausoleum. The Northern Nameless Mausoleum is located East of the Temple Ruins. [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Thiollier's Gloves
armors.description: The dark gloves of those who wield poison in secret, ever scorned and loathed.
armors.lore: The dark gloves of those who wield poison in secret, ever scorned and loathed.
armors.how_to_acquire: Summon Thiollier during the battle at the end of his questline, then loot his body in the boss arena after the fight.

armors.name: High Priest Gloves
armors.description: Gloves of Count Ymir, High Priest. Soft and well-tailored.
armors.lore:
Gloves of Count Ymir, High Priest.
Soft and well-tailored.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Count Ymir, Mother of Fingers, who can be found in the Cathedral of Manus Metyr after interacting with the throne, you can only find Count Ymir there after you have defeated Metyr, Mother of Fingers. [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Braided Arm Wraps
armors.description: Ragged black cloth tied with braided cord. Attire of a vengeance-seeking hornsent.
armors.lore: Ragged black cloth tied with braided cord. Attire of a vengeance-seeking hornsent.
armors.how_to_acquire: Complete Hornsent quest. [Video Location]

armors.name: Dancer's Bracer
armors.description: Metal bracer of the Ranah dancers. Enhances the power of dancing attacks. Designed to protect the sword-wielding hand.
armors.lore: Metal bracer of the Ranah dancers.
armors.special_effect: Enhances the power of dancing attacks by 2.5%.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by defeating Dancer of Ranah at the Southern Nameless Mausoleum [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Interactive Map]

armors.name: Gauntlets of Night
armors.description: Bottomless black gauntlets, cool to the touch.Flowing lines in the seeming shape of a fingerprint adorn the surface. Imprisons the wearer in utterly lightless dark.Bestowed upon those born deep underground, ordaining them as Swordhands of Night.
armors.lore:
Bottomless black gauntlets, cool to the touch.
Flowing lines in the seeming shape of a fingerprint adorn the surface. Imprisons the wearer in utterly lightless dark.
armors.how_to_acquire: Bonny Gaol: Use the jar lift near the bridge twice to reach the top level of the gaol. First, hop on the jar, go to the bridge level, and activate the switch. Ride the jar lift for the second time to go to the top level. You can find the Night Set on a corpse laying on top of a table. [See SOTE Elden Ring DLC Map] [Video Link]

armors.name: Igon's Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets of the broken drake warrior Igon. No more than a mish-mash of tatters and remnants stripped from a corpse found in the aftermath of a battle.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets of the broken drake warrior Igon. 
No more than a mish-mash of tatters and remnants stripped from a corpse found in the aftermath of a battle.
armors.how_to_acquire: Loot Igon after defeating Bayle the Dread.

armors.name: Ansbach's Manchettes
armors.description: Manchettes of Sir Ansbach. Black leather adorned with gold embroidery. Slightly enhances Blood Oath and dynastic skills.
armors.lore: Manchettes of Sir Ansbach. Black leather adorned with gold embroidery.
armors.special_effect: Slightly enhances Blood Oath and dynastic skills by 3%.
armors.how_to_acquire: Complete Sir Ansbach's questline all the way through the end, and side with him when facing Leda, and then Promised Consort Radahn/ Radahn, Consort of Miquella. After the fight is over, Sir Ansbach's body will be near the site of grace, alongside with his equipment and his Incantation. [Map Link]

armors.name: Freyja's Gauntlets
armors.description: Golden gauntlets of Redmane Freyja, member of General Radahn's most distinguished knights. After witnessing Freyja's valor as a gladiator in his youth, Radahn invited her to join the ranks of his most trusted warriors.
armors.lore: Golden gauntlets of Redmane Freyja, member of General Radahn's most distinguished knights.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop by Redmane Freyja.

armors.name: Gauntlets of Solitude
armors.description: Steel gauntlets of the Knights of the Solitary Gaol. Part of a heavy armor set that covers the whole body in overlapping plates of steel. The nameless mausoleums of the realm of shadow are said to hold the spirits of warriors who lost their names, or their hearts.
armors.lore:
Steel gauntlets of the Knights of the Solitary Gaol.
Part of a heavy armor set that covers the whole body in overlapping plates of steel.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be obtained after defeating the Blackgaol Knight found inside Western Nameless Mausoleum. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Messmer Soldier Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets worn by soldiers who serve Messmer the Impaler, rusted and crusted in filth from fighting in unending war.
armors.lore: Gauntlets worn by soldiers who serve Messmer the Impaler, rusted and crusted in filth from fighting in unending war.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop by Messmer Soldiers

armors.name: Black Knight Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets worn by the Black Knights, servants of Messmer the Impaler. Black iron ornamented with gold. A rotten odor stubbornly clings to it. Perhaps it arises from the tainted nature of the blood that splattered upon it. Or perhaps it is the wearer's own blackened soul, festering after endless slaughter.
armors.lore: Gauntlets worn by the Black Knights, servants of Messmer the Impaler. Black iron ornamented with gold. A rotten odor stubbornly clings to it.
armors.how_to_acquire: Black Knight Set pieces are dropped from Black Knights, found throughout the Lands of Shadow.

armors.name: Rakshasa Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets of Rakshasa, soaked in the spurting blood of her victims. Tatters of ragged cloth jut out haphazardly, as if her lust for carnage threatens to break free.Increases damage dealt to foes, but greatly increases damage taken by the wearer.Cut down and devour. Only those who repeat the cycle without rest can truly subvert the self and become Rakshasa.
armors.lore: Gauntlets of Rakshasa, soaked in the spurting blood of her victims. Tatters of ragged cloth jut out haphazardly, as if her lust for carnage threatens to break free.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Rakshasa in Eastern Nameless Mausoleum. This area can only be accessed by using the ladder in Shadow Keep to get down to a special teleport coffin (this Elden Ring Map location). This will take you to Ruins of Unte and you must follow the cliffs downstream and then carefully drop down to bottom level to reach the mausoleum. [Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Fire Knight Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets of the Fire Knights under Messmer the Impaler's personal command. Each and every knight hailed from a renowned family of the Erdtree's upper echelons, but were shunned and chased from their homes after pledging allegiance to Messmer as their master.
armors.lore: Gauntlets of the Fire Knights under Messmer the Impaler's personal command.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop by Fire Knights in the Shadow Keep

armors.name: Leather Arm Wraps
armors.description: Arm wraps worn by highland warriors, made of sturdy leather and fastened with winding straps. Highland warriors are known to be hunters of bears; to them, there is no act more glorious than the subjugation of a savage beast.
armors.lore: Arm wraps worn by highland warriors, made of sturdy leather and fastened with winding straps.
armors.how_to_acquire: To the northwest of the Ravine North Site of Grace, there is a forest inhabited by runebears. At the center of this forest, you'll find a large stone with several items on it, this whole armor set is at the top of the stone. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Death Knight Gauntlets
armors.description: Golden gauntlets of the Death Knights, adorned with an antiquated depiction of the Erdtree. Enhances skills and incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult. These knights, once Godwyn's personal guard, quested to find their transfigured master's cadaver surrogatefor the coming age of the Duskborn.
armors.lore: Golden gauntlets of the Death Knights, adorned with an antiquated depiction of the Erdtree.
armors.special_effect: Enhances skills and incantations of the ancient dragon cult by 2%
armors.how_to_acquire: Darklight Catacombs, on a Death Knight corpse

armors.name: Ascetic's Wrist Guards
armors.description: Wrist guards of the tower's ascetics which embody their commitment to an austere existence of strict self-control. In order to ascend from their mortal flesh into tutelary deities of the land, they heighten their spirituality through severe ascetic training.
armors.lore: Wrist guards of the tower's ascetics which embody their commitment to an austere existence of strict self-control.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop by Curseblade enemies

armors.name: Messmer's Gauntlets
armors.description: Black gauntlets of Messmer the Impaler. On his mother's wishes, Messmer made himself a symbol of fear, undertaking the cleansing crusade she desired. "Direct thy maledictions, thine ire, and thy grief towards me alone."
armors.lore: Black gauntlets of Messmer the Impaler.
armors.how_to_acquire: Purchase from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Messmer the Impaler

armors.name: Gravebird Bracelets
armors.description: Stone bracelets with a tinge of green. One of a set of armor pieces cast in the image of the Gravebird. Gravebirds are ancient golems, created to guard the spiritgraves built where all manners of Death ultimately drift.
armors.lore: Stone bracelets with a tinge of green. One of a set of armor pieces cast in the image of the Gravebird.
armors.how_to_acquire: South the Pillar Path Waypoint site of grace, from a corpse at the corner of the altar. [Map Link]

armors.name: Common Soldier Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets of the rank-and-file soldiers of Messmer's army. A pitch-dark soot clings to it, much like the inner faces of the men who wore them.
armors.lore: Gauntlets of the rank-and-file soldiers of Messmer's army.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop by soldiers in Castle Ensis

armors.name: Horned Warrior Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets of the horned warriors, keepers of the tower, made from a thick metal.
armors.lore: Gauntlets of the horned warriors, keepers of the tower, made from a thick metal.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from Horned Warriors ( Small Private Altar site of grace in Belurat, Tower Settlement)

armors.name: Divine Bird Warrior Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets of divine bird warriors, the very first of all horned warriors, made from a golden metal. The golden-hued divine birds are known to be cruel, never taking to human companionship. Those who invoked their divinity were few and far between.
armors.lore: Gauntlets of divine bird warriors, the very first of all horned warriors, made from a golden metal.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Divine Bird Warriors

armors.name: Rellana's Gloves
armors.description: Gloves of Rellana, the Twin Moon Knight, fashioned from quality leather.
armors.lore: Gloves of Rellana, the Twin Moon Knight, fashioned from quality leather.
armors.how_to_acquire: The complete set (Rellana's Set) can be bought from Enia in the Roundtable Hold upon defeating Rellana Twin Moon Knight.

armors.name: Young Lion's Gauntlets
armors.description: The golden gauntlets worn by Radahn in his younger years. When Malenia, Blade of Miquella, let the rotflower blossom in Aeonia, Radahn heard a murmur in his ear "Miquella awaits thee, O promised consort."
armors.lore: The golden gauntlets worn by Radahn in his younger years.
armors.how_to_acquire: Purchase from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Promised Consort Radahn / Radahn, Consort of Miquella in Enir-Ilim [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Shadow Militiaman Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets as dark as shadow, worn by vulgar militiamen. Freshly-singed battlegrounds effusing with the stench of the dead. Forbidden lands that will be excised from the memory of history. What better place than the realms of shadow then, for such an army?
armors.lore: Gauntlets as dark as shadow, worn by vulgar militiamen.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found by killing Shadow militia men

armors.name: Alberich's Bracers
armors.description: Mad Tongue Alberich's bracers.Set with red glintstones said to be formed by the blood of sacrifices. Strengthens thorn sorcery. Alberiches was an aloof yet disturbed heretical sorcerer said to have been driven mad by jeering tongues during his service to the Roundtable Hold long ago.
armors.lore: Mad Tongue Alberich's bracers.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found at the lower level of the Fortified Manor at Leyendell Royal Capital.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: All-Knowing Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets set with countless eyes and ears. Worn by Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing. Knowledge begins with the recognition of one's ignorance. The realization that the search for knowledge is unending. But when Gideon glimpsed into the will of Queen Marika, he shuddered in fear. At the end that should not be.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets set with countless eyes and ears.
Worn by Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing.
armors.how_to_acquire: The entire All-Knowing Set is dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing upon defeat. Sir Gideon is encountered as a boss in Leyndell, Capital of Ash, an alternate version of the Royal Capital accessible only after making significant progress in the story.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Astrologer Gloves
armors.description: Gloves fashioned from fine, supple cloth. Worn by those who look to the cosmos above. They read fate in the stars, and are said to be heirs of the glintstone sorcerers. But alas, the night sky no longer cradles fate.
armors.lore:
Gloves fashioned from fine, supple cloth.
Worn by those who look to the cosmos above.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Astrologer Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for 1000 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Azur's Manchettes
armors.description: Manchettes corroded by blue-green glintstones.Worn by Azur, primeval current sorcerer.Azur had reached a near-inorganic state.
armors.lore:
Manchettes corroded by blue-green glintstones.
Worn by Azur, primeval current sorcerer.
armors.how_to_acquire: After completing Sorceress Sellen's Questline and siding with her towards the end, return to Primeval Sorecerer Azur's location. Azur's Glintstone Manchettes will be on the floor where Azur used to be, along with the rest of the set.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Bandit Manchettes
armors.description: Manchettes made by simple wrapping dirty cloth around the arms. Worn by bandits.
armors.lore:
Manchettes made by simply wrapping dirty cloth around the arms.
Worn by bandits.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class.Gatekeeper Gostoc will sell it after entering Stormveil Castle, but before killing Godrick the Grafted. After that, you will have to kill him for his Bell Bearing. Elden Ring Map hereCan be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after offering Gostoc's Bell Bearing

armors.name: Banished Knight Gauntlets
armors.description: Thick, full set of armor covering the entire body.These gauntlets were worn by knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes.These fierce warriors were each and all accomplished. Perhaps that is why, despite their territorial losses, they were still named knights.
armors.lore:
Thick, full set of armor covering the entire body.
These gauntlets were worn by knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped from the Banished Knights in Stormveil Castle.

armors.name: Battlemage Manchettes
armors.description: Manchettes worn by scholars of the Raya Lucaria Academy, tattered from being worn on the battlefield.
armors.lore: Manchettes worn by scholars of the Raya Lucaria Academy, tattered from being worn on the battlefield.
armors.how_to_acquire: This piece is dropped by Battlemage enemies.The entire Battlemage Set drops from a particular Battlemage enemy, located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge. Elden Ring Map Link.

armors.name: Beast Champion Gauntlets
armors.description: Silver gauntlets engraved with tiny beasts.Worn by Bernahl the Recusant.Beasts are drawn to champions, and to lords. And this armor befits a champion worthy of becoming a lord. And that is what Bernahl was.Until his maiden threw herself into the fire.
armors.lore:
Silver gauntlets engraved with tiny beasts.
Worn by Bernahl the Recusant.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. If not killed before, he will eventually invade you at Crumbling Farum Azula, dropping the entire set with an altered version of the chest piece.Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Black Knife Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets used by the Black Knife Assassins. Crafted with scale armor that makes no sound. The assassins that carried out the deeds of the Night of the Black Knives were all women, and rumored to be Numen who had close ties with Marika herself.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets used by the Black Knife Assassins.
Crafted with scale armor that makes no sound.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found on a corpse under an archway behind Ordina, Liturgical Town in Consecrated Grounds. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Blackflame Monk Gauntlets
armors.description: Black iron gauntlets featuring a flame motif.Attire of the Blackflame Monks.The Blackflame Monks, enthralled by the god-slaying black flame, became traitors, abandoning their posts as guardians. The seduction of a taboo is never easily spurned.
armors.lore:
Black iron gauntlets featuring a flame motif.
Attire of the Blackflame Monks.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop from Blackflame monks.

armors.name: Blaidd's Gauntlets
armors.description: Well-worn black gauntlets of the man-wolf Blaidd.Blaidd, who served as Ranni's shadow, was a loyal ally who would defy destiny itself if it would have him turn upon his Lady.
armors.lore: Well-worn black gauntlets of the man-wolf Blaidd.
armors.how_to_acquire: Following Ranni's questline, after she is given the Dark Moon Ring, return to Ranni's Rise and you will hear Blaidd talking to himself in front of the tower. When he finishes his dialogue he will turn hostile, and defeating him will grant the player Blaidd's Armor, Blaidd's Gauntlets, and Blaidd's Greaves (as well as the Royal Greatsword).Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Bloodhound Knight Gauntlets
armors.description: Metal gauntlets of the Bloodhound Knights. The Bloodhound Knights are trained as hunters and known to be unshakable trackers. Without the use of language, each knight chooses his own master. Once the decision has been made the knight stays loyal for life.
armors.lore: Metal gauntlets of the Bloodhound Knights.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops in Gelmir Hero's Grave - Mt. Gelmir.Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Bloodsoaked Manchettes
armors.description: Manchettes formed from tightly-wound bandages soaked through with blood. Any protection is welcome for the festering arms beneath.
armors.lore: Manchettes formed from tightly-wound bandages soaked through with blood.
armors.how_to_acquire: Looted from a corpse in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds near the Underground Roadside site of grace.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Blue Silver Bracelets
armors.description: Bracelets crafted with blue silver.Worn by the wolf-riding Albinauric archers.Blue silver is a metal born from the same mother as the archers themselves, and provides protection from magic and frost.
armors.lore:
Bracelets crafted with blue silver.
Worn by the wolf-riding Albinauric archers.
armors.how_to_acquire: Albinauric Wolfback Archers found in the Consecrated Snowfield, as well as the Ordina Gaol, drop the Blue Silver Set pieces.One that is easily farmed can be found shortly north of the Consecrated Snowfield site of grace.

armors.name: Brave's Bracer
armors.description: Gauntlets wrapped in thick leather. Garb worn by warriors of the frigid uplands. Has a fur lining which excels at keeping the cold at bay.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets wrapped in thick leather.
Garb worn by warriors of the frigid uplands.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Brave's Bracer Armor Gauntlets piece is currently unobtainable.

armors.name: Briar Gauntlets
armors.description: Battered iron gauntlets from a foreign land.Worn by Elemer of the Briar. The winding, rusted iron briars are a mark of the guilty and typically indicate a sentence of death. They also cause this armor to deal damage when performing dodge rolls.Elemer murderd numerous instructors and merchants, and was known as the Bell Bearing Hunter.
armors.lore:
Battered gauntlets from a foreign land.
Worn by Elemer of the Briar.
armors.how_to_acquire: Purchased from the Palm Reader in Roundtable Hold after defeating Elemer of the Briar in The Shaded Castle.

armors.name: Bull-Goat Gauntlets
armors.description: Great Horned Tragoth's gauntlets. Covers its wearer with a pair of giant horns, providing staunch poise. Tragoth is a famed knight of assistance. Countless Tarnished, facing adversity in the Lands Between, have survived thanks only to the Great Horned One's aid.
armors.lore: Great Horned Tragoth's gauntlets, adorned with a gold bull-goat motif. Provide high poise.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found after killing Patches' assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Great Horned Tragoth.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Carian Knight Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets of the enchanted knights that once served the Carian royal family.The enchanted knights, anointed by the Lunar Queen, were heroes of the highest honors, but fell into disarray with the decline of the royal family.
armors.lore: Gauntlets of the enchanted knights that once served the Carian royal family.
armors.how_to_acquire: You can find the Carian Knight Set in Raya Lucaria Academy.Elden Ring Map hereTo find the Carian Knight Set, you will need to fast travel back to the Church of the Cuckoo site and head to the graveyard section, specifically where the large rotating lift is. On the right side of the gate's entrance, look down as you are hugging the wall to find a platform that you can drop to. Walk on the narrow path and you'll notice a group of Glintstone Zombies worshipping a statue, simply kill the enemies and pick up the glowing item next to the statue to receive the set.

armors.name: Champion Bracers
armors.description: Bracers reserved for the bandlands' bravest. Proof that the wearer has slaughtered countless foes. Following the example of their chieftain Hoarah Loux, the brave warriors of the badlands shun excess adornment.
armors.lore:
Bracers reserved for the badlands' bravest.
Proof that the wearer has slaughtered countless foes.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Hero Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in south Caelid for 1,000 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Cleanrot Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets of the Cleanrot Knights, celebrated for their undefeated campaign in the Shattering.The Cleanrot Knights vowed to fight alongside Malenia, despite the inevitable, if gradual, putrefaction of their flesh. Their acceptance of their fate made these battles fiercest of all.
armors.lore: Gauntlets of the Cleanrot Knights, celebrated for their undefeated campaign in the Shattering.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from non-boss versions of Cleanrot Knights, found at Inner Aeonia and Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

armors.name: Confessor Gloves
armors.description: Black leather gloves of the church confessors. The churches outside the Lands Between, dedicated to the teachings of the Two Fingers, send confessors out to follow the guidance of grace. The confessors are loyal servants to the Two Fingers, ready to hunt down and quietly dispose of their enemies.
armors.lore: Black leather gloves of the church confessors.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Confessor Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for 1000 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Crucible Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord.Hold the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. Strengthen Aspects of the Crucible incantations.In time, the strength shown by these knights, and even their appearance, was seen as chaotic and deserving of scorn.
armors.lore: Gauntlets of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord.
armors.special_effect: Strengthen Aspects of the Crucible incantations.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Crucible Knight Ordovis, located at Auriza Hero's Grave.Elden Ring Map hereFound with the Crucible Tree Set in a chest within Deeproot Depths behind a mini-boss: Crucible Knight Siluria.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Cuckoo Knight Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets worn by Raya Lucaria Academy knights.Time has yet to dull their luster.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets worn by Raya Lucaria Academy knights.
Time has yet to dull their luster.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped from Raya Lucaria Academy Knights, also referred to as Cuckoo Knights. There are three nearby to the East Raya Lucaria Gate site of grace.

armors.name: Depraved Perfumer Gloves
armors.description: Gloves worn by depraved perfumers.These heresy-inclined perfumers imbibe their own spices to alter body and mind. Their slow descent into self-destruction is what earned them their name.
armors.lore: Gloves worn by depraved perfumers.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Depraved Perfumer Set pieces can be farmed from the Depraved Perfumer enemies located around The Shaded Castle

armors.name: Drake Knight Gauntlets
armors.description: Black iron gauntlets worn by drake knights.Features the spoils of a dragon catch as an emblem of pride as both dragon hunter and partaker of communion.From birth, drake knights speak not a word. They spend their lives pursuing the strength of dragons, for its sublime beauty and inspiration of awe
armors.lore:
Black iron gauntlets worn by drake knights.
Features the spoils of a dragon catch as an emblem of pride as both dragon hunter and partaker of communion.
armors.how_to_acquire: You can find the Drake Knight Set in Crumbling Farum Azula.Elden Ring Map hereTravel to the Beside The Great Bridge site of grace and go in the opposite direction of the boss room. Go through the building and outside onto the balcony. From here drop down to the Beastman with the big cleaver. Go along the bridge and call up the elevator. Ride the Elevator down and go Outside. The Drake Knight Set is on the left in a big chest.

armors.name: Eccentric's Manchettes
armors.description: The knight Jerren's manchettes. Jerren preferred a nomadic existence, but after spending time as a guest of the Carian royals, he became the guest commander for General Radahn. And for the first time, the restless tumbleweed would be bound by honorable oath.
armors.lore: The knight Jerren's manchettes.
armors.how_to_acquire: This armor piece is obtained as part of a set after the defeat of Witch-Hunter Jerren. This could be done as part of Sorceress Sellen's questline. Players will be given the option to side with Sellen or Jerren in Raya Lucaria Academy.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Elden Lord Bracers
armors.description: Bracers of Godfrey the first Elden Lord.The age of the Erdtree began amongst conflict, when Godfrey was lord of the battlefield.He led the War against the Giants. Faced the Storm Lord, alone. And then, there came a moment. When his last worthy enemy fell. And it was then, as the story is told, that the hue of Lord Godfrey's eyes faded.
armors.lore: Bracers of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord.
armors.how_to_acquire: Available from Enia after defeating Godfrey, First Elden Lord and Hoarah Loux, Warrior.

armors.name: Errant Sorcerer Manchettes
armors.description: Commonplace leather manchettes.Their hands are inlaid with dulled glintstone.
armors.lore:
Commonplace leather manchettes.
Their hands are inlaid with dulled glintstone.
armors.how_to_acquire: Looted off a corpse in Hermit Village, Mt. Gelmir. The corpse is found in a house in the northeast corner of the village.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Exile Gauntlets
armors.description: Damaged iron gauntlets. Worn by soldiers sent to the penal colonies.
armors.lore:
Damaged iron gauntlets.
Worn by soldiers sent to the penal colonies.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop from Exile Soldiers.

armors.name: Fingerprint Gauntlets
armors.description: Iron gauntlets singed and blistered by fingers. Worn by Vyke, knight of the Roundtable Hold. No other Tarnished was closer to the throne of the Elden Lord than Vyke. But without announcement, Vyke traveled far below the capital, and was scorched by the flame of frenzy. Did he make his choice for his maiden, or did some other force lure him with suggestion?
armors.lore:
Iron gauntlets singed and blistered by fingers.
Worn by Vyke, knight of the Roundtable Hold.
armors.how_to_acquire: Lord Contender's Evergaol: Dropped by Roundtable Knight Vyke upon defeat. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Fire Monk Gauntlets
armors.description: Black iron gauntlets featuring a flame motif. Attire of the Fire Monks. The Fire Monks are guardians of the flame of ruin, forbidden by the Erdtree and said to be kept high in the Mountaintops of the Giants.
armors.lore:
Black iron gauntlets featuring a flame motif.
Attire of the Fire Monks.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintop of the Giants.

armors.name: Fire Prelate Gauntlets
armors.description: Black iron gauntlets with the appearance of flames.Attire of the Fire Prelates, commanders of the Fire Monks.The weighty frames of the Prelates symbolized the onus of their grave vows as guardians of the flame. "Etch this sight upon thine breast. Of my thunderous gravity."
armors.lore:
Black iron gauntlets with the appearance of flames.
Attire of the Fire Prelates, commanders of the Fire Monks.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Fire Prelates.One can be found in Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir.One is in Guardians' Garrison in Mountaintop of the Giants.

armors.name: Foot Soldier Gauntlets
armors.description: Metal gauntlets covered in nicks and dents. Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.
armors.lore:
Metal gauntlets covered in nicks and dents.
Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Foot Soldier-type Soldier enemies. Defeat a Foot Soldier to gain a chance to obtain this item. Foot Soldiers can be found protecting the Purified Ruins.

armors.name: Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets worn by ordinary soldiers.Though plain in appearance, they offer dependable protection.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found at Church of Elleh, purchased from Merchant Kale. It costs 1000 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Gelmir Knight Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets worn by knights once loyal to Praetor Rykard. Time has yet to dull their luster.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets worn by knights once loyal to Praetor Rykard.
Time has yet to dull their luster.
armors.how_to_acquire: You can loot the entire Gelmir Knight Set in the Gelmir Hero's Grave dungeon from a Gelmir Knight corpse.Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Godrick Knight Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets worn by knights loyal to Godrick the Grafted. Time has yet to dull their luster.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets worn by knights loyal to Godrick the Grafted.
Time has yet to dull their luster.
armors.how_to_acquire: Fort Haight.: Chance to drop from the Godrick Knight atop the fort walls.

armors.name: Godrick Soldier Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets worn by soldiers loyal to Godrick the Grafted.Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets worn by soldiers loyal to Godrick the Grafted.
Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
armors.how_to_acquire: Gatefront Ruins, dropped by Godrick Soldiers patrolling the outpost.

armors.name: Godskin Apostle Bracelets
armors.description: Black bracelets of the Godskin Apostles.The apostles, once said to serve Destined Death, are wielders of the god-slaying black flame. But after their defeat by Maliketh, the Black Blade, the source of their power was sealed away.
armors.lore: Black bracelets of the Godskin Apostles.
armors.how_to_acquire: Defeating Godskin Apostle, located at the bottom of Divine Tower of Caelid.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Godskin Noble Bracelets
armors.description: Black bracelets of the Godskin Nobles. Nobles are the most ancient apostles who are said to have assimilated inhuman physiology. Not unlike the crucible, the Erdtree in its primordial form.
armors.lore: Black bracelets of the Godskin Nobles.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Godskin Noble Bossfight.Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Gold Bracelets
armors.description: Bracelets made in the image of Erdtree branches.Minimal adornments made by Lord Goldmask's disciples.Those disciples have long since left him.
armors.how_to_acquire: Gold Bracelets can be found on Goldmask's body after the completion of Brother Corhyn's questline. Head south from the Capital of Ash site of grace and go down the small path in the direction of the colosseum. Go past the plant enemies and stick to the left and you will find Goldmask. Look the rune from him, and reset the area and return to find the rest of his set on his body.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Golden Prosthetic
armors.description: Golden prosthetic forged using ancient techniques
armors.how_to_acquire: Currently Unobtainable.

armors.name: Guardian Bracers
armors.description: Engraved golden bracers.Worn by the guardians of the Minor Erdtree.In accordance with an ancient pact with the Erdtree, it is said that their deaths led not to destruction, but instead to renewed, eternal life as guardians.
armors.lore:
Engraved golden bracers.
Worn by the guardians of the Minor Erdtrees.
armors.how_to_acquire: Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from the Erdtree Guardians that are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.An area dense with Guardians can be found by starting at the Dragonbarrow Fork site of grace, and working your way uphill towards the Minor Erdtree. Guardians are encountered in small groups and more come up from the ground, making it a good place to farm the set.

armors.name: Haligtree Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets worn by soldiers sworn to the Haligtree. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets worn by soldiers sworn to the Haligtree.
Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
armors.how_to_acquire: Haligtree Soldiers drop all pieces of the set. They are located throughout all areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

armors.name: Haligtree Knight Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets worn by knights sworn to the Haligtree.Time has yet to dull their luster.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets worn by knights sworn to the Haligtree.
Time has yet to dull their luster.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from Haligtree Knights, they can be found in the latter areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

armors.name: Highwayman Gauntlets
armors.description: Hideously stained and dented gauntlets.Worn by former foot soldiers who have turned to banditry.
armors.lore:
Hideously stained and dented gauntlets.
Worn by former foot soldiers who have turned to banditry.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by the Bandits found in Murkwater Cave.

armors.name: Hoslow's Gauntlets
armors.description: Garish silver gauntlets decorated with red embellishments. Passed down through the Hoslow family.When Juno Hoslow received an invitation to the Volcano Manor, he discreetly refused."I have already walked many a road drenched in blood, yet never would I consider myself a champion."
armors.lore:
Garish silver gauntlets decorated with red embellishments.
Passed down through the Hoslow family.
armors.how_to_acquire: All pieces of Hoslow's Set are dropped by Juno Hoslow along with Hoslow's Petal Whip as part of the final contract for the Volcano Manor questline.Juno Hoslow is a Hostile NPC that you can invade after progressing through the questline. His invade rune be found in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants, east of Shack of the Lofty.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Iron Gauntlets
armors.description: Ordinary iron gauntlets.
armors.lore: Ordinary iron gauntlets.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for 1500 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Kaiden Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets worn by Kaiden sellswords. These hulking, fearless mercenaries, said to hail from the mountaintops of the wintry north, are adept at fighting on horseback. Kaiden is the name of their home settlement.
armors.lore: Gauntlets worn by Kaiden sellswords.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Northern Mercenaries and Mounted Northern Mercenaries found in Limgrave.

armors.name: Knight Gauntlets
armors.description: Iron gauntlets of an unknown knight. It is made of thin iron plate. Such metal armor is heavy, but provides considerable damage negation.
armors.lore:
Iron gauntlets of an unknown knight.
It is made of thin iron plate.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for 3,000 Runes.

armors.name: Land of Reeds Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets wrapped in tough leather.Worn by the warriors of the Land of Reeds
armors.lore:
Gauntlets wrapped in tough leather.
Worn by warriors of the Land of Reeds.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class.Sold by the Isolated Merchant in Dragonbarrow for 1,000 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Leather Gloves
armors.description: Lightweight and battle-proven leather gloves worn by a savvy soldier.Many admire the wearer of this armor for his chivalrous and forthright spirit.
armors.how_to_acquire: Murkwater Cave. Drops from Patches if he's killed after pleading for mercy. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Leyndell Knight Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets worn by knights sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell. Time has yet to dull their luster
armors.lore:
Gauntlets worn by knights sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.
Time has yet to dull their luster.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Gold Dragon Cult Knights.Chance to drop from Leyndell Knights encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

armors.name: Leyndell Soldier Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets worn by soldiers sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets worn by soldiers sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.
Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
armors.how_to_acquire: May drop from Knights in Leyndell Royal Capital.

armors.name: Lionel's Gauntlets
armors.description: Founded iron gauntlets. Worn by Lionel the Lionhearted. When this chivalrous dauntless knight met Fia, who had been driven from her home, he declared himself to be her father.
armors.lore:
Rounded iron gauntlets.
Worn by Lionel the Lionhearted.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Lusat's Manchettes
armors.description: Manchettes corroded by blue glintstones. Worn by Lusat, primeval current sorcerer.Lusat had reached a near-inorganic state.
armors.lore:
Manchettes corroded by blue glintstones.
Worn by Lusat, primeval current sorcerer.
armors.how_to_acquire: All three armor pieces can be found after completing Sorceress Sellen's questline and siding with Sellen, return to Lusat's location in the Sellia Hideaway. The entire set will be on the ground where he used to occupy.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Malenia's Gauntlet
