armors.description: Gauntlet made of unalloyed gold. Worn by Malenia, Blade of Miquella. Malenia awaited Miquella at the foot of the husk. "My brother will keep his promise. He possesses the wisdom, the allure, of a godhe is the most fearsome Empyrean of all."
armors.lore:
Gauntlet made of unalloyed gold.
Worn by Malenia, Blade of Miquella.
armors.how_to_acquire: Purchased from Enia for 12,000 runes after defeating Malenia Blade of Miquella.

armors.name: Malformed Dragon Gauntlets
armors.description: Malformed golden gauntlets.Adorned with various dragon imagery and worn by the misshapen Tree Sentinels.After the great ancient dragon Gransax attacked, the sentinels had an epiphany. The only way to truly protect the Erdtree was to become dragons themselves.
armors.lore:
Malformed golden gauntlets.
Adorned with various dragon imagery and worn by the misshapen Tree Sentinels.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by the Draconic Tree Sentinel in Crumbling Farum Azula.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Maliketh's Gauntlets
armors.description: Beast's gauntlets made of black iron and decorated with gold. Worn by Maliketh the Black Blade.Maliketh, Queen Marika's loyral half-brother, bore a blade imbued with Destined Death, and there was not one demigod who did not fear him. Champions knew what was at stake. Indeed, that is what made them champions
armors.lore:
Beast's gauntlets made of black iron and decorated with gold.
Worn by Maliketh the Black Blade.
armors.how_to_acquire: Bought from the Enia in the Roundtable Hold after defeating Maliketh, the Black Blade.

armors.name: Mausoleum Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets worn by headless soldiers who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum.Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets worn by headless soldiers who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum.
Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
armors.how_to_acquire: Mausoleum Soldier Set pieces drop from Mausoleum Soldiers. They can be found patrolling areas around some of the Wandering Mausoleums.An easy spot to farm this set is east of the East Gate Bridge Trestle site of grace in Liurnia of the Lakes. Several groups of 3 or 4 Mausoleum Soldiers are patrolling around this Wandering Mausoleum.

armors.name: Mausoleum Knight Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets worn by headless knights who endlessly guard the Walking Mausoleum.Time has yet to dull their luster.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets worn by headless knights who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum.
Time has yet to dull their luster.
armors.how_to_acquire: Mausoleum Knight Set pieces are dropped by Mausoleum Knights, typically found in Liurnia of the Lakes. The easiest one to farm is directly outside the Black Knife Catacombs entrance, which can be reset quickly with the site of grace.

armors.name: Millicent's Gloves
armors.description: Gloves worn by Millicent the Rotting
armors.how_to_acquire: The Millicent's Gloves Armor Gauntlets piece is not currently obtainable.

armors.name: Mushroom Arms
armors.description: Mushrooms found growing all over the body. These overgrown mushroom have colonized the arms. To those enraptured by the scarlet rot, they are holy vestments that root one to the earth.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found in a cavern in Seethewater Cave filled with mushroom people and a Giant Poison Flower.Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Night's Cavalry Gauntlets
armors.description: Pitch-black gauntlets thinly painted with dried blood.Worn by the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds.The Night's Cavalry, who now wander the dim roads of night, were once led by the Fell Omen and were deliverers of death for great warriors, knights, and champions.
armors.lore:
Pitch-black gauntlets thinly painted with dried blood.
Worn by the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds.
armors.how_to_acquire: You can find the Night's Cavalry Set within the Consecrated Snowfield: From the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace at night, look southwest and there will be a caravan being pulled by two giants and two Night's Cavalry escorts. Kill both the escorts to receive the armor alongside an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Noble's Gloves
armors.description: Gloves of plush leather. Worn by expatriated royalty. A gift of such rare beauty, a royal wouldn't disgrace their illustrious heritage even if found dead, in a ditch, in the middle of nowhere, while wearing such splendid raiment.
armors.lore:
Gloves of plush leather.
Worn by expatriated royalty.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Noble's Gloves along with other pieces of the Noble's Set can be found at East Windmill Pasture, Altus Plateau, in a burning pile of corpses surrounded by a circle of dancing women.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Nox Bracelets
armors.description: Monastic bracelets of the Eternal City.Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped from Nox Monk, Nox Swordstress, and Night Maiden enemies in Nokron and Nokstella.

armors.name: Omen Gauntlets
armors.description: Malformed Gauntlets resembling an Omen with its horns cut off.Worn by the Dung Eater, their form is a vision of the landscape of his mind, and of his appearance as he wished to see it.The heart of an Omen without the body to match; could there be a crueler existence? What does it matter, then, if the curse claims it all?
armors.lore: Malformed gauntlets resembling an Omen with its horns cut off.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Omen set can be found after killing the Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds at the Leyndell Royal Capital.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Omenkiller Long Gloves
armors.description: Long, stiff leather gloves worn by the Omenkillers.
armors.lore: Long, stiff leather gloves worn by the Omenkillers.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by an Omenkiller enemy at Perfumer's Ruins, together with Omenkiller Robe and Omenkiller Boots.Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Perfumer Gloves
armors.description: Gloves of an Erdtree Capital perfumer.In time past, the role of perfumer was much respected; a blessed apothecary in the eyes of the many. But after entering the battlefields of the Shattering they performed no such role, trading their aromatics for poisons and explosives.
armors.lore: Gloves of an Erdtree Capital perfumer.
armors.how_to_acquire: Chance to drop from Perfumer enemies encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

armors.name: Preceptor's Gloves
armors.description: Gloves of the magic preceptors who serve the Carian royals.Black and perfectly discreet.
armors.lore:
Gloves of the magic preceptors who serve the Carian royals.
Black and perfectly discreet.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found on Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Queen's Bracelets
armors.description: Bracelets indicating the highest order of sorcerer. Worn by Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon. When Rennala, head of both the Academy of Raya Lucaria and the Carian royal family, lost her husband Radagon, her heart went along with him. And then, those at the academy realized. That Rennala was no champion, after all.
armors.lore:
Bracelets indicating the highest order of sorcerer.
Worn by Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon.
armors.how_to_acquire: Queen's Bracelets can be purchased to Enia in Roundtable Hold for 7,000 Need to defeat Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon Bossfight first.

armors.name: Radahn Soldier Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets worn by soldiers who fought by General Radahn's side.Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets worn by soldiers who fought by General Radahn's side.
Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
armors.how_to_acquire: Chace to drop from Radahn Soldiers, easily found in large numbers around Fort Gael.

armors.name: Radahn's Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets depicting the golden lion. Worn by General Radahn. The golden lion is said to symbolize Godfrey, the first Elden Lord, and his beast regent, Serosh. From his youngest years, Radahn was naturally captivated by the Lord of the Battlefield.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets depicting the golden lion.
Worn by General Radahn.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Radahn's Gauntlets Armor Gauntlets can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for 8,000 runes once Starscourge Radahn has been defeated.

armors.name: Ragged Gloves
armors.description: Gauntlets pieced together from scavenged metal.
armors.how_to_acquire: Not currently obtainable.

armors.name: Raging Wolf Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets worn by Vargram the Raging Wolf, one of the first Tarnished to visit the Roundtable Hold. According to the old legends, wolves are the shadows of the Empyrean. Vargram aspired to such a state himself.
armors.lore: Gauntlets worn by Vargram the Raging Wolf, one of the first Tarnished to visit the Roundtable Hold.
armors.how_to_acquire: Leyndell, Royal Capital. After obtaining the second to last letter from Volcano Manor, you will be sent to assist Knight Bernahl with assassinating Vargram the Raging Wolf and Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm. On successful invasion, you will receive the full Raging Wolf Set.Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Raya Lucarian Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets worn by Raya Lucaria Academy soldiers. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets worn by Raya Lucaria Academy soldiers.
Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be dropped by Raya Lucaria Knights.Easily farmed from the Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Carian Manor after the Manor Lower Level site of grace.

armors.name: Redmane Knight Gauntlets
armors.description: Black iron guantlets worn by knights who fought by General Radahn's side. Time has yet to dull their luster.
armors.lore: Black iron gauntlets worn by knights who fought by General Radahn's side. Time has yet to dull their luster.
armors.how_to_acquire: Chance to drop from Radahn Knight in Fort Gael.

armors.name: Ronin's Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets of the man who calls himself Shabriri.Highly functional and heavily worn.The man, once known as Yura, kept a woman in the deepest reaches of his heart.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets of the man who calls himself Shabriri.
Highly functional and heavily worn.
armors.how_to_acquire: Acquired by following Yura's questline.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Royal Knight Gauntlets
armors.description: Silver gauntlets of Loretta, a knight who served Miquella's Haligtree. Loretta, once a royal Carian knight, went on a journey in search of a haven for Albinaurics, and determined that the Haligtree was their best chance for eventual salvation.
armors.lore: Silver gauntlets of Loretta, a knight who served Miquella's Haligtree.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be brought from Finger Reader Enia, at Roundtable Hold after defeating Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree for 4000.

armors.name: Royal Remains Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets graces with gold human bones.Worn by the unspeaking adherent of Sir Gideon the All-Knowing.Slowly replenishes HP when HP is reduced.It is said that the bones belong to an ancient lord - the soulless king. The lord of the lost and desperate, who was known as Ensha.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets graced with gold human bones.
Worn by the unspeaking adherent of Sir Gideon the All-Knowing.
armors.special_effect: Slowly replenishes HP when HP is reduced.
armors.how_to_acquire: Upon attaining the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right), Ensha of the Royal Remains will invade the players world the next time they travel back to Roundtable Hold. The full Royal Remains Set is acquired after beating him.

armors.name: Scaled Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets worn by Old Knight Istvan.The corroded metal is reinforced with rock-hard scales, making it high effective against non-physical attacks.Istvan is one of a few wizened Tarnished who survived to this day.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets worn by Old Knight Istvan.
The corroded metal is reinforced with rock-hard scales, making it highly effective against non-physical attacks.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found after killing the first assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Old Knight Istvan.Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Sorcerer Manchettes
armors.description: Manchettes worn by Raya Lucaria's magic scholars. Made by wrapping a simple cloth around the forearms.
armors.lore:
Manchettes worn by Raya Lucaria's scholars of sorcery.
Made by wrapping a simple cloth around the forearms.
armors.how_to_acquire: They are dropped by Raya Lucaria Sorcerers in Raya Lucaria Academy.

armors.name: Spellblade's Gloves
armors.description: Glintstone sorcerer Rogier's traveling attire, graced with an intricate, aristocratic decoration. Strengthens glintstone sorcery skills.Rogier spent his entire life behaving with utter detachment. No one noticed the anger, grief, regret, or fear that existed along with it.
armors.lore: Glintstone sorcerer Rogier's gloves, graced with an intricate, aristocratic decoration. Strengthen glintstone sorcery skills.
armors.special_effect: Strengthens magic and cold weapon skills by 2%
armors.how_to_acquire: Roundtable Hold - Drops from Rogier.

armors.name: Traveler's Gloves
armors.description: Gloves of a traveling perfumer of no renown. An associate of a healer, he is said to be in search of new aromatics and flower gardens, in hopes of treating Misbegotten, Omen and all those seen as impure.
armors.lore: Gloves of a traveling perfumer of no renown.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found in a corpse in one of the corners of the buildings within Street of Sages Ruins, in Caelid's Swamp area, alongside the entire Traveler's Set.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Traveler's Manchettes
armors.description: Light yet sturdy leather manchettes.Worn by young women who set off into the world to confront their fate.
armors.lore: Light yet sturdy leather manchettes.
armors.how_to_acquire: Just before fighting Malenia, at the Haligtree Roots site of grace in Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree, there is a side room with a large blooming red flower. Melina's Set pieces are looted in front of the flower. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Traveling Maiden Gloves
armors.description: Gloves worn by traveling maidens.Maidens traversed the Lands Between for different reasons. Some to seek audience with the Fingers. Others, to find the Tarnished who they were destined to guide.
armors.lore: Gloves worn by traveling maidens.
armors.how_to_acquire: On a corpse inside the Shack of The Lofty in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants. The rest of the set can also be looted here.Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Tree Sentinel Gauntlets
armors.description: Golden gauntlets of the heavy cavalry Tree Sentinels who serve the Erdtree.Imposingly sturdy and nigh unbreakable, the grace of old yet lingers.
armors.lore: Golden gauntlets of the heavy cavalry Tree Sentinels who serve the Erdtree.
armors.how_to_acquire: See the Tree Sentinel Set page for a guide on how to attain the set.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Twinned Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets depicting entwined twins of gold and silver. The two known as D are inseparable twins.They are of two bodies and two minds, but one single soul. Not once do they stand together; not one word do they speak to one another.Perhaps this armor longs to find its way to the other D.
armors.lore: Gauntlets depicting entwined twins of gold and silver.
armors.how_to_acquire: Earliest location: Limgrave East upon killing D Hunter.Elden Ring Map hereObtained at end of D Hunter's questline.

armors.name: Vagabond Knight Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets of a knight banished form their motherland.Dirty and battered after enduring a lengthy vagabond journey.Metal armor is heavy, but also sturdy, offering significant damage negation.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets of a knight banished from their motherland.
Dirty and battered after enduring a lengthy vagabond journey.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Vagabond Class.Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 1,000 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Veteran's Gauntlets
armors.description: Old gauntlets that has seen many battles. Worn by Niall, the veteran general of Sol.Niall was a lone survivor who commanded spirits to defend his long-passed master.This aging general could not die, nor did he have anywhere to fade away.
armors.lore:
Old gauntlets that have seen many battles.
Worn by Niall, the veteran general of Sol.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after killing Commander Niall at Castle Sol Rooftop.

armors.name: Vulgar Militia Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets worn by lean, mean, and filthy militiamen.Freshly-singed battlegrounds effusing with the stench of the dead. Forbidden lands that will be excised from the memory of history. This is where the vulgar militia serve, as untiring, unsung watchkeepers.
armors.lore: Gauntlets worn by lean, mean, and filthy militiamen.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Vulgar Militia Gauntlets Armor Gauntlets piece can be found by killing Vulgar Militiamen enemies around the Bestial Sanctum and Farum Greatbridge sites of grace.

armors.name: War Surgeon Gloves
armors.description: "Bloodstained white gloves of the war surgeons who were effectively mercy killers.Of the surgeons that were abducted by the Lord of Blood none were able to tame the accursed blood.None but Varre, that is; though he was an exception."
armors.lore: Bloodstained white gloves of the war surgeons who were effectively mercy killers.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by killing one of three Nameless White Mask NPC invaders in the Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum area of Siofra River, northwest of the Palace Approach Ledge-Road site of grace, in the blood filled lake. This one can be found adjacent to the Giant Crow enemy near the blood filled lake drop off.

armors.name: Warrior Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets of a nomadic warrior.Crafted from sturdy leather.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets of a nomadic warrior.
Crafted from sturdy leather.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Warrior Class.Purchasable from Isolated Merchant (Raya Lucaria). Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: White Reed Gauntlets
armors.description: Gauntlets of the White Reeds, fashioned from banded iron plates. Worn by the Inabam head disciples of the great swordsman Okina. The Inaba traveled in pursuit of not only the master who abandoned them, but also proper deaths, won honorably through hard-fought combat. To be a White Reed is to seek death; fitting for the Inaba, who desired nothingmore than to die by the sword.
armors.lore:
Gauntlets of the White Reeds, fashioned from banded iron plates.
Worn by the Inaba, head disciples of the great swordsman Okina.
armors.how_to_acquire: Spiritcaller's Cave in the Mountaintops of the Giants: Found on a corpse in a long cavern filled with spirit wolves. The White Reed Armor and White Reed Greaves can also be found on this corpse. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Zamor Bracelets
armors.description: Bracelets worn by knights of Zamor, hailed as heroes in the War against the Giants. These long-lived warriors, clad in biting, freezing winds, are said to have been the mortal enemies of the Fire Giants since time immemorial.
armors.lore: Bracelets worn by knights of Zamor, hailed as heroes in the War against the Giants.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor fought at the Mountaintops of the Giants.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Dryleaf Cuissardes
armors.description: Sun-faded and lightly soiled travel attire worn by clergymen. Boots made of sturdy leather.
armors.lore:
Sun-faded and lightly soiled travel attire worn by clergymen.
Boots made of sturdy leather.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found under a waterfall in the lower portions under Bonny Village. This area can only be accessed by using the ladder in Shadow Keep to get down to a special teleport coffin (this Elden Ring Map location). This will take you to Ruins of Unte and you must follow the cliffs downstream and then carefully drop down to bottom level to reach the area. [Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Gaius's Greaves
armors.description: Black iron greaves made for Commander Gaius. A cruel joke, for he could not wear them. Riding atop the boar he called his other half, Gaius was in fact a warrior of albinauric extraction.
armors.lore:
Black iron greaves made for Commander Gaius.
A cruel joke, for he could not wear them.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Albinauric Wolfback Archer South-West of the Scadutree Chalice. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Oathseeker Knight Greaves
armors.description: Oathseeker Knight greaves. Black with gold ornamentation. These knights set off on quests of discovery, hoping to find by themselves an oath of their own choosing to serve in perfect, lifelong devotion.
armors.lore:
Oathseeker Knight greaves.
Black with gold ornamentation.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found inside a hanging body, just outside the Church of Benediction. It contains the whole set: Oathseeker Knight Greaves, Oathseeker Knight Gauntlets, Oathseeker Knight Armor, and Oathseeker Knight Helm. It also contains Pata weapon. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Verdigris Greaves
armors.description: Greaves made from an unusual metal known as verdigris. Verdigris is said to be the gift of an outer god. Possessed of an enormously hefty yet supple strength thanks to its rusted nature.
armors.lore: Greaves made from an unusual metal known as verdigris.
armors.how_to_acquire: Complete Moore's questline

armors.name: Iron Rivet Greaves
armors.description: Greaves of Red Bear, whose name is lost to madness. Reinforced with iron rivets. After killing the great red bear in a blood-soaked bout, he became fascinated by the untainted glory of its naked strength. "I wish to be a bear, no more, and no less."
armors.lore:
Greaves of Red Bear, whose name is lost to madness.
Reinforced with iron rivets.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Red Bear. Red Bear can be found at the Northern Nameless Mausoleum. The Northern Nameless Mausoleum is located East of the Temple Ruins. [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Thiollier's Trousers
armors.description: The dark trousers of those who wield poison in secret, ever scorned and loathed.
armors.lore: The dark trousers of those who wield poison in secret, ever scorned and loathed.
armors.how_to_acquire: Summon Thiollier during the battle at the end of his questline, then loot his body in the boss arena after the fight.

armors.name: High Priest Undergarments
armors.description: Undergarments of Count Ymir, High Priest. Soft and well-tailored.
armors.lore:
Undergarments of Count Ymir, High Priest.
Soft and well-tailored.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Count Ymir, Mother of Fingers, who can be found in the Cathedral of Manus Metyr after interacting with the throne, you can only find Count Ymir there after you have defeated Metyr, Mother of Fingers. [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Soiled Loincloth
armors.description: This lightly soiled loincloth of ragged cloth does little more than conceal one's nether regions.
armors.lore: This lightly soiled loincloth of ragged cloth does little more than conceal one's nether regions.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Hornsent when invaded close to the Rauh Ancient Ruins site of grace. [Video Location]

armors.name: Dancer's Trousers
armors.description: Long, black trousers worn underneath the deep crimson dress of the Ranah dancers. Enhances the power of dancing attacks.
armors.lore: Long, black trousers worn underneath the deep crimson dress of the Ranah dancers.
armors.special_effect: Enhances the power of dancing attacks by 2.5%.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by defeating Dancer of Ranah at the Southern Nameless Mausoleum [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Interactive Map]

armors.name: Greaves of Night
armors.description: Bottomless greaves, cool to the touch.Flowing lines in the seeming shape of a fingerprint adorn the surface. Imprisons the wearer in utterly lightless dark.Bestowed upon those born deep underground, ordaining them as Swordhands of Night.
armors.lore:
Bottomless greaves, cool to the touch.
Flowing lines in the seeming shape of a fingerprint adorn the surface. Imprisons the wearer in utterly lightless dark.
armors.how_to_acquire: Bonny Gaol: Use the jar lift near the bridge twice to reach the top level of the gaol. First, hop on the jar, go to the bridge level, and activate the switch. Ride the jar lift for the second time to go to the top level. You can find the Night Set on a corpse laying on top of a table. [See SOTE Elden Ring DLC Map] [Video Link]

armors.name: Igon's Loincloth
armors.description: Loincloth of the broken drake warrior Igon. Stripped from a corpse found in the aftermath of a battle, this scrap of cloth smells utterly foul.
armors.lore: Loincloth of the broken drake warrior Igon. Stripped from a corpse found in the aftermath of a battle, this scrap of cloth smells utterly foul.
armors.how_to_acquire: Loot Igon after defeating Bayle the Dread

armors.name: Ansbach's Boots
armors.description: Boots of Sir Ansbach. Black leather adorned with gold embroidery. Slightly enhances Blood Oath and dynastic skills.
armors.lore: Boots of Sir Ansbach. Black leather adorned with gold embroidery.
armors.special_effect: Slightly enhances Blood Oath and dynastic skills by 3%
armors.how_to_acquire: Complete Sir Ansbach's questline all the way through the end, and side with him when facing Leda, and then Promised Consort Radahn/ Radahn, Consort of Miquella. After the fight is over, Sir Ansbach's body will be near the site of grace, alongside with his equipment and his Incantation. [Map Link]

armors.name: Freyja's Greaves
armors.description: Greaves of Redmane Freyja, member of General Radahn's most distinguished knights. After witnessing Freyja's valor as a gladiator in his youth, Radahn invited her to join the ranks of his most trusted warriors.
armors.lore: Greaves of Redmane Freyja, member of General Radahn's most distinguished knights.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop by Redmane Freyja.

armors.name: Greaves of Solitude
armors.description: Steel greaves of the Knights of the Solitary Gaol. Part of a heavy armor set that covers the whole body in overlapping plates of steel. The nameless mausoleums of the realm of shadow are said to hold the spirits of warriors who lost their names, or their hearts.
armors.lore:
Steel greaves of the Knights of the Solitary Gaol.
Part of a heavy armor set that covers the whole body in overlapping plates of steel.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be obtained after defeating the Blackgaol Knight found inside Northern Nameless Mausoleum. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Messmer Soldier Greaves
armors.description: Greaves worn by soldiers who serve Messmer the Impaler, rusted and crusted in filth from fighting in unending war.
armors.lore: Greaves worn by soldiers who serve Messmer the Impaler, rusted and crusted in filth from fighting in unending war.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop by Messmer Soldiers

armors.name: Black Knight Greaves
armors.description: Greaves worn by the Black Knights, servants of Messmer the Impaler. Black iron ornamented with gold. A rotten odor stubbornly clings to it. Perhaps it arises from the tainted nature of the blood that splattered upon it. Or perhaps it is the wearer's own blackened soul, festering after endless slaughter.
armors.lore: Greaves worn by the Black Knights, servants of Messmer the Impaler. Black iron ornamented with gold. A rotten odor stubbornly clings to it.
armors.how_to_acquire: Black Knight Set pieces are dropped from Black Knights, found throughout the Lands of Shadow.

armors.name: Rakshasa Greaves
armors.description: Greaves of Rakshasa, soaked the spurting blood of her victims. Tatters of ragged cloth jut out haphazardly, as if her lust for carnage threatens to break free.Increases damage dealt to foes, but greatly increases damage taken by the wearer.Cut down and devour. Only those who repeat the cycle without rest can truly subvert the self and become Rakshasa.
armors.lore: Greaves of Rakshasa, soaked the spurting blood of her victims. Tatters of ragged cloth jut out haphazardly, as if her lust for carnage threatens to break free.
armors.special_effect: Boosts All Damage by 2% but increases damage taken
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Rakshasa in Eastern Nameless Mausoleum. This area can only be accessed by using the ladder in Shadow Keep to get down to a special teleport coffin (this Elden Ring Map location). This will take you to Ruins of Unte and you must follow the cliffs downstream and then carefully drop down to bottom level to reach the mausoleum. [Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Fire Knight Greaves
armors.description: Greaves of the Fire Knights under Messmer the Impaler's personal command. Each and every knight hailed from a renowned family of the Erdtree's upper echelons, but were shunned and chased from their homes after pledging allegiance to Messmer as their master.
armors.lore: Greaves of the Fire Knights under Messmer the Impaler's personal command.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop by Fire Knights in the Shadow Keep

armors.name: Leather Leg Wraps
armors.description: Leg wraps worn by highland warriors, made of sturdy leather and fastened with winding straps. The addition of animal pelt keeps the wearer warm. Highland warriors are known to be hunters of bears; to them, there is no act more glorious than the subjugation of a savage beast.
armors.lore: Leg wraps worn by highland warriors, made of sturdy leather and fastened with winding straps. The addition of animal pelt keeps the wearer warm.
armors.how_to_acquire: To the northwest of the Ravine North Site of Grace, there is a forest inhabited by runebears. At the center of this forest, you'll find a large stone with several items on it, this whole armor set is at the top of the stone. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Death Knight Greaves
armors.description: Golden greaves of the Death Knights, adorned with an antiquated depiction of the Erdtree. Enhances skills and incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult. These knights, once Godwyn's personal guard, quested to find their transfigured master's cadaver surrogatefor the coming age of the Duskborn.
armors.lore: Golden greaves of the Death Knights, adorned with an antiquated depiction of the Erdtree.
armors.special_effect: Enhances skills and incantations of the ancient dragon cult by 2%
armors.how_to_acquire: Darklight Catacombs, on a Death Knight corpse

armors.name: Ascetic's Ankle Guards
armors.description: Ankle guards of the tower's ascetics which embody their commitment to an austere existence of strict self-control. In order to ascend from their mortal flesh into tutelary deities of the land, they heighten their spirituality through severe ascetic training.
armors.lore: Ankle guards of the tower's ascetics which embody their commitment to an austere existence of strict self-control.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop by Curseblade enemies.

armors.name: Messmer's Greaves
armors.description: Black greaves of Messmer the Impaler. On his mother's wishes, Messmer made himself a symbol of fear, undertaking the cleansing crusade she desired. "Direct thy maledictions, thine ire, and thy grief towards me alone."
armors.lore: Black greaves of Messmer the Impaler.
armors.how_to_acquire: Purchase from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Messmer the Impaler

armors.name: Gravebird Anklets
armors.description: Stone anklets with a tinge of green. One of a set of armor pieces cast in the image of the Gravebird. Gravebirds are ancient golems, created to guard the spiritgraves built where all manners of Death ultimately drift.
armors.lore: Stone anklets with a tinge of green. One of a set of armor pieces cast in the image of the Gravebird.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found in a swamp infested with Gravebirds, below a big archway. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Common Soldier Greaves
armors.description: Greaves of the rank-and-file soldiers of Messmer's army. A pitch-dark soot clings to it, much like the inner faces of the men who wore them.
armors.lore: Greaves of the rank-and-file soldiers of Messmer's army.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop by soldiers in Castle Ensis

armors.name: Horned Warrior Greaves
armors.description: Greaves of the horned warriors, keepers of the tower. Shaped to resemble the unclothed form of a hero from older times.
armors.lore: Greaves of the horned warriors, keepers of the tower. Shaped to resemble the unclothed form of a hero from older times.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from Horned Warriors ( Small Private Altar site of grace in Belurat, Tower Settlement)

armors.name: Divine Bird Warrior Greaves
armors.description: Greaves of divine bird warriors, the very first of all horned warriors, made from a golden metal. The great, sharp talons increase the force generated by kicks.
armors.lore: Greaves of divine bird warriors, the very first of all horned warriors, made from a golden metal.
armors.special_effect: Increases the force generated by kicks by 5%
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Divine Bird Warriors

armors.name: Rellana's Greaves
armors.description: Ornate greaves of Rellana, the Twin Moon Knight, fashioned from silver steel.
armors.lore: Ornate greaves of Rellana, the Twin Moon Knight, fashioned from silver steel.
armors.how_to_acquire: The complete set (Rellana's Set) can be bought from Enia in the Roundtable Hold upon defeating Rellana Twin Moon Knight.

armors.name: Young Lion's Greaves
armors.description: The golden greaves worn by Radahn in his younger years. Worn by a fierce lion. When Malenia, Blade of Miquella, let the rotflower blossom in Aeonia, Radahn heard a murmur in his ear "Miquella awaits thee, O promised consort."
armors.lore: The golden greaves worn by Radahn in his younger years. Worn by a fierce lion.
armors.how_to_acquire: Purchase from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Promised Consort Radahn / Radahn, Consort of Miquella in Enir-Ilim [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

armors.name: Shadow Militiaman Greaves
armors.description: Greaves as dark as shadow, worn by vulgar militiamen. Freshly-singed battlegrounds effusing with the stench of the dead. Forbidden lands that will be excised from the memory of history. What better place than the realms of shadow then, for such an army?
armors.lore: Greaves as dark as shadow, worn by vulgar militiamen.
armors.how_to_acquire: May drop from Shadow Militiaman enemies

armors.name: All-Knowing Greaves
armors.description: Greaves set with countless eyes and ears. Worn by Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing. Knowledge begins with the recognition of one's ignorance. The realization that the search for knowledge is unending. But when Gideon glimpsed into the will of Queen Marika, he shuddered in fear. At the end that should not be.
armors.lore:
Greaves set with countless eyes and ears.
Worn by Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing.
armors.how_to_acquire: The entire All-Knowing Set is dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing upon defeat. Sir Gideon is encountered as a boss in Leyndell, Capital of Ash, a alternate version of the Royal Capital accessible only after making significant progress in the story.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Alberich's Trousers
armors.description: Mad Tongue Alberich's trousers.Alberiches was an aloof yet disturbed heretical sorcerer said to have been driven mad by jeering tongues during his service to the Roundtable Hold long ago.
armors.lore: Mad Tongue Alberich's trousers.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found at the lower level of the Fortified Manor at Leyndell Royal Capital. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link.

armors.name: Astrologer Trousers
armors.description: Trousers worn inside a robe. Worn by those who look to the cosmos above. They read fate in the stars, and are said to be heirs of the glintstone sorcerers. But alas, the night sky no longer cradles fate.
armors.lore:
Trousers worn inside a robe.
Worn by those who look to the cosmos above.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Astrologer Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for 1000 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Bandit Boots
armors.description: Leather boots worn by bandits.Light for ease of movement, and supple for masking sound. In this trade, they offer little damage negation.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class.Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after offering Gostoc's Bell Bearing.

armors.name: Banished Knight Greaves
armors.description: Thick, full set of armor covering the entire body. These greaves were worn by knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes. These fierce warriors were each and all accomplished. Perhaps that is why, despite their territorial losses, they were still named knights.
armors.lore:
Thick, full set of armor covering the entire body.
These greaves were worn by knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes.
armors.how_to_acquire: Stormveil Castle: Chance for it to be looted off the Banished Knight enemies that you've killed.

armors.name: Beast Champion Greaves
armors.description: Silver greaves engraved with tiny beasts. Worn by Bernahl the Recusant.Beasts are drawn to champions, and to lords. And this armor befits a champion worthy of becoming a lord. And that is what Bernahl was.Until his maiden threw herself into the fire.
armors.lore:
Silver greaves engraved with tiny beasts.
Worn by Bernahl the Recusant.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. If not killed before, he will eventually invade you at Crumbling Farum Azula, dropping the entire set with an altered version of the chest piece. Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Black Knife Greaves
armors.description: Greaves used by the Black Knife Assassins. Crafted with scale armor that makes no sound. The assassins that carried out the deeds of the Night of the Black Knives were all women, and rumored to be Numen who had close ties with Marika herself.
armors.lore:
Greaves used by the Black Knife Assassins.
Crafted with scale armor that makes no sound.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found on a corpse under an archway behind Ordina, Liturgical Town in Consecrated Grounds. Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Blackflame Monk Greaves
armors.description: Black iron greaves featuring a flame motif.Attire of the Blackflame Monks.The Blackflame Monks, enthralled by the god-slaying black flame, became traitors, abandoning their posts as guardians. The seduction of a taboo is never easily spurned.
armors.lore:
Black iron greaves featuring a flame motif.
Attire of the Blackflame Monks.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop from Blackflame Monks.

armors.name: Bloodhound Knight Greaves
armors.description: Metal greaves of the Bloodhound Knights. The Bloodhound Knights are trained as hunters and known to be unshakable trackers. Without the use of language, each knight chooses his own master. Once the decision has been made the knight stays loyal for life.
armors.lore: Metal greaves of the Bloodhound Knights.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops in Gelmir Hero's Grave - Mt. Gelmir.

armors.name: Briar Greaves
armors.description: Battered iron greaves from a foreign land.Worn by Elemer of the Briar. The winding, rusted iron briars are a mark of the guilty and typically indicate a sentence of death. They also cause this armor to deal damage when performing dodge rolls.Elemer murderd numerous instructors and merchants, and was known as the Bell Bearing Hunter.
armors.how_to_acquire: Purchased from the Enia in Roundtable Hold after defeating Elemer of the Briar in The Shaded Castle.

armors.name: Bull-Goat Greaves
armors.description: Great Horned Tragoth's greaves. Covers its wearer with a pair of giant horns, providing staunch poise. Tragoth is a famed knight of assistance. Countless Tarnished, facing adversity in the Lands Between, have survived thanks only to the Great Horned One's aid.
armors.lore: Great Horned Tragoth's greaves, adorned with a gold bull-goat motif. Provide high poise.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found after killing Patches' assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Great Horned Tragoth. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Champion Gaiters
armors.description: Gaiters formed only with leather straps.Common wear in the badlands.
armors.lore:
Gaiters formed only with leather straps.
Common wear in the badlands.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Hero Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in south Caelid for 1,000 Runes. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Carian Knight Greaves
armors.description: Greaves of the enchanted knights that once served the Carian royal family.The enchanted knights, anointed by the Lunar Queen, were all decorated heroes, were heroes of the highest honors, but fell into disarray with the decline of the royal family.
armors.lore: Greaves of the enchanted knights that once served the Carian royal family.
armors.how_to_acquire: You can find the Carian Knight Set in Raya Lucaria Academy.Elden Ring Map hereTo find the Carian Knight Set, you will need to fast travel back to the Church of the Cuckoo site and head to the graveyard section, specifically where the large rotating lift is. On the right side of the gate's entrance, look down as you are hugging the wall to find a platform that you can drop to. Walk on the narrow path and you'll notice a group of Glintstone Zombies worshipping a statue, simply kill the enemies and pick up the glowing item next to the statue to receive the set.

armors.name: Chain Leggings
armors.description: Leggings made of woven chain. Standard issue for ordinary soldiers. Though plain in appearance, they offer dependable protection.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found at Church of Elleh, purchased from Merchant Kale. It costs 1000 Runes. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link.Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Kale's Bell Bearing

armors.name: Cleanrot Greaves
armors.description: Greaves of the Cleanrot Knights, celebrated for their undefeated campaign in the Shattering.The Cleanrot Knights vowed to fight alongside Malenia, despite the inevitable, if gradual, putrefaction of their flesh. Their acceptance of their fate made these battles fiercest of all.
armors.lore: Greaves of the Cleanrot Knights, celebrated for their undefeated campaign in the Shattering.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Cleanrot Knight enemies. Found in places such as: Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs and Miquella's HaligtreeCan be found at Inner Aeonia

armors.name: Cloth Trousers
armors.description: Trousers made of coarse material, commonly worn in the Lands Between.
armors.lore: Trousers made of coarse material, commonly worn in the Lands Between.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found at the chest located at the end of Murkwater Cave, alongside Cloth Garb. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Commoner's Shoes
armors.description: Modest shoes made of cloth. Standard wear for commoners of the Lands Between. Only, there are no commoners remaining with their wits about them.
armors.lore:
Modest shoes made of cloth.
Standard wear for commoners of the Lands Between.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can drop from Commoner enemies in Stormveil Castle.

armors.name: Confessor Boots
armors.description: Leather boots of the church confessors. The churches outside the Lands Between, dedicated to the teachings of the Two Fingers, send confessors out to follow the guidance of grace. The confessors are loyal servants to the Two Fingers, ready to hunt down and quietly dispose of their enemies.
armors.lore: Leather boots of the church confessors.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Confessor Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for 1000 Runes. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Consort's Trousers
armors.description: Fine white trousers, perfectly suited for wearing beneath a silk robe.
armors.lore: Fine white trousers, perfectly suited for wearing beneath a silk robe.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for 1,500 Runes.Elden Ring Map hereLooted from the corpse of Tanith after attacking her and defeating the summoned Tannith's Knight near the Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy site of grace in Volcano Manor, Altus Plateau.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Crucible Greaves
armors.description: Greaves of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. Hold the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. Strengthen Aspects of the Crucible incantations. In time, the strength shown by these knights, and even their appearance, was seen as chaotic and deserving of scorn.
armors.lore: Greaves of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord.
armors.special_effect: 3.5% damage increase to Aspect of the Crucible Incantations
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Crucible Knight Ordovis at Auriza Hero's Grave. Elden Ring Interactive Map LinkFound with the Crucible Tree Set in a chest within Deeproot Depths behind a mini-boss: Crucible Knight Siluria.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Eccentric's Breeches
armors.description: The knight Jerren's breeches. Jerren preferred a nomadic existence, but after spending time as a guest of the Carian royals, he became the guest commander for General Radahn. And for the first time, the restless tumbleweed would be bound by honorable oath.
armors.lore: The knight Jerren's breeches.
armors.how_to_acquire: This armor piece is obtained as part of a set after the defeat of Witch-Hunter Jerren. This could be done as part of Sorceress Sellen's questline. Players will be given the option to side with Sellen or Jerren in Raya Lucaria Academy.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Elden Lord Greaves
armors.description: Greaves of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord.The age of the Erdtree began amongst conflict, when Godfrey was lord of the battlefield.He led the War against the Giants. Faced the Storm Lord, alone. And then, there came a moment. When his last worthy enemy fell. And it was then, as the story is told, that the hue of Lord Godfrey's eyes faded.
armors.lore: Greaves of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord.
armors.how_to_acquire: Available from Enia after defeating Godfrey, First Elden Lord and Hoarah Loux, Warrior.

armors.name: Errant Sorcerer Boots
armors.description: Commonplace leather boots, sturdy enough to withstand a long journey.
armors.lore: Commonplace leather boots, sturdy enough to withstand a long journey.
armors.how_to_acquire: Looted off a corpse in Hermit Village, Mt. Gelmir. The corpse is found in a house in the northeast corner of the village.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Exile Greaves
armors.description: Damaged iron greaves. Worn by soldiers sent to the penal colonies.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drop from Exile Soldiers.

armors.name: Finger Maiden Shoes
armors.description: Shoes worn by maidens who serve the Two Fingers. The maidens live to serve a chosen Tarnished, sharing their guidance and the wisdom of the Two Fingers. The guidance of grace would ensure that the pair be brought together. Or at least, such was the promise long ago.
armors.lore: Shoes worn by maidens who serve the Two Fingers.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found inside Church of Inhibition directly beside a Grace. Run past NPC invader to touch Grace first. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Fire Monk Greaves
armors.description: Black iron greaves featuring a flame motif.Attire of the Fire Monks.The Fire Monks are guardians of the flame of ruin, forbidden by the Erdtree and said to be kept high in the Mountaintops of the Giants.
armors.lore:
Black iron greaves featuring a flame motif.
Attire of the Fire Monks.
armors.how_to_acquire: Pieces of the Fire Monk Set are dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintop of the Giants.

armors.name: Foot Soldier Greaves
armors.description: Metal Graves that have already been mended countless times.Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.
armors.lore:
Metal greaves that have already been mended countless times.
Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Foot Soldier-type Soldier enemies. Defeat a Foot Soldier to gain a chance to obtain this item. Foot Soldiers can be found protecting the Purified Ruins.

armors.name: Fur Leggings
armors.description: Leggings fashioned from bristly pelts. Worn by ancestral follower warriors.The ancestral followers keep their distance from the Erdtree, awaiting new buds. They are certain to sprout from their very flesh, and indeed, their souls.
armors.how_to_acquire: Drops from Ancestral Follower enemies.that can be found at Siofra River.

armors.name: Gelmir Knight Greaves
armors.description: Greaves worn by knights once loyal to Praetor Rykard. Time has yet to dull their luster.
armors.lore:
Greaves worn by knights once loyal to Praetor Rykard.
Time has yet to dull their luster.
armors.how_to_acquire: You can loot the entire Gelmir Knight Set in the Gelmir Hero's Grave dungeon from a Gelmir Knight corpse.Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Godrick Knight Greaves
armors.description: Greaves worn by knights loyal to Godrick the Grafted.Time has yet to dull their luster.
armors.lore:
Greaves worn by knights loyal to Godrick the Grafted.
Time has yet to dull their luster.
armors.how_to_acquire: Gatefront Ruins: Dropped by the heavy Godrick Knight patrolling the outpost.Fort Haight: Chance to drop from the Godrick Knight atop the fort walls.

armors.name: Godskin Apostle Trousers
armors.description: Trousers made by seweing together patches of smooth skin.Worn by t he Godskin Apostles.The apostles, once said to serve Destined Death, are wielders of the god-slaying black flame. But after their defeat by Maliketh, the Black Blade, the source of their power was sealed away.
armors.lore:
Trousers made by sewing together patches of smooth skin.
Worn by the Godskin Apostles.
armors.how_to_acquire: Defeating Godskin Apostle, located at the bottom of Divine Tower of Caelid.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Guardian Greaves
armors.description: Engraved golden greaves.Worn by the guardians of the Minor Erdtrees.In accordance with an ancient pact with the Erdtree, it is said that their deaths led not to destruction, but instead to renewed, eternal life as guardians.
armors.lore:
Engraved golden greaves.
Worn by the guardians of the Minor Erdtrees.
armors.how_to_acquire: Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from Erdtree Guardians that are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.An area dense with Guardians can be found by starting at the Dragonbarrow Fork site of grace, and working your way uphill towards the Minor Erdtree. Guardians are encountered in small groups and more come up from the ground, making it a good place to farm the set.

armors.name: Haligtree Greaves
armors.description: Greaves worn by soldiers sworn to the Haligtree. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
armors.lore:
Greaves worn by soldiers sworn to the Haligtree.
Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
armors.how_to_acquire: Haligtree Soldiers drop all pieces of the set. They are located throughout all areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

armors.name: Hoslow's Greaves
armors.description: Garish silver greaves decorated with red embellishments. Passed down through the Hoslow family.When Juno Hoslow received an invitation to the Volcano Manor, he discreetly refused."I have already walked many a road drenched in blood, yet never would I consider myself a champion."
armors.lore:
Garish silver greaves decorated with red embellishments.
Passed down through the Hoslow family.
armors.how_to_acquire: All pieces of Hoslow's Set are dropped by Juno Hoslow along with Hoslow's Petal Whip as part of the final contract for the Volcano Manor questline.Juno Hoslow is a Hostile NPC that you can invade after progressing through the questline. His invade rune be found in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants, east of Shack of the Lofty. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Kaiden Trousers
armors.description: Trousers worn by Kaiden sellswords. These hulking, fearless mercenaries, said to hail from the mountaintops of the wintry north, are adept at fighting on horseback. Kaiden is the name of their home settlement.
armors.lore: Trousers worn by Kaiden sellswords.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Northern Mercenaries and Mounted Northern Mercenaries found in Limgrave.

armors.name: Knight Greaves
armors.description: Iron greaves of an unknown knight. It is made of thin iron plate. Such metal armor is heavy, but provides considerable damage negation.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for 3,000 Runes.

armors.name: Land of Reeds Greaves
armors.description: Greaves wrapped in tough leather.Worn by the warriors of the Land of Reeds
armors.lore:
Greaves wrapped in tough leather.
Worn by warriors of the Land of Reeds.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Samurai ClassSold by the Isolated Merchant in Dragonbarrow for 1,000 Runes. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Leather Trousers
armors.description: Well-made leather trousers.The lower legs are each bound in cord for ease of movement.
armors.lore: Well-made leather trousers.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for 1500 Runes. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link.

armors.name: Lionel's Greaves
armors.description: Rounded iron greaves. Worn by Lionel the Lionhearted. When this chivalrous, dauntless knight met Fia, who had been driven from her home, he declared himself to be her father.
armors.lore:
Rounded iron greaves.
Worn by Lionel the Lionhearted.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Malformed Dragon Greaves
armors.description: Malformed golden greaves.Adorned with various dragon imagery and worn by the misshapen Tree Sentinels.After the great ancient dragon Gransax attacked, the sentinels had an epiphany. The only way to truly protect the Erdtree was to become dragons themselves.
armors.lore:
Malformed golden greaves.
Adorned with various dragon imagery and worn by the misshapen Tree Sentinels.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by the Draconic Tree Sentinel in Crumbling Farum Azula.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Maliketh's Greaves
armors.description: Beast's greaves made of black iron and decorated with gold. Worn by Maliketh the Black Blade.Maliketh, Queen Marika's loyal half-brother, bore a blade imbued with Destined Death, and there was not one demigod who did not fear him. Champions knew what was at stake. Indeed, that is what made them champions.
armors.lore:
Beast's greaves made of black iron and decorated with gold.
Worn by Maliketh the Black Blade.
armors.how_to_acquire: Bought from the Enia in the Roundtable Hold after defeating Maliketh, the Black Blade.

armors.name: Millicent's Boots
armors.description: Boots worn by Millicent the Rotting
armors.how_to_acquire: This piece is not currently obtainable.

armors.name: Mushroom Legs
armors.description: Mushrooms found growing all over the body. These overgrown mushroom have colonized the Legs. To those enraptured by the scarlet rot, they are holy vestments that root one to the earth.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found in a cavern in Seethewater Cave filled with mushroom people and a Giant Poison Flower. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Noble's Trousers
armors.description: White trousers of superior craftsmanship. Worn by expatriated royalty. A gift of such rare beauty, a royal wouldn't disgrace their illustrious heritage even if found dead, in a ditch, in the middle of nowhere, while wearing such splendid raiment.
armors.lore:
White trousers of superior craftsmanship.
Worn by expatriated royalty.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found at East Windmill Pasture, Altus Plateau, in a burning pile of corpses surrounded by a circle of dancing women.Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Omenkiller Boots
armors.description: Long, stiff leather gloves worn by the Omenkillers.
armors.lore: Stiff leather boots worn by the Omenkillers.
armors.special_effect: Increases the damage of Omen Bairn and Regal Omen Bairn by 5%
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by an Omenkiller.Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Queen's Leggings
armors.description: Leggings indicating the highest order of sorcerer. Worn by Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon. When Rennala, head of both the Academy of Raya Lucaria and the Carian royal family, lost her husband Radagon, her heart went along with him. And then, those at the academy realized. That Rennala was no champion, after all.
armors.lore:
Leggings indicating the highest order of sorcerer.
Worn by Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon.
armors.how_to_acquire: Queen's Leggings can be purchased to Enia in Roundtable Hold for 7,000 Need to defeat Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon Bossfight first.

armors.name: Page Trousers
armors.description: Trousers worn by pages who serve nobility and are mindful to keep them out of harm's way. Traveling wear tailored with exquisite precision, to avoid any undue shame for the page's master.
armors.how_to_acquire: Leyndell Royal Capital: Dropped by Page enemies in Tombsward Ruins Underground.

armors.name: Preceptor's Trousers
armors.description: Trousers of the magic preceptors who serve the Carian royals. Black and perfectly discreet.
armors.lore:
Trousers of the magic preceptors who serve the Carian royals.
Black and perfectly discreet.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found on Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Prisoner Trousers
armors.description: Tattered trousers. Worn by a prisoner convicted of an appalling crime. Never once washed, every fiber is filthy. The smell is beyond belief.
armors.lore:
Tattered trousers.
Worn by a prisoner convicted of an appalling crime.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Prisoner Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Ainsel River for 1000 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Prophet Trousers
armors.description: Trousers of the exiled prophets who foresaw that their faith would end in flames and were persecuted and driven from their homes as a result. Its fabric scrapes against their skin like a file, and the rickety cart wheel around the neck warns passers-by not to lend an ear to their meandering sermons.
armors.lore: Trousers of exiled prophets who foretold misfortuneand were persecuted and driven from their homes as a result.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Prophet Class.Can be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for 1,000 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Radahn's Greaves
armors.description: Greaves depicting the golden lion. Worn by General Radahn. The golden lion is said to symbolize Godfrey, the first Elden Lord, and his beast regent, Serosh. From his youngest years, Radahn was naturally captivated by the Lord of the Battlefield.
armors.lore:
Greaves depicting the golden lion.
Worn by General Radahn.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for 8,000 runes once Starscourge Radahn has been defeated.

armors.name: Radahn Soldier Greaves
armors.description: Greaves worn by soldiers who fought by General Radahn's side. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
armors.lore:
Greaves worn by soldiers who fought by General Radahn's side.
Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
armors.how_to_acquire: Chance to drop from Radahn Soldiers, easily found in large numbers around Fort Gael.

armors.name: Raging Wolf Greaves
armors.description: Greaves worn by Vargram the Raging Wolf, one of the first Tarnished to visit the Roundtable Hold. According to the old legends, wolves are the shadows of the Empyrean. Vargram aspired to such a state himself.
armors.lore: Greaves worn by Vargram the Raging Wolf, one of the first Tarnished to visit the Roundtable Hold.
armors.how_to_acquire: Leyndell, Royal Capital. After obtaining the second to last letter from Volcano Manor, you will be sent to assist Knight Bernahl with assassinating Vargram the Raging Wolf and Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm. On successful invasion, you will receive the full Raging Wolf Set. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Raya Lucarian Greaves
armors.description: Greaves worn by Raya Lucaria Academy soldiers. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
armors.lore:
Greaves worn by Raya Lucaria Academy soldiers.
Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Raya Lucarian SoldiersEasily farmed from the Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Caria Manor after the Manor Lower Level site of grace.

armors.name: Rotten Duelist Greaves
armors.description: Greaves wrapped with bronze snakes, eaten through by scarlet rot. Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum. The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes.
armors.lore: Greaves wrapped with bronze snakes, eaten through by scarlet rot.
armors.special_effect: Increases likelihood of being targeted by foes
armors.how_to_acquire: The Rotten Duelist Greaves Leg Armor can be found by killing a Rotten Duelist that's facing the cliff edge located a little northwest of Ordina, Liturgical Town which is located in the northern part of the Consecrated Snowfields. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Sage Trousers
armors.description: Thick burgundy trousers. Attire of the wise sages who were deemed heretical. Evidence that the wearer was driven from town.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found in Stillwater Cave - Liurnia of the Lakes, just ahead and below the Lake Facing Cliffs, it's all sitting on a poison submerged corpse near the end, guarded by an Giant Bats that will attack you when you take it. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Sanguine Noble Waistcloth
armors.description: Waistcloth sewn from black cloth. Worn by the nobles who serve the Lord of Blood. Known to strike from pools of blood, these assassins are missionaries come to share the gospel of accursed blood.
armors.lore:
Waistcloth sewn from black cloth.
Worn by the nobles who serve the Lord of Blood.
armors.how_to_acquire: The entire Sanguine Noble Set is dropped by Sanguine Noble NPC invasion in west Mountaintops of The Giants. Includes Sanguine Noble Hood, Sanguine Noble Robe and Sanguine Noble Waistcloth.Elden Ring Map here.

armors.name: Scaled Greaves
armors.description: Gauntlets worn by Old Knight Istvan.The corroded metal is reinforced with rock-hard scales, making it high effective against non-physical attacks.Istvan is one of a few wizened Tarnished who survived to this day.
armors.lore:
Greaves worn by Old Knight Istvan.
The corroded metal is reinforced with rock-hard scales, making it highly effective against non-physical attacks.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be found after killing the first assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Old Knight Istvan. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Snow Witch Skirt
armors.description: Witch's skirt in the color of snow.Once worn by the snowy crone who the young Ranni encountered deep in the woods. She was a witch, and well versed in cold sorceries. It is said that the doll that houses Ranni's soul was modeled after her.That old witch was Ranni's secret mentor.
armors.lore: Witch's skirt in the color of snow.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found in a chest on the upper floor of Renna's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Sorcerer Leggings
armors.description: Leggings worn by Raya Lucaria's magic scholars. Made by wrapping a simple cloth around the legs.
armors.lore:
Leggings worn by Raya Lucaria's scholars of sorcery.
Made by wrapping a simple cloth around the legs.
armors.how_to_acquire: They are dropped by Raya Lucaria Sorcerers in Raya Lucaria Academy.

armors.name: Traveler's Slops
armors.description: Slops of a traveling perfumer of no renown. An associate of a healer, he is said to be in search of new aromatics and flower gardens, in hopes of treating Misbegotten, Omen and all those seen as impure.
armors.lore: Slops of a traveling perfumer of no renown.
armors.how_to_acquire: Found in a corpse in one of the corners of the buildings within Street of Sages Ruins, in Caelid's Swamp area, alongside the entire Traveler's Set.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Traveling Maiden Boots
armors.description: Boots worn by traveling maidens.Maidens traversed the Lands Between for different reasons. Some to seek audience with the Fingers. Others, to find the Tarnished who they were destined to guide.
armors.lore: Boots worn by traveling maidens.
armors.how_to_acquire: On a corpse inside the Shack of The Lofty in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants. The rest of the set can also be looted here. Elden Ring Interactive Map LinkPossibly altered in a patch to weigh 0.2 less and have 0.1 more damage negation across all categories (confirmation required).

armors.name: Twinned Greaves
armors.description: Greaves depicting entwined twins of gold and silver. The two known as D are inseparable twins.They are of two bodies and two minds, but one single soul. Not once do they stand together; not one word do they speak to one another.Perhaps this armor longs to find its way to the other D.
armors.lore: Greaves depicting entwined twins of gold and silver.
armors.how_to_acquire: Earliest location: Limgrave East upon killing D Hunter.Elden Ring Map hereObtained at end of D Hunter's questline.

armors.name: Warrior Greaves
armors.description: Greaves of a nomadic warrior.Crafted from sturdy leather.
armors.lore:
Greaves of a nomadic warrior.
Crafted from sturdy leather.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Warrior Class Purchasable from Isolated Merchant (Raya Lucaria). Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Vagabond Knight Greaves
armors.description: Greaves of a knight banished from their motherland.Dirty and battered after enduring a lengthy vagabond journey.Metal armor is heavy, but also sturdy, offering significant damage negation.
armors.lore:
Greaves of a knight banished from their motherland.
Dirty and battered after enduring a lengthy vagabond journey.
armors.how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Vagabond Class.Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 1,000 Runes. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Veteran's Greaves
armors.description: An old greaves that has seen many battles.Worn by Niall, the great veteran general of Sol.Nial was a lone survivor who commanded spirits to defend his long-passed master.This aging general could not die, nor did he have anywhere to fade away.
armors.lore:
Old greaves that have seen many battles.
Worn by Niall, the veteran general of Sol.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be bought from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Commander Niall

armors.name: White Reed Greaves
armors.description: Greaves of the White Reeds, fashioned from banded iron plates. Worn by the Inabam head disciples of the great swordsman Okina. The Inaba traveled in pursuit of not only the master who abandoned them, but also proper deaths, won honorably through hard-fought combat. To be a White Reed is to seek death; fitting for the Inaba, who desired nothingmore than to die by the sword.
armors.lore:
Greaves of the White Reeds, fashioned from banded iron plates.
Worn by the Inaba, head disciples of the great swordsman Okina.
armors.how_to_acquire: Spiritcaller's Cave in the Mountaintops of the Giants: Found on a corpse in a long cavern filled with spirit wolves. The White Reed Armor and White Reed Gauntlets can also be found on this corpse. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Zamor Legwraps
armors.description: Legwraps worn by knights of Zamor, hailed as heroes in the War against the Giants. These long-lived warriors, clad in biting, freezing winds, are said to have been the mortal enemies of the Fire Giants since time immemorial.
armors.how_to_acquire: Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave: The entire Zamor Set is dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor fought at the end of this dungeon. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

armors.name: Drake Knight Greaves
armors.description: Black iron greaves by drake knights.Features the spoils a dragon catch as an emblem of pride as both dragon hunter and partake of communion.From birth, drake knights speak not a word. They spend their lives pursuing the strength of dragons, for its sublime beauty and inspiration of awe.
armors.lore:
Black iron greaves by drake knights.
Features the spoils of a dragon catch as an emblem of pride as both dragon hunter and partaker of communion.
armors.how_to_acquire: You can find the Drake Knight Set in Crumbling Farum Azula.Elden Ring Map hereTravel to the Beside The Great Bridge site of grace and go in the opposite direction of the boss room. Go through the building and outside onto the balcony. From here drop down to the Beastman with the big cleaver. Go along the bridge and call up the elevator. Ride the Elevator down and go Outside. The Drake Knight Set is on the left in a big chest.

armors.name: Perfumer Sarong
armors.description: Sarong of an Erdtree Capital perfumer.In times past, the role of perfumer was much respect; a blessed apothecary in the eyes of many. But after entering the battlefields of the Shattering they performed no such role, trading their aromatics for poisons and explosives.
armors.lore: Sarong of an Erdtree Capital perfumer.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Perfumer Sarong can be looted from perfumers found through Leyndell, Royal Capital.

armors.name: Spellblade's Trousers
armors.description: Glintstone sorcerer Rogier's traveling attire, graced with an intricate, aristocratic decoration. Strengthens glintstone sorcery skills.Rogier spent his entire life behaving with utter detachment. No one noticed the anger, grief, regret, or fear that existed along with it.
armors.lore: Glintstone sorcerer Rogier's trousers, graced with an intricate, aristocratic decoration. Strengthen glintstone sorcery skills.
armors.special_effect: Strengthens magic and cold weapon skills by 2%
armors.how_to_acquire: Roundtable Hold - Drops from Rogier.

armors.name: Ronin's Greaves
armors.description: Greaves of the man who calls himself Shabriri.Highly functional and heavily worn.The man, once known as Yura, kept a woman in the deepest reaches of his heart.
armors.lore:
Greaves of the man who calls himself Shabriri.
Highly functional and heavily worn.
armors.how_to_acquire: Acquired by following Yura's questline.Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Blaidd's Greaves
armors.description: Well-worn black greaves of the man-wolf Blaidd.Blaidd, who served as Ranni's shadow, was a loyal ally who would defy destiny itself if it would have him turn upon his Lady.
armors.lore: Well-worn black greaves of the man-wolf Blaidd.
armors.how_to_acquire: Following Ranni's questline, after she is given the Dark Moon Ring, return to Ranni's Rise and you will hear Blaidd talking to himself in front of the tower. When he finishes his dialogue he will turn hostile, and defeating him will grant the player Blaidd's Armor, Blaidd's Gauntlets, and Blaidd's Greaves (as well as the Royal Greatsword).Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Night's Cavalry Greaves
armors.description: Pitch-black greaves thinly painted with dried blood.Worn by the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds.The Night's Cavalry, who now wander the dim roads of night, were once led by the Fell Omen and were deliverers of death for great warriors, knights, and champions.
armors.lore:
Pitch-black greaves thinly painted with dried blood.
Worn by the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds.
armors.how_to_acquire: You can find the Night's Cavalry Set within the Consecrated Snowfield: From the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace at night, look southwest and there will be a caravan being pulled by two giants and two Night's Cavalry escorts. Kill both the escorts to receive the armor alongside an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Blue Silver Mail Skirt
armors.description: Chainmail skirt crafted with blue silver.Worn by the wolf-riding Albinauric archers.Blue silver is a metal born from the same mother as the archers themselves, and offers protection from magic and frost.
armors.lore:
Chainmail skirt crafted with blue silver.
Worn by the wolf-riding Albinauric archers.
armors.how_to_acquire: Albinauric Wolfback Archers found in the Consecrated Snowfield, as well as the Ordina Gaol, drop the Blue Silver Set pieces.One that is easily farmed can be found shortly north of the Consecrated Snowfield site of grace.

armors.name: Nomadic Merchant's Trousers
armors.description: Trousers of the nomadic merchants.These merchants once thrived as the Great Caravan, but after being accused of heretical beliefs, their entire clan was rounded up and buried alive far underground.Then, they chanted a curse of despair, and summoned the flame of frenzy.
armors.lore: Trousers of the nomadic merchants.
armors.how_to_acquire: In the hidden tunnels behind the altar in Mohg, the Omen's boss room at the Cathedral of the Forsaken Site of Grace in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds below Leyndell, Royal Capital.After opening the secret passage behind the altar and taking the stairs down, after crossing the narrow fallen rafter, directly to the left is a tent and in the far corner you can find Nomadic Merchant's Chapeau and the full Nomadic Merchant's Set.Elden Ring Map hereTo get access to the set, you need to aggro the enemy walking around close by and lead it next to the tent and have it use its frenzy attack to break the tent.

armors.name: Tree Sentinel Greaves
armors.description: Golden greaves of the heavy cavalry Tree Sentinels who serve the Erdtree.Imposingly sturdy and nigh unbreakable, the grace of old yet lingers.
armors.lore: Golden greaves of the heavy cavalry Tree Sentinels who serve the Erdtree.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Tree Sentinel Set is obtained by solving a puzzle in Auriza Hero's Grave. Elden Ring Map here

armors.name: Royal Knight Greaves
armors.description: Silver greaves of Loretta, a knight who served Miquella's Haligtree. Loretta, once a royal Carian knight, went on a journey in search of a haven for Albinaurics, and determined that the Haligtree was their best chance for eventual salvation.
armors.lore: Silver greaves of Loretta, a knight who served Miquella's Haligtree.
armors.how_to_acquire: Can be brought from Finger Reader Enia, at Roundtable Hold after defeating Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree for 4000.

armors.name: Nox Greaves
armors.description: Monastic greaves of the Eternal City.Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped from Nox Monk, Nox Swordstress, and Night Maiden enemies in Nokron and Nokstella.

armors.name: Shaman Leggings
armors.description: Leggings fashioned from bristly pelts.Worn by ancestral follower shamans.The ancestral followers live a distance from the Erdtree, awaiting new buds. They are certain to sprout from their very flesh, and indeed, their souls.
armors.lore:
Leggings fashioned from bristly pelts.
Worn by ancestral follower shamans.
armors.how_to_acquire: The leggings can be looted off of the Ancestral Follower Shaman in the Ancestral Woods area of Siofra River.

armors.name: Duelist Greaves
armors.description: Greaves encircles by bronze snakes.Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum. The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes.The snake is viewed as a traitor to the Erdtree, and the audience delighted in seeing these bronze effigies beaten and battered.
armors.lore:
Greaves encircled by bronze snakes.
Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum. The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes.
armors.how_to_acquire: The Duelist Set pieces can be dropped as loot from the Duelist enemies located in Leyndell, Royal Capital.There is an apparent Colosseum on a hill in the southeast area of the city that has two Duelists, one patrolling the path and one at the top. Both of these enemies have a chance to drop all three pieces.

armors.name: Fire Prelate Greaves
armors.description: Black iron greaves with the appearance of flames.Attire of the Fire Prelates, commanders of the Fire Monks.The weighty frames of the Prelates symbolized the onus of their grave vows as guardians of the flame. "Etch this sight upon thine breast. Of my thunderous gravity."
armors.lore:
Black iron greaves with the appearance of flames.
Attire of the Fire Prelates, commanders of the Fire Monks.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Fire Prelates.One can be found in Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir.One is in Guardians' Garrison in Mountaintop of the Giants.

armors.name: Aristocrat Boots
armors.description: Boots made from tanned leather.Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital.Abandoning their birthplace after the shattering, these undead wanderers are the pitiful product of unending life.
armors.lore:
Boots made from tanned leather.
Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital.
armors.how_to_acquire: Dropped by Aristocrat Sorcerers seen in larger groups of Aristocrat enemies that wander the roads of most areas.A group of three can be easily farmed in Kingsrealm Ruins near the Road to the Manor site of grace. Turning around from where Iji's workstation is, they are just beyond the gate that was formerly an illusory wall.Another spot is the traveling carriage escort on the roads north of the Agheel Lake South site of grace.

armors.name: Old Aristocrat Shoes
armors.description: Hard-wearing shoes made of leather.Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital. Garb favored by the aged.Abandoning their birthplace after the Shattering, these undead wanderers are the pitiful product of unending life.
armors.lore:
Hard-wearing shoes made of leather.
Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital. Garb favored by the aged.
armors.how_to_acquire: All pieces of the Old Aristocrat Set are dropped by the Old Aristocrat enemies, often found within larger groups of Aristocrats wandering the roads of most areas. The green cowl makes them easily distinguishable from other Aristocrats.There are a number of Old Aristocrats within the caravan of enemies north of the Agheel Lake South site of grace.Altus Plateu - There are Old Aristocrats to the left of Gold Mask's Bridge.

armors.name: Vulgar Militia Greaves
armors.description: Greaves worn by lean, mean, and filthy militiamen.Freshly-singed battlegrounds effusing with the stench of the dead. Forbidden lands that will be excised from the memory of history. This is where the vulgar militia serve, as untiring, unsung watchkeepers.
armors.lore: Greaves worn by lean, mean, and filthy militiamen.
