skills.location: Defaul skill on theReduviadagger.

skills.name: Glintstone Dart
skills.effect: Skill that builds from the Glintstone Pebble sorcery. Charge the skill to upgrade it to Glintstone Dart. Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust.
skills.location: Default skill on the Glintstone Kris Dagger.

skills.name: Night-and-Flame Stance
skills.effect: Hold the sword level and prepare to cast a sorcery. Follow up with a normal attack to cast the Night Comet sorcery, or a strong attack to sweep forward with a burst of flames.
skills.location: Default skill on theSword of Night and Flame.

skills.name: Wave of Gold
skills.effect: Imbue the sword with bygone golden glory, then fire it at foes.A wide, golden wave fans out forwards, sweeping through all enemies caught in its path.
skills.location: Default skill on the Sacred Relic Sword.

skills.name: Ruinous Ghostflame
skills.effect: Swing the sword to bathe its blade in ghostflame. The ghostflame adds magic damage to attacks, and also has a bitterly cold bite.
skills.location: Default skill on the Helphen's Steeple.

skills.name: Establish Order
skills.effect: Raise the armament in a salute, releasing a golden explosion. Repeated inputs send out waves of golden light.
skills.location: Default skill on the Golden Order Greatsword.

skills.name: Mists of Slumber
skills.effect: Releases a faint purple mist that spreads across a wide frontwards area.This mist inflicts the sleep ailment upon foes.
skills.location: Default skill for the Sword of St Trina.

skills.name: Spearcall Ritual
skills.effect: Thrust the spear high, bearing prayers into the sky to summon a downpour of spectral spears.
skills.location: Default skill on the Death Ritual Spear.

skills.name: Wolf's Assault
skills.effect: Infuse the greatsword with frost, then perform a forward somersault to plunge it into the ground. Then, pull it out to release a cold blast.
skills.location: Default skill on the Royal Greatsword.

skills.name: Thundercloud Form
skills.effect: Temporarily transform into a red thundercloud and fly through the air, then plunge down with a lightning-infused blade. Hold to increase the reach of the thundercloud form.
skills.location: Default skill for the Dragon King's Cragblade.

skills.name: Cursed-Blood Slice
skills.effect: Brace, then charge forward to deliver a downward diagonal slice. The bloody trail of the late is followed by a burst of flame. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.
skills.location: Default skill on the Morgott's Cursed Sword.

skills.name: Waterfowl Dance
skills.effect: Perform a series of one-footed leaps in the manner of a waterfowl to unleash a swift yet graceful slashing combo.Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.
skills.location: Default skill on the Hand of Malenia.

skills.name: Gold Breaker
skills.effect: Leap up high and, while suspended in midair, imbue the rune shard with light before smashing it down hard onto the ground.The heroic Radagon's signature attack.
skills.location: Default skill on the Marika's Hammer.

skills.name: I Command Thee, Kneel!
skills.effect: Repeatedly smash the Axe of Godrick into the ground, unleashing two earth-shaking shockwaves.Follow up with an additional input to produce a third shockwave
skills.location: This Skill can only be acquired by equipping Axe of Godrick.

skills.name: Regal Roar
skills.effect: Let loose a mighty war cry, raising attack power, while sending out a shockwave that cannot be guarded against by stomping the ground. While active, strong attack becomes a lunging slash.
skills.location: Default skill on the Axe of Godfrey.

skills.name: Starcaller Cry
skills.effect: Bring the two swords together and roar into the skies, pulling in enemies with a gravitational wave. Follow up with an additional input to slam down with gravity-infused swords.
skills.location: Default skill of the Starscourge Greatsword.

skills.name: Wave of Destruction
skills.effect: Raise the sword up high, then strike it against the ground to fire off a wave of gravitational force.
skills.location: Default skill on the Ruins Greatsword.

skills.name: Bloodboon Ritual
skills.effect: Raise the sacred spear and pierce the body of the Formless Mother. Stab up to three times, creating explosions of blood with each thrust.This skill will coat the armament with bloodflame for a while.
skills.location: Default skill onthe Mohgwyn's Sacred Spear.

skills.name: Flowing Form
skills.effect: Temporarily transforms armament into its liquid form.Swing the armament like a whip to perform a sweeping slice over a wide area.
skills.location: Default skill of the Nox Flowing Sword.

skills.name: Flowing Form
skills.effect: Temporarily transforms armament into its liquid form.Swing the armament like a whip to strike surroundings before slamming its teardrop-shaped head down.
skills.location: Default skill of the Nox Flowing Hammer.

skills.name: Blade of Death
skills.effect: Unleash the power of the Rune of Death to fire off a blade-like projectile.In addition to dealing immediate damage, the blade reduces the enemy's maximum HP and continues to wear down HP for a while.
skills.location: Default skill on theBlack Knife.

skills.name: Blade of Gold
skills.effect: Leap into the air, charging the armament with golden flames that are then shot at the enemy as a single, blade-like projectile. Inflicts holy damage.
skills.location: Default skill on the Blade of Calling.

skills.name: Destined Death
skills.effect: Set free the remnants of Destined Death, plunging the greatsword into the ground to summon a myriad of blades. In addition to dealing immediate damage, this attack reduces the enemy's maximum HP and continues to wear down HP for a short time.
skills.location: Default skill on the Maliketh's Black Blade.

skills.name: Spinning Wheel
skills.effect: Strike the wheel against the ground to set it spinning at top speed. Hold to keep the wheel spinning. Can be used while walking to push the armament into enemies.
skills.location: Default skill on the Ghiza's Wheel.

skills.name: Alabaster Lord's Pull
skills.effect: Thrust the armament into the ground to create a gravity well. In addition to dealing damage, this attack pulls enemies in. Has a greater area of effect than Gravitas.
skills.location: Default skill on the Alabaster Lord's Sword.

skills.name: Onyx Lord's Repulsion
skills.effect: Thrust the armament into the ground to create a gravity well. In addition to dealing damage, this attack sends enemies flying away.
skills.location: Default skill on theOnyx Lord's Greatsword.

skills.name: Oath of Vengeance
skills.effect: Swear an oath upon the greatsword to avenge the clan, temporarily raising all attributes for a certain duration. While the oath's effects are active, poise will also be increased.
skills.location: Default skill on the Grafted Blade Greatsword.

skills.name: Ice Lightning Sword
skills.effect: Call down a bolt of ice lightning into the blade and bring it down upon a foe.The ice lightning effect will persist for a while.
skills.location: Default skill on the Dragonscale Blade.

skills.name: Regal Beastclaw
skills.effect: Slam the hammer into the ground, rending the land asunder with the armament's five bestial claws.
skills.location: Default skill on the Beastclaw Greathammer.

skills.name: Flame Dance
skills.effect: Imbue the red braid with the Giants' Flame and lash out in a wide range with a series of agile swings.
skills.location: Default skill for the Giant's Red Braid.

skills.name: Claw Flick
skills.effect: Cause the finger to swell, then flex to build up strength before giving enemies an almighty flick.
skills.location: Default skill on the Ringed Finger.

skills.name: Nebula
skills.effect: Imbue the Naturalborn's stars with magic to perform a sweeping strike.This attack leaves a dark cloud of stars in its wake that lingers briefly before exploding.
skills.location:
Default skill on the Bastard's Stars.
Defeult skillon theWing of Astel.

skills.name: Ghostflame Ignition
skills.effect: Thrust out the barbed rod and set its tip alight with ghostflame.Follow up with a normal attack to set the ground ablaze with ghostflame, or a strong attack to trigger a massive explosion.
skills.location: Default skill on the Death's Poker.

skills.name: Ancient Lightning Spear
skills.effect: Imbue the armament with the ancient dragons' red lightning, then throw it as a spear. Can be charged to increase its power.
skills.location: Default skill on the Bolt of Gransax.

skills.name: Frenzyflame Thrust
skills.effect: Imbue the spear with the flame of frenzy and leap forwards, plunging it into the ground and setting off a maddening explosion. The skill inflicts both the enemy and the user with madness.
skills.location: Default skill on Vyke's War Spear.

skills.name: Miquella's Ring of Light
skills.effect: Summon Miquella's shining halo and fire it forwards. Can be fired in rapid succession.
skills.location: Default skill on the Halo Scythe.

skills.name: Golden Tempering
skills.effect: Cross the two swords to grant their attacks holy essence.While in effect, strong attack performs a dual-wielding combo attack.
skills.location: Default skill on the Ornamental Straight Sword.

skills.name: Last Rites
skills.effect: Raise the epitaph to grant the effect of Sacred Order to yourselfand allies in the vicinity.Particularly effective at laying to rest Those Who Live in Death.
skills.location: Default skill on the Golden Epitaph.

skills.name: Unblockable Blade
skills.effect: Imbue the cipher blade with light, extending its length, then strike with a sudden sweeping attack.This attack cannot be blocked.
skills.location:
Default skill on the Cipher Pata.
Default skill on the Coded Sword.

skills.name: Corpse Wax Cutter
skills.effect: Lost skill of ancient heroes.Lift the sword up high to release the power of corpse wax and launch it forwards as a blade-like projectile.
skills.location: Default skill on the Gargoyle's Blackblade.

skills.name: Zamor Ice Storm
skills.effect: Plunge the curved sword into the ground, building power before unleashing a freezing storm that batters the surroundings.
skills.location: Default skill on the Zamor Curved Sword.

skills.name: Radahn's Rain
skills.effect: Archery skill performed from a low stance. Ready the bow and fire a sudden flurry of arrows up into the sky. The arrows will pour on foes like rain.
skills.location: Default skill of the Lion Greatbow.

skills.name: The Queen's Black Flame
skills.effect: Set the blade ablaze with the god-slaying black flame before delivering a sweeping slash. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack. The black flames will continue to wear down HP for a while.
skills.location: Default skill on the Godslayer Greatsword.

skills.name: Dynast's Finesse
skills.effect: Nimbly avoid an attack, securing some distance from foes. Follow up with strong attack to perform a sudden lunge, and press strong attack again to perform a sweeping slice.
skills.location: Default skill on the Bloody Helice.

skills.name: Magma Shower
skills.effect: Slash at foes in a twirling motion while scattering magma all around.Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.
skills.location: Default skill on the Magma Blade.

skills.name: Death Flare
skills.effect: Set the lusterless sun ablaze with the Prince of Death's flames, inflicting the death ailment upon foes.Follow up with an additional input to bring down the armament, triggering an explosion.
skills.location: Default skill on the Eclipse Shotel.

skills.name: Bloodhound's Finesse
skills.effect: Slash upwards with the Bloodhound's Fang, using the momentum of the strike to perform a backwards somersault and gain some distance from foes. Follow up with a strong attack to perform the Bloodhound's Step attack.
skills.location: Default skill on the Bloodhound's Fang.

skills.name: Magma Guillotine
skills.effect: Grab the scalesword with both hands, as a wyrm would hold it in its mouth, and leap forwards, smashing it into the ground and triggering a blast of magma. Follow up with an additional input to perform a chopping attack.
skills.location: Default skill on the Magma Wyrm's Scalesword.

skills.name: Corpse Piler
skills.effect: Forms a blade of cursed blood for repeated, interweaving successive attacks. Follow up with an additional input for further successive attacks.
skills.location: Default skill on theRivers of Blood.

skills.name: Transient Moonlight
skills.effect: Sheathe blade, holding it at the hip in a composed stance.Follow up with either a normal or a strong attack to draw the blade at great speed for an instant slash attack. Both attacks fire off a wave of light.
skills.location: Default skill on the Moonveil.

skills.name: Bloodblade Dance
skills.effect: Leap at foe to perform a flurry of tornado-like attacks.Follow up with an additional input to perform an attack that ends in an evasive maneuver.
skills.location: Default skill on the Eleonora's Poleblade.

skills.name: Knowledge Above All
skills.effect: Raise the scepter to manifest the realm of the All-Knowing. Enemy magic and holy damage negation will be reduced for all within the area, including the caster.
skills.location: Default skill on the Scepter of the All-Knowing.

skills.name: Devourer of Worlds
skills.effect: Charge the scepter with magic and strike it against the ground to steal the HP of all nearby enemies.
skills.location: Default skill on the Devourer's Scepter.

skills.name: Familial Rancor
skills.effect: Gently rattle the copper heads to summon vengeful spirits that chase down foes.The anguish of a spouse and children invites accursed wrath.
skills.location: Default skill on the Family Heads.

skills.name: Rosus's Summons
skills.effect: Raise the axe aloft to summon those lost in death.Three skeletons will appear at a distance and attack in tandem before vanishing.
skills.location: Default skill on the Rosus' Axe.

skills.name: Thunderstorm
skills.effect: Imbue the armament's wing-blade with lightning and swing it around to create a tempestuous lightning storm. Follow up with an additional input to perform up to two spinning attacks. The lightning will stay on the blade for a while.
skills.location: Default skill on the Stormhawk Axe.

skills.name: Sacred Phalanx
skills.effect: Release the power of a hidden incantation to erect a palisade of golden spears frontwards.
skills.location:
Drops from the spear wieldingCleanrot Knightsjust south of the Heart of Aeonia byCommander O'Neil(very low drop rate).
It can also drop from the ghostly Cleanrot Knights in theWar-Dead Catacombs.
Drops from the spear wielding Cleanrot Knights inElphael, Brace of the Haligtree. Closest is directly outside the "Prayer Room"Site of Grace(very low drop rate).

skills.name: Great-Serpent Hunt
skills.effect: Perform a powerful forward lunge and follow up with an upward thrust via additional input. When fightning a great serpent, a long blade of light will appear, revealing the armament's true power.
skills.location: Default skill on the Serpent-Hunter.

skills.name: Angel's Wings
skills.effect: Jump and imbue the wing-blade of the armament with light, then deliver a slashing attack on the enemy. The white wings impede recovery actions using a flask of tears.
skills.location: Default skill on the Winged Scythe.

skills.name: Storm Kick
skills.effect: Thrust the prosthetic leg blade into the ground, creating a storm.Follow up with a strong attack to perform a lightning-infused jumping attack.
skills.location: Default skill for the Veteran's Prosthesis.

skills.name: Sorcery of the Crozier
skills.effect: Channel magic into the glintstone to activate an ancient sorcery, producing floating magic projectiles that chase enemies automatically.
skills.location: Default skill on the Watchdog's Staff.

skills.name: Erdtree Slam
skills.effect: Jump high up into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends golden shockwaves in all directions. This is the most powerful of all the Ground Slam skills.
skills.location: Unique skill of Staff of the Avatarand Rotten Staff.

skills.name: Gravity Bolt
skills.effect: Imbue the jaw of fallingstar beast with gravitational lightning, sending a bolt crashing down a short distance away. Can be fired in rapid succession.
skills.location: Default skill on the Fallingstar Beast Jaw.

skills.name: Fires of Slumber
skills.effect: Blow into the candlestick's flame, creating a stream of hazy purple fire to cover the ground ahead.The intoxicating flames inflict the sleep ailment upon foes.
skills.location: Default skillonSt Trina's Torch.

skills.name: Golden Retaliation
skills.effect: Ready the shield to unleash its protective incantation.This will dispel sorceries and incantations, retaliating with golden power.
skills.location: Unique skill of Erdtree Greatshield.

skills.name: Contagious Fury
skills.effect: Incite the jellyfish's wrath and allow its fury to flow through you.Raises attack power for a certain duration.
skills.location: Default skill on the Jellyfish Shield.

skills.name: Ordovis's Vortex
skills.effect: Channel the power of the crucible to spin the entire sword in midair, building momentum before slamming the blade down onto the ground.This skill can be charged to increase its power.
skills.location: Default skill on the Ordovis's Greatsword.
